    apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
   apply(simp add: tyenv_wellformed_def)
  by assumption
  
inductive_set â„›â‡©1 :: "('Var,'BExp) TyEnv â‡’ 'Var Stable â‡’ 'BExp preds â‡’ (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf rel"
  and â„›â‡©1_abv :: "
  (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf â‡’
  ('Var,'BExp) TyEnv â‡’ 'Var Stable â‡’ 'BExp preds â‡’
  (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf â‡’
  bool" ("_ â„›â‡§1â‡˜_,_,_â‡™ _" [120, 120, 120, 120, 120] 1000)
  for Î“' :: "('Var,'BExp) TyEnv"
  and ğ’®' :: "'Var Stable"
  and P' :: "'BExp preds"
where
  "x â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ y â‰¡ (x, y) âˆˆ â„›â‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P" |
  intro [intro!] : "âŸ¦ âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P' ; tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P ; memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2;
                      pred P memâ‡©1; pred P memâ‡©2; âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“. xâˆ‰mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“ x)) memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 xâŸ§ âŸ¹ 
                    âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"

inductive â„›â‡©3_aux :: "(('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf â‡’
                 ('Var,'BExp) TyEnv â‡’ 'Var Stable â‡’ 'BExp preds â‡’ (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf â‡’
                 bool" ("_ â„›â‡§3â‡˜_,_,_â‡™ _" [120, 120, 120, 120, 120] 1000)
  and â„›â‡©3 :: "('Var,'BExp) TyEnv â‡’ 'Var Stable â‡’ 'BExp preds â‡’ (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf rel"
  where
  "â„›â‡©3 Î“' ğ’®' P' â‰¡ {(lcâ‡©1, lcâ‡©2). â„›â‡©3_aux lcâ‡©1 Î“' ğ’®' P' lcâ‡©2}" |
  introâ‡©1 [intro] : "âŸ¦ âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©; âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P' âŸ§ âŸ¹
                      âŸ¨Seq câ‡©1 c, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨Seq câ‡©2 c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©" |
  introâ‡©3 [intro] : "âŸ¦ âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©; âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P' âŸ§ âŸ¹
                      âŸ¨Seq câ‡©1 c, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨Seq câ‡©2 c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"

(* A weaker property than bisimulation to reason about the sub-relations of â„›: *)
definition 
  weak_bisim :: "(('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf rel â‡’
                        (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf rel â‡’ bool"
where 
  "weak_bisim ğ’¯â‡©1 ğ’¯ â‰¡ âˆ€ câ‡©1 câ‡©2 mds memâ‡©1 memâ‡©2 câ‡©1' mds' memâ‡©1'.
  ((âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ ğ’¯â‡©1 âˆ§
   (âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©)) âŸ¶
  (âˆƒ câ‡©2' memâ‡©2'. âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§ 
                (âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©) âˆˆ ğ’¯)"

inductive_set â„› :: "('Var,'BExp) TyEnv â‡’ 'Var Stable â‡’ 'BExp preds â‡’
  (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf rel"
  and â„›_abv :: "
  (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf â‡’
  ('Var,'BExp) TyEnv â‡’ 'Var Stable â‡’ 'BExp preds â‡’
  (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf â‡’
  bool" ("_ â„›â‡§uâ‡˜_,_,_â‡™ _" [120, 120, 120, 120, 120] 1000)
  for Î“ :: "('Var,'BExp) TyEnv"
  and ğ’® :: "'Var Stable"
  and P :: "'BExp preds"
where
  "x â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ y â‰¡ (x, y) âˆˆ â„› Î“ ğ’® P" |
  introâ‡©1: "lc â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ lc' âŸ¹ (lc, lc') âˆˆ â„› Î“ ğ’® P" |
  introâ‡©3: "lc â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ lc' âŸ¹ (lc, lc') âˆˆ â„› Î“ ğ’® P"

(* Some eliminators for the above relations *)
inductive_cases â„›â‡©1_elim [elim]: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
inductive_cases â„›â‡©3_elim [elim]: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"

inductive_cases â„›_elim [elim]: "(âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ â„› Î“ ğ’® P"
inductive_cases â„›_elim': "(âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ â„› Î“ ğ’® P"
inductive_cases â„›â‡©1_elim' : "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
inductive_cases â„›â‡©3_elim' : "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2, memâ‡©2âŸ©"

lemma â„›â‡©1_mem_eq: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© âŸ¹ memâ‡©1 =â‡˜mdsâ‡™â‡§l memâ‡©2"
proof (erule â„›â‡©1_elim)
  fix Î“ ğ’® P
  assume wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
  hence mds_consistent: "mds_consistent mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
  assume tyenv_eq: "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2"
  assume leq: "âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“. x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“ x)) memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 x"
  assume pred: "pred P memâ‡©1"
  
  show "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜mdsâ‡™â‡§l memâ‡©2"
  unfolding low_mds_eq_def
  proof(clarify)
    fix x
    assume is_Low: "dma memâ‡©1 x = Low"
    assume is_readable: "x âˆˆ ğ’ âˆ¨ x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    show "memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
    proof(cases "x âˆˆ dom Î“")
      assume in_dom: "x âˆˆ dom Î“"
      with mds_consistent have "x âˆ‰ ğ’"
        unfolding mds_consistent_def by blast
      with is_readable have "x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite"
        by blast
       
      with in_dom leq  have "type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 x"
        unfolding to_total_def
        by auto
      with is_Low have "type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 = Low"
        by(simp add: less_eq_Sec_def)
      with tyenv_eq show ?thesis
        unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
    next         
      assume nin_dom: "x âˆ‰ dom Î“"
      with is_Low have "type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 = Low"
        unfolding to_total_def
        by simp
      with tyenv_eq show ?thesis
        unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma â„›â‡©1_dma_eq:
  "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© âŸ¹ dma memâ‡©1 = dma memâ‡©2"
  apply(drule â„›â‡©1_mem_eq)
  apply(erule low_mds_eq_dma)
  done


(* â„› meets the criteria of a "simple bisim"
   which can be used to simplify the establishment of a refinement relation *)
lemma bisim_simple_â„›â‡©1:
  "âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ¹ c = c'"
  apply(cases rule: â„›â‡©1.cases, simp+)
  done

lemma bisim_simple_â„›â‡©3:
  "lc â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ lc' âŸ¹ (fst (fst lc)) = (fst (fst lc'))"
  apply(induct rule: â„›â‡©3_aux.induct)
  using bisim_simple_â„›â‡©1 apply clarsimp
  apply simp
  done

lemma bisim_simple_â„›â‡©u:
  "lc â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ lc' âŸ¹ (fst (fst lc)) = (fst (fst lc'))"
  apply(induct rule: â„›.induct)
   apply clarsimp
   apply(cases rule: â„›â‡©1.cases, simp+)
  apply(cases rule: â„›â‡©3_aux.cases, simp+)
   apply blast
  using bisim_simple_â„›â‡©3 apply clarsimp
  done


(* To prove that â„› is a bisimulation, we first show symmetry *)

lemma ğ’_eq_type_max_eq:
  assumes wf: "type_wellformed t"
  assumes ğ’_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x" 
  shows "type_max t memâ‡©1 = type_max t memâ‡©2"
proof -
  have "âˆ€xâˆˆvars_of_type t. memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
    using wf ğ’_eq unfolding type_wellformed_def by blast
  thus ?thesis
    unfolding type_max_def using eval_vars_detâ‡©B by fastforce
qed

lemma vars_of_type_eq_type_max_eq:
  assumes mem_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆvars_of_type t. memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x" 
  shows "type_max t memâ‡©1 = type_max t memâ‡©2"
proof -
  from assms show ?thesis
    unfolding type_max_def using eval_vars_detâ‡©B by fastforce
qed

lemma â„›â‡©1_sym: "sym (â„›â‡©1 Î“' ğ’®' P')"
unfolding sym_def
proof clarsimp
  fix c mds mem c' mds' mem'
  assume in_â„›â‡©1: "âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©"
  then obtain Î“ ğ’® P where
  stuff: "c' = c"  "mds' = mds"  "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {c} Î“',ğ’®',P'"  "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
  "mem =â‡˜Î“â‡™ mem'" "pred P mem" "pred P mem'"
  "âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“. x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“ x)) mem â‰¤ dma mem x"
    using â„›â‡©1_elim' by blast+
  from stuff have stuff': "mem' =â‡˜Î“â‡™ mem"
    by (metis tyenv_eq_sym)
  
  have "âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“. x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“ x)) mem' â‰¤ dma mem' x"
  proof -
    from in_â„›â‡©1 have "dma mem = dma mem'"
      using â„›â‡©1_dma_eq stuff by metis
    moreover have "âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“. type_max (the (Î“ x)) mem = type_max (the (Î“ x)) mem'"
    proof
      fix x
      assume "x âˆˆ dom Î“"
      hence "type_wellformed (the (Î“ x))"
        using â€¹tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® Pâ€º
        by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
      moreover have "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. mem x = mem' x"
        using in_â„›â‡©1 â„›â‡©1_mem_eq ğ’_Low stuff
        unfolding low_mds_eq_def by auto
      ultimately
      show "type_max (the (Î“ x)) mem = type_max (the (Î“ x)) mem'"
        using ğ’_eq_type_max_eq by blast
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using stuff(8) by fastforce
  qed
  with stuff stuff'
  show "âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©"
  by (metis (no_types) â„›â‡©1.intro)
qed

lemma â„›â‡©3_sym: "sym (â„›â‡©3 Î“ ğ’® P)"
  unfolding sym_def
proof (clarify)
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 mds' memâ‡©2
  assume asm: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds', memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  hence [simp]: "mds' = mds"
    using â„›â‡©3_elim' by blast
  from asm show "âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds', memâ‡©2âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©"
    apply auto
    apply (induct rule: â„›â‡©3_aux.induct)
     apply (metis (lifting) â„›â‡©1_sym â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©1 symD)
    by (metis (lifting) â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©3)
qed

lemma â„›_mds [simp]: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds', memâ‡©2âŸ© âŸ¹ mds = mds'"
  apply (rule â„›_elim')
     apply (auto)
   apply (metis â„›â‡©1_elim')
  apply (insert â„›â‡©3_elim')
  by blast

lemma â„›_sym: "sym (â„› Î“ ğ’® P)"
  unfolding sym_def
proof (clarify)
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 mdsâ‡©2 memâ‡©2
  assume asm: "(âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ â„› Î“ ğ’® P"
  with â„›_mds have [simp]: "mdsâ‡©2 = mds"
    by blast
  from asm show "(âŸ¨câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2, memâ‡©2âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©) âˆˆ â„› Î“ ğ’® P"
    using â„›.introâ‡©1 [of Î“ ğ’® P] and â„›.introâ‡©3 [of _ Î“ ğ’® P]
    using â„›â‡©1_sym [of Î“] and â„›â‡©3_sym [of Î“]
    apply simp
    apply (erule â„›_elim)
      by (auto simp: sym_def)
qed

(* Next, we show that the relations are closed under globally consistent changes *)

lemma â„›â‡©1_closed_glob_consistent: "closed_glob_consistent (â„›â‡©1 Î“' ğ’®' P')"
  unfolding closed_glob_consistent_def
proof (clarify)
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 A
  assume R1: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  hence [simp]: "câ‡©2 = câ‡©1" by blast
  assume A_updates_vars: "âˆ€x. case A x of None â‡’ True | Some (v, v') â‡’ memâ‡©1 x â‰  v âˆ¨ memâ‡©2 x â‰  v' âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds x"
  assume A_updates_dma: "âˆ€x. dma memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x â‰  dma memâ‡©1 x âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds x"
  assume A_updates_sec: "âˆ€x. dma memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = Low âˆ§ (x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âˆ¨ x âˆˆ ğ’) âŸ¶ memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A] x"
  from R1 obtain Î“ ğ’® P where Î“_props: "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { câ‡©1 } Î“',ğ’®',P'" "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2" "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
                                      "pred P memâ‡©1" "pred P memâ‡©2"
                                      "âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“. x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“ x)) memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 x"
    by force

  from Î“_props(3) have stable_not_written: "âˆ€x. stable ğ’® x âŸ¶ var_asm_not_written mds x"
    by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def stable_def var_asm_not_written_def)
  with A_updates_vars have stable_unchangedâ‡©1: "âˆ€x. stable ğ’® x âŸ¶ (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) x = memâ‡©1 x" and
                           stable_unchangedâ‡©2: "âˆ€x. stable ğ’® x âŸ¶ (memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A]) x = memâ‡©2 x"
    by(auto simp: apply_adaptation_def split: option.splits)

  from stable_not_written A_updates_dma 
  have stable_unchanged_dmaâ‡©1: "âˆ€x. stable ğ’® x âŸ¶ dma (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) x = dma memâ‡©1 x"
    by(blast)

  have tyenv_eq': "memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A]"
  proof(clarsimp simp: tyenv_eq_def)
    fix x
    assume a: "type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] = Low"
    show "memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A] x"
    proof(cases "x âˆˆ dom Î“")
      assume in_dom: "x âˆˆ dom Î“"
      with Î“_props(3) have "var_asm_not_written mds x"
        by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def var_asm_not_written_def stable_def)
      hence [simp]: "memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = memâ‡©1 x" and [simp]: "memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A] x = memâ‡©2 x"
        using A_updates_vars by(auto simp: apply_adaptation_def split: option.splits)
      from in_dom a obtain tâ‡©x where Î“â‡©x: "Î“ x = Some tâ‡©x" and tâ‡©x_Low': "type_max tâ‡©x (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) = Low"
        by(auto simp: to_total_def)
      have tâ‡©x_unchanged: "type_max tâ‡©x (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A])  = type_max tâ‡©x memâ‡©1"
      proof - 
        from Î“â‡©x Î“_props(3) have tâ‡©x_stable: "type_stable ğ’® tâ‡©x" and tâ‡©x_wellformed: "type_wellformed tâ‡©x"
          by(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_stable_def types_wellformed_def)+
        from tâ‡©x_stable tâ‡©x_wellformed stable_unchangedâ‡©1 show ?thesis
          using type_stable_is_sufficient'
          by blast
      qed
      with tâ‡©x_Low' have tâ‡©x_Low: "type_max tâ‡©x memâ‡©1 = Low" by simp
      with Î“â‡©x Î“_props(2) have "memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
        by(force simp: tyenv_eq_def to_total_def split: if_splits)
      thus ?thesis by simp
    next
      assume nin_dom: "x âˆ‰ dom Î“"
      with a have is_Low': "dma (memâ‡©1[âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) x = Low"
        by(simp add: to_total_def)
      show ?thesis
      proof(cases "x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âˆ¨ x âˆˆ ğ’")
        assume "x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âˆ¨ x âˆˆ ğ’"
        with is_Low' show ?thesis
          using A_updates_sec by blast
      next
        assume "Â¬ (x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âˆ¨ x âˆˆ ğ’)"
        hence "x âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite" and "x âˆ‰ ğ’"
          by auto
        with nin_dom Î“_props(3) have "False"
          by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def stable_def)
        thus ?thesis by blast
      qed
    qed
  qed
  
  have sec': "âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“. x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“ x)) (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) â‰¤ dma (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) x"
  proof(intro ballI impI)
    fix x
    assume readable: "x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    assume in_dom: "x âˆˆ dom Î“"
    with Î“_props(3) have "var_asm_not_written mds x"
      by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def var_asm_not_written_def stable_def)
    hence [simp]: "dma memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = dma memâ‡©1 x"
      using A_updates_dma by(auto simp: apply_adaptation_def split: option.splits)
    from in_dom obtain tâ‡©x where Î“â‡©x: "Î“ x = Some tâ‡©x"
      by(auto simp: to_total_def)
    have tâ‡©x_unchanged: "type_max tâ‡©x (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A])  = type_max tâ‡©x memâ‡©1"
    proof - 
      from Î“â‡©x Î“_props(3) have tâ‡©x_stable: "type_stable ğ’® tâ‡©x" and tâ‡©x_wellformed: "type_wellformed tâ‡©x"
        by(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_stable_def types_wellformed_def)+
      from tâ‡©x_stable tâ‡©x_wellformed stable_unchangedâ‡©1 show ?thesis
        using type_stable_is_sufficient'
        by blast
    qed
    with Î“â‡©x have [simp]:"type_max (the (Î“ x)) (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) = type_max (the (Î“ x)) memâ‡©1"
      by simp
    show "type_max (the (Î“ x)) memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x "
      apply simp
      using in_dom readable Î“_props by metis
  qed
    
  from stable_unchangedâ‡©1 stable_unchangedâ‡©2 Î“_props(3) have "âˆ€pâˆˆP. evâ‡©B (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) p = evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 p âˆ§ evâ‡©B (memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A]) p = evâ‡©B memâ‡©2 p"
    apply(intro ballI)
    apply(rule conjI)
    by(rule eval_vars_detâ‡©B,force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def stable_def)+
    
  hence "pred P (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) = pred P memâ‡©1" and
        "pred P (memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A]) = pred P memâ‡©2"
    by(simp add: pred_def)+
  
  with Î“_props tyenv_eq' sec'
  show "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A]âŸ©"
    by auto
qed


lemma â„›â‡©3_closed_glob_consistent:
  "closed_glob_consistent (â„›â‡©3 Î“' ğ’®' P')"
unfolding closed_glob_consistent_def
proof(clarsimp)
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 A
  assume in_â„›â‡©3: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  assume A_modifies_vars: "âˆ€x. case A x of None â‡’ True | Some (v, v') â‡’ memâ‡©1 x â‰  v âˆ¨ memâ‡©2 x â‰  v' âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds x"
  assume A_modifies_dma: "âˆ€x. dma memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x â‰  dma memâ‡©1 x âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds x"
  assume A_modifies_sec: "âˆ€x. dma memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = Low âˆ§ (x âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ x âˆˆ ğ’) âŸ¶ memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A] x"
  (* do a bit of massaging to get the goal state set-up nicely for the induction rule *)
  define lcâ‡©1 where "lcâ‡©1 â‰¡ âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©"
  define lcâ‡©2 where "lcâ‡©2 â‰¡ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  from lcâ‡©1_def lcâ‡©2_def in_â„›â‡©3 have "lcâ‡©1 â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ lcâ‡©2" by simp
  from this lcâ‡©1_def lcâ‡©2_def A_modifies_vars A_modifies_dma A_modifies_sec
  show "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A]âŸ©"
  proof(induct arbitrary: câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 mds memâ‡©2 rule: â„›â‡©3_aux.induct)
    case (introâ‡©1 câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 c Î“' ğ’®' P')
    show ?case
      apply (rule â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©1[OF _ introâ‡©1(2)])
      using â„›â‡©1_closed_glob_consistent introâ‡©1
      unfolding closed_glob_consistent_def by blast
  next
    case (introâ‡©3 câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 c Î“' ğ’®' P')
    show ?case
      apply(rule â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©3)
      apply(rule introâ‡©3(2))
      using introâ‡©3 apply simp+
      done
  qed
qed


lemma â„›_closed_glob_consistent: "closed_glob_consistent (â„› Î“' ğ’®' P')"
  unfolding closed_glob_consistent_def
proof (clarify, erule â„›_elim, simp_all)
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 A
  assume R1: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  and A_modifies_vars: "âˆ€x. case A x of None â‡’ True | Some (v, v') â‡’ memâ‡©1 x â‰  v âˆ¨ memâ‡©2 x â‰  v' âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds x"
  and A_modifies_dma: "âˆ€x. dma (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) x â‰  dma memâ‡©1 x âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds x"
  and A_modifies_sec: "âˆ€x. dma memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = Low âˆ§ (x âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ x âˆˆ ğ’) âŸ¶ memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A] x"  
  show
    "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A]âŸ©"
    apply(rule introâ‡©1)
    apply clarify
    using â„›â‡©1_closed_glob_consistent unfolding closed_glob_consistent_def
    using R1 A_modifies_vars A_modifies_dma A_modifies_sec
    by blast
next
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 x A
  assume R3: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  and A_modifies_vars: "âˆ€x. case A x of None â‡’ True | Some (v, v') â‡’ memâ‡©1 x â‰  v âˆ¨ memâ‡©2 x â‰  v' âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds x"
  and A_modifies_dma: "âˆ€x. dma (memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]) x â‰  dma memâ‡©1 x âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds x"
  and A_modifies_sec: "âˆ€x. dma memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = Low âˆ§ (x âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ x âˆˆ ğ’) âŸ¶ memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A] x"
  show "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1 [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2 [âˆ¥â‡©2 A]âŸ© "
    apply(rule introâ‡©3)
    using â„›â‡©3_closed_glob_consistent unfolding closed_glob_consistent_def
    using R3 A_modifies_vars A_modifies_dma A_modifies_sec
    by blast
qed

(* It now remains to show that steps of the first of two related configurations
    can be matched by the second: *)

(* Some technical lemmas: *)
lemma mode_update_add_anno:
  "mds_consistent mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¹ 
   mds_consistent (update_modes upd mds) 
                  (Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® upd) 
                  (add_anno_stable ğ’® upd) 
                  (P |` {v. stable (add_anno_stable ğ’® upd) v})"
  apply(case_tac upd)
   apply(rename_tac v m)
   apply(case_tac m)
      apply((clarsimp simp: add_anno_def mds_consistent_def stable_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def | safe | fastforce)+)[4]
  apply(rename_tac v m)
  apply(case_tac m)
     apply((clarsimp simp: add_anno_def mds_consistent_def stable_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def | safe | fastforce)+)[4]
  done

lemma add_anno_acq_GuarNoReadOrWrite [simp]:
  "Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® (v +=â‡©m GuarNoReadOrWrite) = Î“"
  apply(clarsimp simp: add_anno_def to_total_def restrict_map_def)
  apply(rule ext)
  apply(clarsimp | safe)+
  by (metis option.collapse prod.collapse)

lemma add_anno_rel_GuarNoReadOrWrite [simp]:
  "Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® (v -=â‡©m GuarNoReadOrWrite) = Î“"
  apply(clarsimp simp: add_anno_def to_total_def restrict_map_def)
  apply(rule ext)
  apply(clarsimp | safe)+
  by (metis option.collapse)

lemma add_anno_acq_GuarNoWrite [simp]:
  "Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® (v +=â‡©m GuarNoWrite) = Î“"
  apply(clarsimp simp: add_anno_def to_total_def restrict_map_def)
  apply(rule ext)
  apply(clarsimp | safe)+
  by (metis option.collapse prod.collapse)

lemma add_anno_rel_GuarNoWrite [simp]:
  "Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® (v -=â‡©m GuarNoWrite) = Î“"
  apply(clarsimp simp: add_anno_def to_total_def restrict_map_def)
  apply(rule ext)
  apply(clarsimp | safe)+
  by (metis option.collapse)

lemma dom_add_anno_rel:
  "âˆ€xâˆˆdom (Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® (v -=â‡©m m)). (Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® (v -=â‡©m m)) x = Î“ x"
  apply(clarsimp simp: add_anno_def to_total_def restrict_map_def split: if_splits)
  apply(case_tac m)
  apply(auto split: if_splits)
  done

lemma types_wellformed_mode_update:
  "types_wellformed Î“ âŸ¹
   types_wellformed (Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® upd)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: types_wellformed_def)
  apply(case_tac upd)
   apply(rename_tac v t v' m)
   apply(case_tac m)
      apply clarsimp
      apply(case_tac "v' âˆˆ dom Î“ âˆ¨ v' âˆˆ ğ’")
       apply(clarsimp, force)
      apply(simp split: if_splits)
       apply(drule sym, fastforce)
      apply(clarsimp | force )+
     apply(case_tac "v' âˆˆ dom Î“ âˆ¨ v' âˆˆ ğ’")
      apply clarsimp
      apply force
     apply(simp split: if_splits)
      apply(drule sym, fastforce)
     apply(clarsimp | force)+
  using dom_add_anno_rel[THEN bspec, OF domI]
  apply (metis domI option.sel)
  done
  
(* TODO: consider putting this proof into Isar so we can explain the reasoning behind the
   anno_type_stable predicate *)
lemma types_stable_mode_update:
   "types_stable Î“ ğ’® âŸ¹ types_wellformed Î“ âŸ¹ anno_type_stable Î“ ğ’® upd
    âŸ¹ types_stable (Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® upd) (add_anno_stable ğ’® upd)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: types_stable_def)
  apply(rename_tac x c f C)
  apply(case_tac upd)
   apply(rename_tac v m)
   apply(case_tac m)
      apply clarsimp
      apply(case_tac "v âˆˆ dom Î“ âˆ¨ v âˆˆ ğ’")
       apply clarsimp
       apply(force simp: stable_def)
      apply(simp split: if_splits)
       using ğ’_vars_correct
       apply(fastforce simp:  anno_type_stable_def stable_def)
      apply(force simp: stable_def)
     apply clarsimp
     apply(case_tac "v âˆˆ dom Î“ âˆ¨ v âˆˆ ğ’")
      apply clarsimp
      apply(force simp: stable_def)
     apply(simp split: if_splits)
      using ğ’_vars_correct
      apply(fastforce simp: anno_type_stable_def stable_def)
     apply(force simp: stable_def)
    apply(force simp: stable_def)
   apply(force simp: stable_def)
  apply(rename_tac v m)
  apply(subgoal_tac "Î“ x = Some (C)")
   prefer 2
   using dom_add_anno_rel
   apply (metis domI)
  apply(case_tac m)
     apply(clarsimp simp: anno_type_stable_def split: if_splits)
      apply(clarsimp simp: stable_def types_wellformed_def type_wellformed_def)
      using ğ’_vars_correct
      apply (metis (mono_tags, lifting) UN_I contra_subsetD domI option.sel)
     apply(clarsimp simp: stable_def types_wellformed_def type_wellformed_def)
     using ğ’_vars_correct
     apply (metis (mono_tags, lifting) UN_I contra_subsetD domI option.sel)
    apply(clarsimp simp: anno_type_stable_def split: if_splits)
     apply(clarsimp simp: stable_def types_wellformed_def type_wellformed_def)
     apply (metis (mono_tags, lifting) UN_I contra_subsetD domI option.sel)
    apply(clarsimp simp: stable_def)
    apply (metis (no_types, lifting) domI option.sel snd_conv subsetD type_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
   apply(clarsimp simp: anno_type_stable_def split: if_splits)
   apply(clarsimp simp: stable_def)
   apply (metis (no_types, lifting) domI option.sel snd_conv subsetD type_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
  apply(clarsimp simp: stable_def)
  apply (metis (no_types, lifting) domI option.sel snd_conv subsetD type_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
  done  
     
     
lemma tyenv_wellformed_mode_update:
  "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¹ anno_type_stable Î“ ğ’® upd âŸ¹
   tyenv_wellformed (update_modes upd mds) 
                  (Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® upd) 
                  (add_anno_stable ğ’® upd) 
                  (P |` {v. stable (add_anno_stable ğ’® upd) v})"
  apply(clarsimp simp: tyenv_wellformed_def)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(blast intro: mode_update_add_anno)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(blast intro: types_wellformed_mode_update)
  apply(blast intro: types_stable_mode_update)
  done


lemma stop_cxt :
  "âŸ¦ âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P' ; c = Stop âŸ§ âŸ¹ 
  context_equiv Î“ P Î“' âˆ§ ğ’®' = ğ’® âˆ§ P âŠ¢ P' âˆ§ (âˆ€mds. tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds Î“' ğ’® P')"
  apply (induct rule: has_type.induct)
          apply (auto intro: context_equiv_trans context_equiv_entailment pred_entailment_trans)
  done

lemma tyenv_wellformed_preds_update:
  "P' = P'' |` {v. stable ğ’® v} âŸ¹
  tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¹ tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P'"
  apply(clarsimp simp: tyenv_wellformed_def)
  apply(clarsimp simp: mds_consistent_def)
  apply(auto simp: restrict_preds_to_vars_def add_pred_def split: if_splits)
  done


lemma mds_consistent_preds_tyenv_update:
  "P' = P'' |` {v. stable ğ’® v} âŸ¹ v âˆˆ dom Î“ âŸ¹
  mds_consistent mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¹ mds_consistent mds (Î“(v â†¦ t)) ğ’® P'"
  apply(clarsimp simp: mds_consistent_def)
  apply(auto simp: restrict_preds_to_vars_def add_pred_def split: if_splits)
  done


lemma pred_preds_update:
  assumes mem'_def: "mem' = mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e)" 
  assumes P'_def: "P' = (assign_post P x e) |` {v. stable ğ’® v}"
  assumes pred_P: "pred P mem" 
  shows "pred P' mem'"
proof -
  from P'_def have P'_def': "P' âŠ† assign_post P x e"
    by(auto simp: restrict_preds_to_vars_def add_pred_def split: if_splits)
  have "pred (assign_post P x e) mem'"
    using assign_post_valid pred_P mem'_def by blast
  with P'_def' show ?thesis
    unfolding pred_def by blast
qed

lemma types_wellformed_update:
  "types_wellformed Î“ âŸ¹ type_wellformed t âŸ¹ types_wellformed (Î“(x â†¦ t))"
  by(auto simp: types_wellformed_def)

lemma types_stable_update:
  "types_stable Î“ ğ’® âŸ¹ type_stable ğ’® t âŸ¹ types_stable (Î“(x â†¦ t)) ğ’®"
  by(auto simp: types_stable_def)
  
lemma tyenv_wellformed_sub:
  "âŸ¦Pâ‡©1 âŠ† Pâ‡©2;
  Î“â‡©2 = Î“â‡©1; tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©2 ğ’® Pâ‡©2âŸ§ âŸ¹
     tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1"
  apply(clarsimp simp: tyenv_wellformed_def | safe)+
  apply(fastforce simp: mds_consistent_def)
  done

abbreviation
  tyenv_sec :: "'Var Mds â‡’ ('Var,'BExp) TyEnv â‡’ ('Var,'Val) Mem â‡’ bool"
where
  "tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem â‰¡ âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“. xâˆ‰mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“ x)) mem â‰¤ dma mem x"

lemma tyenv_sec_mode_update:
  "(âˆ€x.  (to_total Î“ x) â‰¤:â‡©P''  (to_total Î“'' x)) âŸ¹ pred P'' mem âŸ¹ ğ’® = (mds AsmNoWrite, mds AsmNoReadOrWrite) âŸ¹
    anno_type_sec Î“ ğ’® P upd âŸ¹ ğ’®'' = add_anno_stable ğ’® upd âŸ¹ (âˆ€pâˆˆP. âˆ€vâˆˆbexp_vars p. stable ğ’® v) âŸ¹
  P'' = P |` {v. stable ğ’®'' v} âŸ¹
    Î“'' = Î“ âŠ•â‡©ğ’® upd âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¹ tyenv_sec (update_modes upd mds) Î“'' mem"
  apply(case_tac upd)
   apply(rename_tac v m)
   apply(case_tac m)
    apply(auto simp: add_anno_def to_total_def)[4]
  apply(rename_tac v m)
  apply(case_tac m)
    apply(subgoal_tac "v âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite âŸ¶ P'' = P")
    by(auto simp: add_anno_def to_total_def dest: subtype_sound split: if_splits simp: anno_type_sec_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def stable_def)


lemma tyenv_sec_eq:
  "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. mem x = mem' x âŸ¹ types_wellformed Î“ âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem = tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem'"
  apply(rule ball_cong[OF HOL.refl])
  apply(rename_tac x)
  apply(rule imp_cong[OF HOL.refl])
  apply(subgoal_tac "type_max (the (Î“ x)) mem = type_max (the (Î“ x)) mem'")
   using dma_ğ’ apply fastforce
  apply(force intro: ğ’_eq_type_max_eq simp: types_wellformed_def)
  done

lemma context_equiv_tyenv_sec:
  "context_equiv Î“â‡©2 Pâ‡©2 Î“â‡©1 âŸ¹
    pred Pâ‡©2 mem âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©2 mem âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©1 mem"
   apply(clarsimp simp: context_equiv_def type_equiv_def)
   apply(rename_tac x y)
   apply(rule_tac y="type_max (the (Î“â‡©2 x)) mem" in order_trans)
    apply(rule subtype_sound[rule_format])
     apply force
    apply assumption
   apply force
   done

lemma add_pred_entailment:
  "P +â‡©ğ’® p âŠ¢ P"
  apply(rule subset_entailment)
  apply(rule add_pred_subset)
  done


lemma preservation_no_await: 
  "âŸ¦âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P';
    âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â†  âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©;
    no_await câŸ§ âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒ Î“'' ğ’®'' P''. (âŠ¢ Î“'',ğ’®'',P'' { c' } Î“',ğ’®',P') âˆ§ 
         (tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ 
           tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' âˆ§ 
           pred P'' mem' âˆ§ 
           tyenv_sec mds' Î“'' mem')"
proof (induct arbitrary: c' mds rule: has_type.induct)
  
  case (anno_type Î“'' Î“ ğ’® upd ğ’®'' P'' P câ‡©1 Î“' ğ’®' P')
  hence step: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, update_modes upd mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©"
    by (metis upd_elim)
  from â€¹no_await (câ‡©1@[upd])â€º no_await.cases have "no_await câ‡©1" by fast
  with step anno_type(5) obtain Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' where
    "âŠ¢ Î“''',ğ’®''',P''' { c' } Î“',ğ’®',P' âˆ§ 
    (tyenv_wellformed (update_modes upd mds) Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' âˆ§ pred P'' mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec (update_modes upd mds) Î“'' mem âŸ¶
       tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' âˆ§ pred P''' mem' âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds' Î“''' mem')"
    by blast
  moreover
  have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed (update_modes upd mds) Î“'' ğ’®'' P''"
    using anno_type
    apply auto
    by (metis tyenv_wellformed_mode_update)
  moreover
  have pred: "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P'' mem"
    using anno_type
    by (auto simp: pred_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  moreover
  have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ tyenv_sec (update_modes upd mds) Î“'' mem"
    apply(rule impI)
    apply(rule tyenv_sec_mode_update)
            using anno_type apply fastforce
           using anno_type pred apply fastforce
          using anno_type apply fastforce
         using anno_type apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
        using anno_type apply fastforce
       apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
     using anno_type apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
    by simp  
  ultimately show ?case
    by blast
next
  case stop_type
  with stop_no_eval show ?case by auto
next
  case skip_type
  hence "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem"
    by (metis skip_elim)
  thus ?case
    by (metis stop_type)
next
  case (assignâ‡©1 x Î“ e t P P' ğ’® c' mds)
  hence upd: "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e)"
    by (metis assign_elim)
  from assignâ‡©1(2) upd have ğ’_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. mem x = mem' x"
    by auto
  from upd have " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P' {c'} Î“,ğ’®,P'"
    by (metis stop_type)
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® P'"
    using upd tyenv_wellformed_preds_update assignâ‡©1 by metis
  moreover have "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P' mem'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©1 upd by metis
    
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P  âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem'"
    using tyenv_sec_eq[OF ğ’_eq, where Î“=Î“]
    unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
  ultimately show ?case
    by (metis upd)
next
  case (assignâ‡©2 x Î“ e t ğ’® P' P c' mds)
  hence upd: "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e)"
    by (metis assign_elim)
  let ?Î“' = "Î“ (x â†¦ t)"
  from upd have ty: " âŠ¢ ?Î“',ğ’®,P' {c'} ?Î“',ğ’®,P'"
    by (metis stop_type)
  have wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' ?Î“' ğ’® P'"
  proof
    assume tyenv_wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    hence wf: "types_wellformed Î“"
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    hence  "type_wellformed t"
      using assignâ‡©2(2) type_aexpr_type_wellformed
      by blast
    with wf have wf': "types_wellformed ?Î“'"
      using types_wellformed_update by metis
    from tyenv_wf have stable': "types_stable ?Î“' ğ’®"
      using types_stable_update
            assignâ‡©2(3)
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    have m: "mds_consistent mds Î“ ğ’® P"
      using tyenv_wf unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    from assignâ‡©2(4) assignâ‡©2(1)
    have "mds_consistent mds' (Î“(x â†¦ t)) ğ’® P'"
      apply(rule mds_consistent_preds_tyenv_update)
      using upd m by simp
    from wf' stable' this show "tyenv_wellformed mds' ?Î“' ğ’® P'"
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
  qed
  have p: "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P' mem'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©2 upd by metis
  have sec: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¹ pred P mem âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds' ?Î“' mem'"
  proof(clarify)
    assume wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    assume pred: "pred P mem"
    assume sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem"
    from pred p have pred': "pred P' mem'" by blast
    fix v t'
    assume Î“v: "(Î“(x â†¦ t)) v = Some t'"
    assume "v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    show "type_max (the ((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v)) mem' â‰¤ dma mem' v"
    proof(cases "v = x")
      assume [simp]: "v = x"
      hence [simp]: "(the ((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v)) = t" and t_def: "t = t'"
        using Î“v by auto
      from â€¹v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWriteâ€º upd wf have readable: "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®"
        by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      with assignâ‡©2(5) have "t â‰¤:â‡©P' (dma_type x)" by fastforce
      with pred' show ?thesis
        using type_max_dma_type subtype_correct
        by fastforce
    next
      assume neq: "v â‰  x"
      hence [simp]: "((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v) = Î“ v"
        by simp
      with Î“v have Î“v: "Î“ v = Some t'" by simp
      with sec upd â€¹v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWriteâ€º have f_leq: "type_max t' mem â‰¤ dma mem v"
        by auto
      have ğ’_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. mem x = mem' x"
        using wf assignâ‡©2(1) upd by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      hence dma_eq: "dma mem = dma mem'"
        by(rule dma_ğ’)
      have f_eq: "type_max t' mem = type_max t' mem'"
        apply(rule ğ’_eq_type_max_eq)
         using Î“v wf apply(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
        by(rule ğ’_eq)     
      from neq Î“v f_leq dma_eq f_eq show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed
  from ty wf p sec show ?case
    by blast
next
  case (assignâ‡©ğ’ x Î“ e t P P' ğ’® c' mds)
  (* this case follows from the same argument as assignâ‡©1 *)
  hence upd: "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e)"
    by (metis assign_elim)
  hence " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P' {c'} Î“,ğ’®,P'"
    by (metis stop_type)
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® P'"
    using upd tyenv_wellformed_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ by metis
  moreover have "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P' mem'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ upd by metis
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds' Î“ mem'"
  proof(clarify)
    fix v t'
    assume wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    assume pred: "pred P mem"
    hence pred': "pred P' mem'" using â€¹pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P' mem'â€º by blast
    assume sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem"
    assume Î“v: "Î“ v = Some t'"
    assume readable': "v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    with upd have readable: "v âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite" by simp
    with wf have "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®" by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
    show "type_max (the (Î“ v)) mem' â‰¤ dma mem' v"
    proof(cases "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v")
      assume "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v"
      with assignâ‡©ğ’(6) â€¹v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®â€º have "(to_total Î“ v) â‰¤:â‡©P' (dma_type v)" by blast
      from pred' Î“v subtype_correct this show ?thesis
        using type_max_dma_type by(auto simp: to_total_def split: if_splits)
    next
      assume "x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars v"
      hence "âˆ€v'âˆˆğ’_vars v. mem v' = mem' v'"
        using upd by auto
      hence dma_eq: "dma mem v = dma mem' v"
        by(rule dma_ğ’_vars)
      from Î“v assignâ‡©ğ’(4) have "x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'" by force
      have "type_wellformed t'"
        using wf Î“v by(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
      with â€¹x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'â€º upd have f_eq: "type_max t' mem = type_max t' mem'"
        using vars_of_type_eq_type_max_eq by fastforce
      from sec Î“v readable have "type_max t' mem â‰¤ dma mem v"
        by auto
      with f_eq dma_eq Î“v show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed
  ultimately show ?case
    by (metis)
next
  case (if_type Î“ e t P ğ’® th Î“' ğ’®' P' el Î“'' P'' Î“''' P''' c' mds)
  from if_type(13)
  show ?case
  proof(rule if_elim)
    assume [simp]: "evâ‡©B mem e" and [simp]: "c' = th" and [simp]: "mem' = mem" and [simp]: "mds' = mds"
    from if_type(3) have " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P +â‡©ğ’® e {c'} Î“',ğ’®',P'" by simp
    hence "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P +â‡©ğ’® e {c'} Î“''',ğ’®',P'''"
      apply(rule sub)
           apply simp+
         using if_type apply blast
        using if_type apply blast
       apply simp
      using if_type apply(blast intro: pred_entailment_trans)
      done
    moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® (P +â‡©ğ’® e)"
      by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def add_pred_def)
    moreover have "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred (P +â‡©ğ’® e) mem'"
      by(auto simp: pred_def add_pred_def)
    moreover have "tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ tyenv_sec mds' Î“ mem'"
      by(simp)
    ultimately show ?case by blast
  next
    assume [simp]: "Â¬ evâ‡©B mem e" and [simp]: "c' = el" and [simp]: "mem' = mem" and [simp]: "mds' = mds"
    from if_type(5) have " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P +â‡©ğ’® bexp_neg e {c'} Î“'',ğ’®',P''" by simp
    hence "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P +â‡©ğ’® bexp_neg e {c'} Î“''',ğ’®',P'''"
      apply(rule sub)
           apply simp+
         using if_type apply blast
        using if_type apply blast
       apply simp
      using if_type apply(blast intro: pred_entailment_trans)
      done
    moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® (P +â‡©ğ’® bexp_neg e)"
      by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def add_pred_def)
    moreover have "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred (P +â‡©ğ’® bexp_neg e) mem'"
      by(auto simp: pred_def add_pred_def bexp_neg_negates)
    moreover have "tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ tyenv_sec mds' Î“ mem'"
      by(simp)
    ultimately show ?case by blast
  qed
next
  case (while_type Î“ e t P ğ’® c c' mds)
  hence [simp]: "mds' = mds âˆ§ c' = If e (c ;; While e c) Stop âˆ§ mem' = mem"
    by (metis while_elim)
  have " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {c'} Î“,ğ’®,P"
    apply simp
    apply(rule if_type)
             apply(rule while_type(1))
            apply(rule while_type(2))
           apply(rule seq_type)
            apply(rule while_type(3))
           apply(rule has_type.while_type)
             apply(rule while_type(1))
            apply(rule while_type(2))
           apply(rule while_type(3))
          apply(rule stop_type)
         apply simp
        apply simp
       apply simp
      apply(rule add_pred_entailment)
      apply simp+
    by(blast intro!: tyenv_wellformed_subset add_pred_subset)
  thus ?case
    by fastforce
next
  case (seq_type Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©1 Î“â‡©1 ğ’®â‡©1 Pâ‡©1 câ‡©2 Î“â‡©2 ğ’®â‡©2 Pâ‡©2 c' mds)
  thus ?case
  proof (cases "câ‡©1 = Stop")
    assume [simp]: "câ‡©1 = Stop"
    with seq_type have [simp]: "mds' = mds" and [simp]: "c' = câ‡©2" and [simp]: "mem' = mem"
      by (metis seq_stop_elim)+
    have context_eq: "context_equiv Î“ P Î“â‡©1" and [simp]: "ğ’®â‡©1 = ğ’®" and entail: "P âŠ¢ Pâ‡©1" and
             wf_imp: "âˆ€mds. tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1"
      using stop_cxt seq_type(1) by simp+
    have "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {câ‡©2} Î“â‡©2,ğ’®â‡©2,Pâ‡©2"
      apply(rule sub)
            using seq_type(3) apply simp
           apply(rule context_eq)
          apply(rule wf_imp)
         apply simp+
       apply(rule entail)
      apply(rule pred_entailment_refl)
      done
    thus ?case
      by fastforce
  next
    assume "câ‡©1 â‰  Stop"
    then obtain câ‡©1' where step: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆ§ c' = (câ‡©1' ;; câ‡©2)"
      by (metis seq_elim seq_type.prems)
    then have "no_await câ‡©1" using â€¹no_await (câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2)â€º no_await.cases by blast
    then obtain Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' where "âŠ¢ Î“''',ğ’®''',P''' {câ‡©1'} Î“â‡©1,ğ’®â‡©1,Pâ‡©1 âˆ§
      (tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ 
       tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' âˆ§ pred P''' mem' âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds' Î“''' mem')"
      using step seq_type(2)
      by blast
    moreover
    from seq_type have "âŠ¢ Î“â‡©1,ğ’®â‡©1,Pâ‡©1 {câ‡©2} Î“â‡©2,ğ’®â‡©2,Pâ‡©2" by auto
    moreover
    ultimately show ?case
      apply (rule_tac x = Î“''' in exI)
      using â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆ§ c' = câ‡©1' ;; câ‡©2â€º by blast
  qed
next
  case (sub Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 c Î“â‡©1' ğ’®' Pâ‡©1' Î“â‡©2 Pâ‡©2 Î“â‡©2' Pâ‡©2' c' mds)
  then obtain Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' where stuff: "âŠ¢ Î“'',ğ’®'',P'' { c' } Î“â‡©1',ğ’®',Pâ‡©1' âˆ§
    (tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©1 mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©1 mem âŸ¶ 
     tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' âˆ§ pred P'' mem' âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds' Î“'' mem')"
    by force

  have imp: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©2 ğ’® Pâ‡©2 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©2 mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©2 mem âŸ¹ 
             tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©1 mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©1 mem"
    apply(rule conjI)
     using sub(5) sub(4) tyenv_wellformed_sub unfolding pred_def
     apply blast
    apply(rule conjI) 
     using local.pred_def pred_entailment_def sub.hyps(7) apply auto[1]
    using sub(3) context_equiv_tyenv_sec unfolding pred_def by blast
  show ?case
    apply (rule_tac x = Î“'' in exI, rule_tac x = "ğ’®''" in exI, rule_tac x="P''" in exI)  
    apply (rule conjI)
     apply(rule has_type.sub)
           apply(rule stuff[THEN conjunct1])
          apply simp+
        apply(rule sub(5))
       apply(rule sub(6))
      apply simp
     using sub apply blast
    using imp stuff apply blast
   done
next
  case (await_type Î“ e t P ğ’® c Î“' ğ’®' P' c' mds)
    show ?case using no_await_no_await await_type.prems by blast 
qed


lemma preservation_no_await_plus: 
  "âŸ¦âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©;
    âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P';
    no_await câŸ§ âŸ¹ 
     no_await c' âˆ§ (âˆƒ Î“'' ğ’®'' P''. (âŠ¢ Î“'',ğ’®'',P'' { c' } Î“',ğ’®',P') âˆ§ 
     (tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ 
     tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' âˆ§ pred P'' mem' âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds' Î“'' mem'))"
  apply (induct arbitrary: Î“ ğ’® P rule: my_trancl_step_induct3)
   using preservation_no_await no_await_trans apply fast
  using preservation_no_await no_await_trans by metis 

(* First we show that (roughly) typeability is preserved by evaluation steps *)
lemma preservation:
  assumes typed: "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P'"
  assumes eval: "âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©"
  shows "âˆƒ Î“'' ğ’®'' P''. (âŠ¢ Î“'',ğ’®'',P'' { c' } Î“',ğ’®',P') âˆ§ 
                    (tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ 
                      tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' âˆ§ pred P'' mem' âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds' Î“'' mem')"
  using typed eval
proof (induct arbitrary: c' mds rule: has_type.induct)

  case (anno_type Î“'' Î“ ğ’® upd ğ’®'' P'' P câ‡©1 Î“' ğ’®' P')
  hence "âŸ¨câ‡©1, update_modes upd mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©"
    by (metis upd_elim)
  with anno_type(5) obtain Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' where
    "âŠ¢ Î“''',ğ’®''',P''' { c' } Î“',ğ’®',P' âˆ§ 
    (tyenv_wellformed (update_modes upd mds) Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' âˆ§ pred P'' mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec (update_modes upd mds) Î“'' mem âŸ¶
       tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' âˆ§ pred P''' mem' âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds' Î“''' mem')"
    by blast

  moreover
  have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed (update_modes upd mds) Î“'' ğ’®'' P''"
    using anno_type
    apply auto
    by (metis tyenv_wellformed_mode_update)
  moreover
  have pred: "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P'' mem"
    using anno_type
    by (auto simp: pred_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  moreover
  have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ tyenv_sec (update_modes upd mds) Î“'' mem"
    apply(rule impI)
    apply(rule tyenv_sec_mode_update)
            using anno_type apply fastforce
           using anno_type pred apply fastforce
          using anno_type apply fastforce
         using anno_type apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
        using anno_type apply fastforce
       apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
     using anno_type apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
    by simp  
  ultimately show ?case
    by blast
next
  case stop_type
  with stop_no_eval show ?case ..
next
  case skip_type
  hence "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem"
    by (metis skip_elim)
  thus ?case
    by (metis stop_type)
next
  case (assignâ‡©1 x Î“ e t P P' ğ’® c' mds)
  hence upd: "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e)"
    by (metis assign_elim)
  from assignâ‡©1(2) upd have ğ’_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. mem x = mem' x"
    by auto
  from upd have " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P' {c'} Î“,ğ’®,P'"
    by (metis stop_type)
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® P'"
    using upd tyenv_wellformed_preds_update assignâ‡©1 by metis
  moreover have "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P' mem'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©1 upd by metis
    
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P  âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem'"
    using tyenv_sec_eq[OF ğ’_eq, where Î“=Î“]
    unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
  ultimately show ?case
    by (metis upd)
next
  case (assignâ‡©2 x Î“ e t ğ’® P' P c' mds)
  hence upd: "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e)"
    by (metis assign_elim)
  let ?Î“' = "Î“ (x â†¦ t)"
  from upd have ty: " âŠ¢ ?Î“',ğ’®,P' {c'} ?Î“',ğ’®,P'"
    by (metis stop_type)
  have wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' ?Î“' ğ’® P'"
  proof
    assume tyenv_wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    hence wf: "types_wellformed Î“"
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    hence  "type_wellformed t"
      using assignâ‡©2(2) type_aexpr_type_wellformed
      by blast
    with wf have wf': "types_wellformed ?Î“'"
      using types_wellformed_update by metis
    from tyenv_wf have stable': "types_stable ?Î“' ğ’®"
      using types_stable_update
            assignâ‡©2(3)
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    have m: "mds_consistent mds Î“ ğ’® P"
      using tyenv_wf unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    from assignâ‡©2(4) assignâ‡©2(1)
    have "mds_consistent mds' (Î“(x â†¦ t)) ğ’® P'"
      apply(rule mds_consistent_preds_tyenv_update)
      using upd m by simp
    from wf' stable' this show "tyenv_wellformed mds' ?Î“' ğ’® P'"
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
  qed
  have p: "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P' mem'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©2 upd by metis
  have sec: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¹ pred P mem âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds' ?Î“' mem'"
  proof(clarify)
    assume wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    assume pred: "pred P mem"
    assume sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem"
    from pred p have pred': "pred P' mem'" by blast
    fix v t'
    assume Î“v: "(Î“(x â†¦ t)) v = Some t'"
    assume "v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    show "type_max (the ((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v)) mem' â‰¤ dma mem' v"
    proof(cases "v = x")
      assume [simp]: "v = x"
      hence [simp]: "(the ((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v)) = t" and t_def: "t = t'"
        using Î“v by auto
      from â€¹v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWriteâ€º upd wf have readable: "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®"
        by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      with assignâ‡©2(5) have "t â‰¤:â‡©P' (dma_type x)" by fastforce
      with pred' show ?thesis
        using type_max_dma_type subtype_correct
        by fastforce
    next
      assume neq: "v â‰  x"
      hence [simp]: "((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v) = Î“ v"
        by simp
      with Î“v have Î“v: "Î“ v = Some t'" by simp
      with sec upd â€¹v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWriteâ€º have f_leq: "type_max t' mem â‰¤ dma mem v"
        by auto
      have ğ’_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. mem x = mem' x"
        using wf assignâ‡©2(1) upd by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      hence dma_eq: "dma mem = dma mem'"
        by(rule dma_ğ’)
      have f_eq: "type_max t' mem = type_max t' mem'"
        apply(rule ğ’_eq_type_max_eq)
         using Î“v wf apply(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
        by(rule ğ’_eq)     
      from neq Î“v f_leq dma_eq f_eq show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed
  from ty wf p sec show ?case
    by blast
next
  case (assignâ‡©ğ’ x Î“ e t P P' ğ’® c' mds)
  (* this case follows from the same argument as assignâ‡©1 *)
  hence upd: "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e)"
    by (metis assign_elim)
  hence " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P' {c'} Î“,ğ’®,P'"
    by (metis stop_type)
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® P'"
    using upd tyenv_wellformed_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ by metis
  moreover have "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P' mem'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ upd by metis
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds' Î“ mem'"
  proof(clarify)
    fix v t'
    assume wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    assume pred: "pred P mem"
    hence pred': "pred P' mem'" using â€¹pred P mem âŸ¶ pred P' mem'â€º by blast
    assume sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem"
    assume Î“v: "Î“ v = Some t'"
    assume readable': "v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    with upd have readable: "v âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite" by simp
    with wf have "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®" by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
    show "type_max (the (Î“ v)) mem' â‰¤ dma mem' v"
    proof(cases "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v")
      assume "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v"
      with assignâ‡©ğ’(6) â€¹v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®â€º have "(to_total Î“ v) â‰¤:â‡©P' (dma_type v)" by blast
      from pred' Î“v subtype_sound[OF this] show ?thesis
        using type_max_dma_type by(auto simp: to_total_def split: if_splits)
    next
      assume "x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars v"
      hence "âˆ€v'âˆˆğ’_vars v. mem v' = mem' v'"
        using upd by auto
      hence dma_eq: "dma mem v = dma mem' v"
        by(rule dma_ğ’_vars)
      from Î“v assignâ‡©ğ’(4) have "x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'" by force
      have "type_wellformed t'"
        using wf Î“v by(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
      with â€¹x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'â€º upd have f_eq: "type_max t' mem = type_max t' mem'"
        using vars_of_type_eq_type_max_eq by fastforce
      from sec Î“v readable have "type_max t' mem â‰¤ dma mem v"
        by auto
      with f_eq dma_eq Î“v show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed
  ultimately show ?case
    by (metis stop_type)
next
  case (if_type Î“ e t P ğ’® th Î“' ğ’®' P' el Î“'' P'' Î“''' P''' c' mds)
  from if_type(13)
  show ?case
  proof(rule if_elim)
    assume [simp]: "evâ‡©B mem e" and [simp]: "c' = th" and [simp]: "mem' = mem" and [simp]: "mds' = mds"
    from if_type(3) have " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P +â‡©ğ’® e {c'} Î“',ğ’®',P'" by simp
    hence "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P +â‡©ğ’® e {c'} Î“''',ğ’®',P'''"
      apply(rule sub)
           apply simp+
         using if_type apply blast
        using if_type apply blast
       apply simp
      using if_type apply(blast intro: pred_entailment_trans)
      done
    moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® (P +â‡©ğ’® e)"
      by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def add_pred_def)
    moreover have "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred (P +â‡©ğ’® e) mem'"
      by(auto simp: pred_def add_pred_def)
    moreover have "tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ tyenv_sec mds' Î“ mem'"
      by(simp)
    ultimately show ?case by blast
  next
    assume [simp]: "Â¬ evâ‡©B mem e" and [simp]: "c' = el" and [simp]: "mem' = mem" and [simp]: "mds' = mds"
    from if_type(5) have " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P +â‡©ğ’® bexp_neg e {c'} Î“'',ğ’®',P''" by simp
    hence "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P +â‡©ğ’® bexp_neg e {c'} Î“''',ğ’®',P'''"
      apply(rule sub)
           apply simp+
         using if_type apply blast
        using if_type apply blast
       apply simp
      using if_type apply(blast intro: pred_entailment_trans)
      done
    moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® (P +â‡©ğ’® bexp_neg e)"
      by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def add_pred_def)
    moreover have "pred P mem âŸ¶ pred (P +â‡©ğ’® bexp_neg e) mem'"
      by(auto simp: pred_def add_pred_def bexp_neg_negates)
    moreover have "tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ tyenv_sec mds' Î“ mem'"
      by(simp)
    ultimately show ?case by blast
  qed
next
  case (while_type Î“ e t P ğ’® c c' mds)
  hence [simp]: "mds' = mds âˆ§ c' = If e (c ;; While e c) Stop âˆ§ mem' = mem"
    by (metis while_elim)
  have " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {c'} Î“,ğ’®,P"
    apply simp
    apply(rule if_type)
             apply(rule while_type(1))
            apply(rule while_type(2))
           apply(rule seq_type)
            apply(rule while_type(3))
           apply(rule has_type.while_type)
             apply(rule while_type(1))
            apply(rule while_type(2))
           apply(rule while_type(3))
          apply(rule stop_type)
         apply simp
        apply simp
       apply simp
      apply(rule add_pred_entailment)
      apply simp+
    by(blast intro!: tyenv_wellformed_subset add_pred_subset)
  thus ?case
    by fastforce
next
  case (seq_type Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©1 Î“â‡©1 ğ’®â‡©1 Pâ‡©1 câ‡©2 Î“â‡©2 ğ’®â‡©2 Pâ‡©2 c' mds)
  thus ?case
  proof (cases "câ‡©1 = Stop")
    assume [simp]: "câ‡©1 = Stop"
    with seq_type have [simp]: "mds' = mds" and [simp]: "c' = câ‡©2" and [simp]: "mem' = mem"
      by (metis seq_stop_elim)+
    have context_eq: "context_equiv Î“ P Î“â‡©1" and [simp]: "ğ’®â‡©1 = ğ’®" and entail: "P âŠ¢ Pâ‡©1" and
             wf_imp: "âˆ€mds. tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1"
      using stop_cxt seq_type(1) by simp+
    have "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {câ‡©2} Î“â‡©2,ğ’®â‡©2,Pâ‡©2"
      apply(rule sub)
            using seq_type(3) apply simp
           apply(rule context_eq)
          apply(rule wf_imp)
         apply simp+
       apply(rule entail)
      apply(rule pred_entailment_refl)
      done
    thus ?case
      by fastforce
  next
    assume "câ‡©1 â‰  Stop"
    then obtain câ‡©1' where "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆ§ c' = (câ‡©1' ;; câ‡©2)"
      by (metis seq_elim seq_type.prems)
    then obtain Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' where "âŠ¢ Î“''',ğ’®''',P''' {câ‡©1'} Î“â‡©1,ğ’®â‡©1,Pâ‡©1 âˆ§
      (tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ mem âŸ¶ 
       tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' âˆ§ pred P''' mem' âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds' Î“''' mem')"
      using seq_type(2)
      by force
    moreover
    from seq_type have "âŠ¢ Î“â‡©1,ğ’®â‡©1,Pâ‡©1 {câ‡©2} Î“â‡©2,ğ’®â‡©2,Pâ‡©2" by auto
    moreover
    ultimately show ?case
      apply (rule_tac x = Î“''' in exI)
      using â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆ§ c' = câ‡©1' ;; câ‡©2â€º by blast
  qed
next
  case (sub Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 c Î“â‡©1' ğ’®' Pâ‡©1' Î“â‡©2 Pâ‡©2 Î“â‡©2' Pâ‡©2' c' mds)
  then obtain Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' where stuff: "âŠ¢ Î“'',ğ’®'',P'' { c' } Î“â‡©1',ğ’®',Pâ‡©1' âˆ§
    (tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©1 mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©1 mem âŸ¶ 
     tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' âˆ§ pred P'' mem' âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds' Î“'' mem')"
    by force

  have imp: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©2 ğ’® Pâ‡©2 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©2 mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©2 mem âŸ¹ 
             tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©1 mem âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©1 mem"
    apply(rule conjI)
     using sub(5) sub(4) tyenv_wellformed_sub unfolding pred_def
     apply blast
    apply(rule conjI) 
     using local.pred_def pred_entailment_def sub.hyps(7) apply auto[1]
    using sub(3) context_equiv_tyenv_sec unfolding pred_def by blast
  show ?case
    apply (rule_tac x = Î“'' in exI, rule_tac x = "ğ’®''" in exI, rule_tac x="P''" in exI)  
    apply (rule conjI)
     apply(rule has_type.sub)
           apply(rule stuff[THEN conjunct1])
          apply simp+
        apply(rule sub(5))
       apply(rule sub(6))
      apply simp
     using sub apply blast
    using imp stuff apply blast
   done
next
  case (await_type Î“ e t P ğ’® c Î“' ğ’®' P' c' mds)
  from this show ?case
    apply simp
    apply (drule await_elim, clarsimp)
    apply (drule preservation_no_await_plus[of c mds mem c' mds' mem' Î“ ğ’® "P +â‡©ğ’® e" Î“' ğ’®' P'], assumption+)
    apply (subgoal_tac "âŸ¦ tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ§ âŸ¹ tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P +â‡©ğ’® e") defer
      apply (unfold add_pred_def)[1]
      apply (case_tac "pred_stable ğ’® e", clarsimp)
        apply (unfold tyenv_wellformed_def, clarsimp)[1]
        apply (unfold mds_consistent_def, clarsimp)[1]
      apply clarsimp
    apply (subgoal_tac "pred P mem âŸ¹ pred P +â‡©ğ’® e mem") defer
      apply (unfold add_pred_def)[1]
      apply (case_tac "pred_stable ğ’® e", clarsimp)
        apply (unfold pred_def, clarsimp)[1]
      apply clarsimp
    apply clarsimp
    using has_type.sub by (metis context_equiv_refl pred_entailment_refl)
qed

inductive_cases await_type_elim: "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {Await b ca} Î“',ğ’®',P'"


fun bisim_helper :: "(('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf â‡’
  (('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf â‡’ bool"
  where
  "bisim_helper âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© âŸ¨câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2, memâ‡©2âŸ© = memâ‡©1 =â‡˜mdsâ‡™â‡§l memâ‡©2"

lemma â„›â‡©3_mem_eq: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© âŸ¹ memâ‡©1 =â‡˜mdsâ‡™â‡§l memâ‡©2"
  apply (subgoal_tac "bisim_helper âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©")
   apply simp
  apply (induct rule: â„›â‡©3_aux.induct)
  by (auto simp: â„›â‡©1_mem_eq)


lemma evâ‡©A_eq:
  assumes tyenv_eq: "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2"
  assumes pred: "pred P memâ‡©1" 
  assumes e_type: "Î“ âŠ¢â‡©a e âˆˆ t"
  assumes subtype: "t â‰¤:â‡©P (dma_type v)"
  assumes is_Low: "dma memâ‡©1 v = Low"
  shows "evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e = evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e"
proof(rule eval_vars_detâ‡©A, clarify)
  fix x
  assume in_vars: "x âˆˆ aexp_vars e"
  have "type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 = Low"
  proof -
    from subtype_sound[OF subtype] pred have "type_max t memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 v"
      by(auto)
    with is_Low have "type_max t memâ‡©1 = Low" by(auto simp: less_eq_Sec_def)
    with e_type in_vars show ?thesis
      apply -
      apply(erule type_aexpr.cases)
      using Sec.exhaust by(auto simp: type_max_def split: if_splits)
  qed
  thus "memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
    using tyenv_eq unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
qed

lemma evâ‡©A_eq':
  assumes tyenv_eq: "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2"
  assumes pred: "pred P memâ‡©1" 
  assumes e_type: "Î“ âŠ¢â‡©a e âˆˆ t"
  assumes subtype: "P âŠ¢ t"
  shows "evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e = evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e"
proof(rule eval_vars_detâ‡©A, clarify)
  fix x
  assume in_vars: "x âˆˆ aexp_vars e"
  have "type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 = Low"
  proof -
    from subtype pred have "type_max t memâ‡©1 â‰¤ Low"
      by(auto simp: type_max_def pred_entailment_def pred_def)
    hence "type_max t memâ‡©1 = Low" by(auto simp: less_eq_Sec_def)
    with e_type in_vars show ?thesis
      apply -
      apply(erule type_aexpr.cases)
      using Sec.exhaust by(auto simp: type_max_def  split: if_splits)
  qed
  thus "memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
    using tyenv_eq unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
qed

lemma evâ‡©B_eq':
  assumes tyenv_eq: "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2"
  assumes pred: "pred P memâ‡©1" 
  assumes e_type: "Î“ âŠ¢â‡©b e âˆˆ t"
  assumes subtype: "P âŠ¢ t"
  shows "evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e = evâ‡©B memâ‡©2 e"
proof(rule eval_vars_detâ‡©B, clarify)
  fix x
  assume in_vars: "x âˆˆ bexp_vars e"
  have "type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 = Low"
  proof -
    from subtype pred have "type_max t memâ‡©1 â‰¤ Low"
      by(auto simp: type_max_def pred_entailment_def pred_def)
    hence "type_max t memâ‡©1 = Low" by(auto simp: less_eq_Sec_def)
    with e_type in_vars show ?thesis
      apply -
      apply(erule type_bexpr.cases)
      using Sec.exhaust by(auto simp: type_max_def  split: if_splits)
  qed
  thus "memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
    using tyenv_eq unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
qed

lemma R1_equiv_entailment:
  "âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ¹  
  context_equiv Î“' P' Î“'' âŸ¹ P' âŠ¢ P'' âŸ¹
  âˆ€mds. tyenv_wellformed mds Î“' ğ’®' P' âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds Î“'' ğ’®' P'' âŸ¹
   âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“'',ğ’®',P''â‡™ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©"
  apply(induct rule: â„›â‡©1.induct)
  apply(rule â„›â‡©1.intro)
       apply(blast intro: sub context_equiv_refl pred_entailment_refl)+
  done

lemma R3_equiv_entailment:
  "âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ¹ 
    context_equiv Î“' P' Î“'' âŸ¹ P' âŠ¢ P'' âŸ¹ 
  âˆ€mds. tyenv_wellformed mds Î“' ğ’®' P' âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds Î“'' ğ’®' P'' âŸ¹
  âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“'',ğ’®',P''â‡™ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©"
  apply(induct rule: â„›â‡©3_aux.induct)
   apply(erule â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©1)
   apply(blast intro: sub context_equiv_refl tyenv_wellformed_subset subset_entailment)
  apply(erule â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©3)
  apply(blast intro: sub context_equiv_refl tyenv_wellformed_subset subset_entailment)
  done

lemma R_equiv_entailment:
  "lcâ‡©1 â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ lcâ‡©2 âŸ¹ 
    context_equiv Î“' P' Î“'' âŸ¹ P' âŠ¢ P'' âŸ¹ 
  âˆ€mds. tyenv_wellformed mds Î“' ğ’®' P' âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds Î“'' ğ’®' P'' âŸ¹
  lcâ‡©1 â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“'',ğ’®',P''â‡™ lcâ‡©2"
  apply(induct rule: â„›.induct)
   apply clarsimp
   apply(rule â„›.introâ‡©1)
   apply(fastforce intro: R1_equiv_entailment)
  apply(rule â„›.introâ‡©3)
  apply(fastforce intro: R3_equiv_entailment)
  done

lemma context_equiv_tyenv_eq:
  "tyenv_eq Î“ mem mem' âŸ¹ context_equiv Î“ P Î“' âŸ¹ pred P mem âŸ¹ tyenv_eq Î“' mem mem'"
  apply(clarsimp simp: tyenv_eq_def to_total_def context_equiv_def split: if_splits simp: type_equiv_def)
  using subtype_trans subtype_sound
  by (metis domI less_eq_Sec_def option.sel)


lemma â„›_typed_step_no_await:
"âŸ¦ âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { câ‡©1 } Î“',ğ’®',P' ;
  tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P; memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2; pred P memâ‡©1;
        pred P memâ‡©2; tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1;
     âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©; no_await câ‡©1 âŸ§ âŸ¹
   (âˆƒ câ‡©2' memâ‡©2'. âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§
                 âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©)"
proof (induct arbitrary: mds câ‡©1' rule: has_type.induct)
  case (seq_type Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©1 Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' câ‡©2 Î“' ğ’®' P' mds)
  show ?case
  proof (cases "câ‡©1 = Stop")
    assume "câ‡©1 = Stop"
    hence [simp]: "câ‡©1' = câ‡©2" "mds' = mds" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1"
      using seq_type
      by (auto simp: seq_stop_elim)
    from seq_type â€¹câ‡©1 = Stopâ€º have "context_equiv Î“ P Î“''" and "ğ’® = ğ’®''" and "P âŠ¢ P''" and
                                   "(âˆ€mds. tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed  mds Î“'' ğ’® P'')"
      by (metis stop_cxt)+
    hence "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { câ‡©2 } Î“',ğ’®',P'"
      apply -
      apply(rule sub)
          using seq_type(3) apply simp
         by auto
    have "âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
      apply (rule â„›â‡©1.intro [of Î“])
           apply(rule â€¹âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { câ‡©2 } Î“',ğ’®',P'â€º)
          using seq_type by auto
    thus ?case
      using â„›.introâ‡©1
      apply clarify
      apply (rule_tac x = câ‡©2 in exI)
      apply (rule_tac x = memâ‡©2 in exI)
      by (auto simp: â€¹câ‡©1 = Stopâ€º seq_stop_evalâ‡©w  â„›.introâ‡©1)
  next
    assume "câ‡©1 â‰  Stop"
    with â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©â€º obtain câ‡©1'' where câ‡©1''_props:
      "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© âˆ§ câ‡©1' = câ‡©1'' ;; câ‡©2"
      by (metis seq_elim)
    with â€¹no_await (câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2)â€º have "no_await câ‡©1" using no_await.cases by blast
    with seq_type(2) â€¹no_await câ‡©1â€º obtain câ‡©2'' memâ‡©2' where câ‡©2''_props:
      "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“'',ğ’®'',P''â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
      using seq_type.prems(1) seq_type.prems(2) seq_type.prems(3) seq_type.prems(4) seq_type.prems(5) câ‡©1''_props
      by blast
    hence "âŸ¨câ‡©1'' ;; câ‡©2, mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2'' ;; câ‡©2, mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
      apply (rule conjE)
      apply (erule â„›_elim, auto)
       apply (metis â„›.introâ‡©3 â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©1 seq_type(3))
      by (metis â„›.introâ‡©3 â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©3 seq_type(3))
    moreover
    from câ‡©2''_props have "âŸ¨câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2'' ;; câ‡©2, mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
      by (metis evalâ‡©w.seq)
    ultimately show ?case
      by (metis câ‡©1''_props)
  qed
next
  case (anno_type Î“' Î“ ğ’® upd ğ’®' P' P c Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' mds)
  have "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“'â‡™ memâ‡©2"
  proof(clarsimp simp: tyenv_eq_def)
    fix x  
    assume a: "type_max (to_total Î“' x) memâ‡©1 = Low"
    hence "type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 = Low"
    proof -
      from â€¹pred P memâ‡©1â€º have "pred P' memâ‡©1"
        using anno_type.hyps(3)
        by(auto simp: restrict_preds_to_vars_def pred_def)
      with subtype_correct anno_type.hyps(7) a 
      show ?thesis
        using less_eq_Sec_def by metis
    qed
    thus " memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
      using anno_type.prems(2)
      unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
  qed
  
  have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed (update_modes upd mds) Î“' ğ’®' P'"
    using anno_type
    apply auto
    by (metis tyenv_wellformed_mode_update)
  moreover
  have pred: "pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1"
    using anno_type
    by (auto simp: pred_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  moreover
  have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P memâ‡©1 âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ 
        tyenv_sec (update_modes upd mds) Î“' memâ‡©1"
    apply(rule impI)
    apply(rule tyenv_sec_mode_update)
            using anno_type apply fastforce
           using anno_type pred apply fastforce
          using anno_type apply fastforce
         using anno_type apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
        using anno_type apply fastforce
       apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
     using anno_type apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
    by simp
  from â€¹no_await (c@[upd])â€º have "no_await c" using no_await.cases by blast
  ultimately obtain câ‡©2' memâ‡©2' where "(âŸ¨c, update_modes upd mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§
    âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“'',ğ’®'',P''â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©)"
    using anno_type
    apply auto    
    using â€¹memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“'â‡™ memâ‡©2â€º local.pred_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def upd_elim â€¹no_await câ€º
      (* TODO: cleanup *)
      using â€¹tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P memâ‡©1 âˆ§ (âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“. x âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“ x)) memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 x) âŸ¶ (âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“'. x âˆ‰ update_modes upd mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“' x)) memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 x)â€º mem_Collect_eq by fastforce try0
  thus ?case
    apply (rule_tac x = câ‡©2' in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x = memâ‡©2' in exI)
    apply auto
    by (metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w.decl)
next
  case stop_type
  with stop_no_eval show ?case by auto
next
  case (skip_type Î“ ğ’® P mds)
  moreover
  with skip_type have [simp]: "mds' = mds" "câ‡©1' = Stop" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1"
    using skip_elim
    by (metis, metis, metis)
  with skip_type have "âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
    by auto
  thus ?case
    using â„›.introâ‡©1 and unannotated [where c = Skip and E = "[]"]
    apply auto
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) â„›.introâ‡©1 old.prod.case skip_evalâ‡©w)
next (* assignâ‡©1 *)
  case (assignâ‡©1 x Î“ e t P P' ğ’® mds)
  hence upd [simp]: "câ‡©1' = Stop" "mds' = mds" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)"
    using assign_elim
    by (auto, metis)
  from assignâ‡©1(2) upd have ğ’_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©1' x"
    by auto
  have dma_eq [simp]: "dma memâ‡©1 = dma memâ‡©1'"
    using dma_ğ’ assignâ‡©1(2) by simp
  have "memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e) =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)"
  unfolding tyenv_eq_def
  proof(clarify)
    fix v
    assume is_Low': "type_max (to_total Î“ v) (memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) = Low"
    show "(memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) v = (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)) v"
    proof(cases "v âˆˆ dom Î“")
      assume [simp]: "v âˆˆ dom Î“"
      then obtain t' where [simp]: "Î“ v = Some t'" by force
      hence [simp]: "(to_total Î“ v) = t'"
        unfolding to_total_def by (auto split: if_splits)
      have "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
        apply(rule ğ’_eq_type_max_eq)
         using â€¹Î“ v = Some t'â€º assignâ‡©1(6) 
         unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def
         apply (metis â€¹v âˆˆ dom Î“â€º option.sel)
                
        using assignâ‡©1(2) apply simp
        done
      with is_Low' have is_Low: "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
        by simp
      from assignâ‡©1(1) â€¹v âˆˆ dom Î“â€º have "x â‰  v" by auto
      thus ?thesis
        apply simp
        using is_Low assignâ‡©1(7) unfolding tyenv_eq_def by auto
    next
      assume "v âˆ‰ dom Î“"
      hence [simp]: "â‹€mem. type_max (to_total Î“ v) mem = dma mem v"
        unfolding to_total_def by simp
      with is_Low' have "dma memâ‡©1' v = Low" by simp
      with dma_eq have dma_v_Low: "dma memâ‡©1 v = Low" by simp
      hence is_Low: "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low" by simp
      show ?thesis
      proof(cases "x = v")
        assume "x â‰  v"
        thus ?thesis
          apply simp
          using is_Low assignâ‡©1(7) unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
      next
        assume "x = v"
        thus ?thesis
          apply simp
          apply(rule evâ‡©A_eq)
              apply(rule assignâ‡©1(7))
             apply(rule assignâ‡©1(8))
            apply(rule assignâ‡©1(3))
           apply(rule assignâ‡©1(4))
          using dma_v_Low by simp
      qed
    qed
  qed

  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® P'"
    using upd tyenv_wellformed_preds_update assignâ‡©1 by metis
  moreover have "pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©1 upd by metis

  moreover have "pred P memâ‡©2 âŸ¶ pred P' (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e))"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©1 upd by metis
    
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P  âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1'"
    using tyenv_sec_eq[OF ğ’_eq, where Î“=Î“]
    unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast

  ultimately have â„›':
    "âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,P'â‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    apply -
    apply (rule â„›.introâ‡©1, auto simp: assignâ‡©1 simp del: dma_eq)
    done

  have a: "âŸ¨x â† e, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
  by (auto, metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.assign)

  from â„›' a show ?case
    using â€¹câ‡©1' = Stopâ€º and â€¹memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)â€º
    by blast
next (* assignâ‡©ğ’ *)
  case (assignâ‡©ğ’ x Î“ e t P P' ğ’® mds)
  hence upd [simp]: "câ‡©1' = Stop" "mds' = mds" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)"
    using assign_elim
    by (auto, metis)
  have "memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e) =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)"
  unfolding tyenv_eq_def
  proof(clarify)
    fix v
    assume is_Low': "type_max (to_total Î“ v) (memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) = Low"
    show "(memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) v = (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)) v"
    proof(cases "v âˆˆ dom Î“")
      assume in_dom [simp]: "v âˆˆ dom Î“"
      then obtain t' where Î“v [simp]: "Î“ v = Some t'" by force
      hence [simp]: "(to_total Î“ v) = t'"
        unfolding to_total_def by (auto split: if_splits)
      from assignâ‡©ğ’(4) have x_nin_C: "x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'"
        using in_dom Î“v 
        by (metis option.sel snd_conv)
      have Î“v_wf: "type_wellformed t'"
        using in_dom Î“v assignâ‡©ğ’(7) unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def
        by (metis option.sel)
        
      with x_nin_C have f_eq: "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
        using vars_of_type_eq_type_max_eq by simp
      with is_Low' have is_Low: "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
        by simp  
      from assignâ‡©ğ’(1) â€¹v âˆˆ dom Î“â€º assignâ‡©ğ’(7) have "x â‰  v"
        by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      thus ?thesis
        apply simp
        using is_Low assignâ‡©ğ’(8) unfolding tyenv_eq_def by auto
    next
      assume nin_dom: "v âˆ‰ dom Î“"
      hence [simp]: "â‹€mem. type_max (to_total Î“ v) mem = dma mem v"
        unfolding to_total_def  by simp
      with is_Low' have "dma memâ‡©1' v = Low" by simp
      show ?thesis
      proof(cases "x = v")
        assume "x = v"
        thus ?thesis
          apply simp
          apply(rule evâ‡©A_eq')
             apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’(8))
            apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’(9))
           apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’(2))
          by(rule assignâ‡©ğ’(3))
      next
        assume [simp]: "x â‰  v"
        show ?thesis
        proof(cases "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v")
          assume in_ğ’_vars: "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v"
          hence "v âˆ‰ ğ’"
            using ğ’_vars_ğ’ by auto
          with nin_dom have "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®"
            using assignâ‡©ğ’(7)
            by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def stable_def)
          with in_ğ’_vars have "P âŠ¢ (to_total Î“ v)"
            using assignâ‡©ğ’(6) by blast
          with assignâ‡©ğ’(9) have "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
            by(auto simp: type_max_def pred_def pred_entailment_def)
          thus ?thesis
            using not_sym[OF â€¹x â‰  vâ€º]
            apply simp
            using assignâ‡©ğ’(8)
            unfolding tyenv_eq_def by auto
        next
          assume "x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars v"
          with is_Low' have "dma memâ‡©1 v = Low"
            using dma_ğ’_vars â€¹â‹€mem. type_max (to_total Î“ v) mem = dma mem vâ€º
            by (metis fun_upd_other)
          thus ?thesis
            using not_sym[OF â€¹x â‰  vâ€º]
            apply simp
            using assignâ‡©ğ’(8)
            unfolding tyenv_eq_def by auto            
        qed
      qed
    qed
  qed

  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® P'"
    using upd tyenv_wellformed_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ by metis
  moreover have "pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ upd by metis
  moreover have "pred P memâ‡©2 âŸ¶ pred P' (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e))"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ upd by metis
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P memâ‡©1 âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1 âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds' Î“ memâ‡©1'"
  proof(clarify)
    fix v t'
    assume wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    assume pred: "pred P memâ‡©1"
    hence pred': "pred P' memâ‡©1'" using â€¹pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1'â€º by blast
    assume sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1"
    assume Î“v: "Î“ v = Some t'"
    assume readable': "v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    with upd have readable: "v âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite" by simp
    with wf have "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®" by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
    show "type_max (the (Î“ v)) memâ‡©1' â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1' v"
    proof(cases "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v")
      assume "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v"
      with assignâ‡©ğ’(6) â€¹v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®â€º have "(to_total Î“ v) â‰¤:â‡©P' (dma_type v)" by blast
      from pred' Î“v subtype_correct this show ?thesis
        using type_max_dma_type by(auto simp: to_total_def split: if_splits)
    next
      assume "x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars v"
      hence "âˆ€v'âˆˆğ’_vars v. memâ‡©1 v' = memâ‡©1' v'"
        using upd by auto
      hence dma_eq: "dma memâ‡©1 v = dma memâ‡©1' v"
        by(rule dma_ğ’_vars)
      from Î“v assignâ‡©ğ’(4) have "x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'" by force
      have "type_wellformed t'"
        using wf Î“v by(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
      with â€¹x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'â€º upd have f_eq: "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
        using vars_of_type_eq_type_max_eq by fastforce
      from sec Î“v readable have "type_max t' memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 v"
        by auto
      with f_eq dma_eq Î“v show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed

  ultimately have â„›':
    "âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,P'â‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    apply -
    apply (rule â„›.introâ‡©1, auto simp: assignâ‡©ğ’)
    done

  have a: "âŸ¨x â† e, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
  by (auto, metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.assign)

  from â„›' a show ?case
    using â€¹câ‡©1' = Stopâ€º and â€¹memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)â€º
    by blast
next (* assignâ‡©2 *)
  case (assignâ‡©2 x Î“ e t ğ’® P' P mds)
  have upd [simp]: "câ‡©1' = Stop" "mds' = mds" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)"
    using assign_elim[OF assignâ‡©2(11)]
    by auto
  from â€¹x âˆˆ dom Î“â€º â€¹tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® Pâ€º
  have x_nin_ğ’: "x âˆ‰ ğ’"
    by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
  hence dma_eq [simp]: "dma memâ‡©1' = dma memâ‡©1"
    using dma_ğ’ assignâ‡©2
    by auto
    
  let ?Î“' = "Î“ (x â†¦ t)"
  have "âŸ¨x â† e, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    using assignâ‡©2
    by (metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w_simplep.assign evalâ‡©wp.unannotated evalâ‡©wp_evalâ‡©w_eq)
    
  moreover
  have tyenv_eq': "memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e) =â‡˜Î“(x â†¦ t)â‡™ memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)"
  unfolding tyenv_eq_def
  proof(clarify)
    fix v
    assume is_Low': "type_max (to_total (Î“(x â†¦ t)) v) (memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) = Low"
