    show "(memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) v = (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)) v"
    proof(cases "v = x")
      assume neq: "v â‰  x"
      hence "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
      proof(cases "v âˆˆ dom Î“")
        assume "v âˆˆ dom Î“"
        then obtain t' where [simp]: "Î“ v = Some t'" by force
        hence [simp]: "(to_total Î“ v) = t'"
          unfolding to_total_def by (auto split: if_splits)
        hence [simp]: "(to_total ?Î“' v) = t'"
          using neq by(auto simp: to_total_def)
        have "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
          apply(rule ğ’_eq_type_max_eq)
            using assignâ‡©2(6) 
            apply(clarsimp simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
            using â€¹v âˆˆ dom Î“â€º â€¹Î“ v = Some t'â€º apply(metis option.sel)
           using x_nin_ğ’ by simp
        from this is_Low' neq neq[THEN not_sym] show "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
          by auto
      next
        assume "v âˆ‰ dom Î“"
        with is_Low' neq
        have "dma memâ‡©1' v = Low"
          by(auto simp: to_total_def  split: if_splits)
        with dma_eq â€¹v âˆ‰ dom Î“â€º show ?thesis
          by(auto simp: to_total_def  split: if_splits)
      qed
      with neq assignâ‡©2(7) show "(memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) v = (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)) v"
        by(auto simp: tyenv_eq_def)
    next
      assume eq[simp]: "v = x"
      with is_Low' â€¹x âˆˆ dom Î“â€º have t_Low': "type_max t memâ‡©1' = Low"
        by(auto simp: to_total_def split: if_splits)
      have wf_t: "type_wellformed t"
        using type_aexpr_type_wellformed assignâ‡©2(2) assignâ‡©2(6)
        by(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def)
      with t_Low' â€¹x âˆ‰ ğ’â€º have t_Low: "type_max t memâ‡©1 = Low"
        using ğ’_eq_type_max_eq
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) fun_upd_other upd(3))
      show ?thesis
      proof(simp, rule eval_vars_detâ‡©A, clarify)
        fix y
        assume in_vars: "y âˆˆ aexp_vars e"
        have "type_max (to_total Î“ y) memâ‡©1 = Low"
        proof -
          from t_Low in_vars assignâ‡©2(2) show ?thesis
            apply -
            apply(erule type_aexpr.cases)
            using Sec.exhaust by(auto simp: type_max_def  split: if_splits)
        qed
        thus "memâ‡©1 y = memâ‡©2 y"
          using assignâ‡©2 unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
      qed
    qed
  qed

  from upd have ty: " âŠ¢ ?Î“',ğ’®,P' {câ‡©1'} ?Î“',ğ’®,P'"
    by (metis stop_type)
  have wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' ?Î“' ğ’® P'"
  proof
    assume tyenv_wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    hence wf: "types_wellformed Î“"
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    hence  "type_wellformed t"
      using assignâ‡©2(2) type_aexpr_type_wellformed
      by blast
    with wf have wf': "types_wellformed ?Î“'"
      using types_wellformed_update by metis
    from tyenv_wf have stable': "types_stable ?Î“' ğ’®"
      using types_stable_update
            assignâ‡©2(3)
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    have m: "mds_consistent mds Î“ ğ’® P"
      using tyenv_wf unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    from assignâ‡©2(4) assignâ‡©2(1)
    have "mds_consistent mds' (Î“(x â†¦ t)) ğ’® P'"
      apply(rule mds_consistent_preds_tyenv_update)
      using upd m by simp
    from wf' stable' this show "tyenv_wellformed mds' ?Î“' ğ’® P'"
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
  qed
  have p: "pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©2 upd by metis
  have pâ‡©2: "pred P memâ‡©2 âŸ¶ pred P' (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e))"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©2 upd by metis
  have sec: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¹ pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1 âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds' ?Î“' memâ‡©1'"
  proof(clarify)
    assume wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    assume pred: "pred P memâ‡©1"
    assume sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1"
    from pred p have pred': "pred P' memâ‡©1'" by blast
    fix v t'
    assume Î“v: "(Î“(x â†¦ t)) v = Some t'"
    assume "v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    show "type_max (the ((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v)) memâ‡©1' â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1' v"
    proof(cases "v = x")
      assume [simp]: "v = x"
      hence [simp]: "(the ((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v)) = t" and t_def: "t = t'"
        using Î“v by auto
      from â€¹v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWriteâ€º upd wf have readable: "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®"
        by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      with assignâ‡©2(5) have "t â‰¤:â‡©P' (dma_type x)" by fastforce
      with pred' show ?thesis
        using type_max_dma_type subtype_correct
        by fastforce
    next
      assume neq: "v â‰  x"
      hence [simp]: "((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v) = Î“ v"
        by simp
      with Î“v have Î“v: "Î“ v = Some t'" by simp
      with sec upd â€¹v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWriteâ€º have f_leq: "type_max t' memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 v"
        by auto
      have ğ’_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©1' x"
        using wf assignâ‡©2(1) upd by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      hence dma_eq: "dma memâ‡©1 = dma memâ‡©1'"
        by(rule dma_ğ’)
      have f_eq: "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
        apply(rule ğ’_eq_type_max_eq)
         using Î“v wf apply(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
        by(rule ğ’_eq)     
      from neq Î“v f_leq dma_eq f_eq show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed

  have "âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜?Î“',ğ’®,P'â‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    apply(rule â„›â‡©1.intro)
         apply blast
        using wf assignâ‡©2 apply fastforce
       apply(rule tyenv_eq')
      using p assignâ‡©2 apply fastforce
     using pâ‡©2 assignâ‡©2 apply fastforce
    using sec assignâ‡©2
    using upd(2) upd(3) by blast
    
  ultimately have "âŸ¨x â† e, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    "âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“(x â†¦ t),ğ’®,P'â‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    using â„›.introâ‡©1
    by auto
  thus ?case
    using â€¹mds' = mdsâ€º â€¹câ‡©1' = Stopâ€º â€¹memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)â€º
    by blast
next (* if *)
  case (if_type Î“ e t P ğ’® th Î“' ğ’®' P' el Î“'' P'' Î“''' P''')
  let ?P = "if (evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e) then P +â‡©ğ’® e else P +â‡©ğ’® (bexp_neg e)"
  from â€¹âŸ¨Stmt.If e th el, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©â€º have ty: "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,?P {câ‡©1'} Î“''',ğ’®',P'''"
  proof (rule if_elim)
    assume "câ‡©1' = th" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1" "mds' = mds" "evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e"
    with if_type(3)
    show ?thesis
      apply simp
      apply(erule sub)
         using if_type apply simp+
      done
  next
    assume "câ‡©1' = el" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1" "mds' = mds" "Â¬ evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e"
    with if_type(5)
    show ?thesis
      apply simp
      apply(erule sub)
         using if_type apply simp+
      done
  qed
  have evâ‡©B_eq [simp]: "evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e = evâ‡©B memâ‡©2 e"
    apply(rule evâ‡©B_eq')
       apply(rule â€¹memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2â€º)
      apply(rule â€¹pred P memâ‡©1â€º)
     apply(rule â€¹Î“ âŠ¢â‡©b e âˆˆ tâ€º)
    by(rule â€¹ P âŠ¢ tâ€º)
  have "(âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ â„› Î“''' ğ’®' P'''"
    apply (rule introâ‡©1)
    apply clarify
    apply (rule â„›â‡©1.intro [where Î“ = Î“ and Î“' = Î“''' and ğ’® = ğ’® and P = ?P])
         apply(rule ty)
        using â€¹tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® Pâ€º
        apply(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def add_pred_def)[1]
       apply(rule â€¹memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2â€º)       
      using â€¹pred P memâ‡©1â€º apply(fastforce simp: pred_def add_pred_def bexp_neg_negates)
     using â€¹pred P memâ‡©2â€º apply(fastforce simp: pred_def add_pred_def bexp_neg_negates)
    by(rule â€¹tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1â€º)

  show ?case
  proof -
    from evâ‡©B_eq if_type(13) have "(âŸ¨If e th el, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©)"
      apply (cases "evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e")
       apply (subgoal_tac "câ‡©1' = th")
        apply clarify
        apply (metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w_simplep.if_true evalâ‡©wp.unannotated evalâ‡©wp_evalâ‡©w_eq if_type(8))
       using if_type.prems(6) apply blast
      apply (subgoal_tac "câ‡©1' = el")
       apply (metis (hide_lams, mono_tags) cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.if_false if_type(8))
      using if_type.prems(6) by blast
    with â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“''',ğ’®',P'''â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©â€º show ?thesis  
    by (metis if_elim if_type.prems(6))    
  qed
next (* while *)
  case (while_type Î“ e t P ğ’® c)
  hence [simp]: "câ‡©1' = (If e (c ;; While e c) Stop)" and
    [simp]: "mds' = mds" and
    [simp]: "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1"
    by (auto simp: while_elim)

  with while_type have "âŸ¨While e c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
    by (metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w_simplep.while evalâ‡©wp.unannotated evalâ‡©wp_evalâ‡©w_eq)
    
  moreover have ty: " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {câ‡©1'} Î“,ğ’®,P"
    apply simp
    apply(rule if_type)
              apply(rule while_type(1))
             apply(rule while_type(2))
            apply(rule seq_type)
             apply(rule while_type(3))
            apply(rule has_type.while_type)
              apply(rule while_type(1))
             apply(rule while_type(2))
            apply(rule while_type(3))
           apply(rule stop_type)
          apply simp+
      apply(rule add_pred_entailment)
     apply simp
    apply(blast intro!: add_pred_subset tyenv_wellformed_subset)
    done
  moreover
  have "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
    apply (rule â„›â‡©1.intro [where Î“ = Î“])
         apply(rule ty)
        using while_type apply simp+
    done
  hence "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
    using â„›.introâ‡©1 by auto
  ultimately show ?case
    by fastforce
next
  case (sub Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 c Î“â‡©1' ğ’®' Pâ‡©1' Î“â‡©2 Pâ‡©2 Î“â‡©2' Pâ‡©2' mds câ‡©1')
  have imp: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©2 ğ’® Pâ‡©2 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©2 memâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©2 memâ‡©2 âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©2 memâ‡©1 âŸ¹ 
             tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©1 memâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©1 memâ‡©2 âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©1 memâ‡©1"
    apply(rule conjI)
     using sub(5) sub(4) tyenv_wellformed_sub unfolding pred_def
     apply blast
    apply(rule conjI)
     using local.pred_def pred_entailment_def sub.hyps(7) apply auto[1]
    apply(rule conjI)
     using local.pred_def pred_entailment_def sub.hyps(7) apply auto[1]
    using sub(3) context_equiv_tyenv_sec unfolding pred_def by blast

  have tyenv_eq: "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡©1â‡™ memâ‡©2"
    using context_equiv_tyenv_eq sub by blast
    
  from imp tyenv_eq obtain câ‡©2' memâ‡©2' where câ‡©2'_props: "âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
    "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“â‡©1',ğ’®',Pâ‡©1'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
    using sub by blast 
  with R_equiv_entailment â€¹Pâ‡©1' âŠ¢ Pâ‡©2'â€º show ?case
    using sub.hyps(6) sub.hyps(5) by blast
next case (await_type Î“ e t P ğ’® c Î“' ğ’®' P' Î“'' P'')
  from this show ?case using no_await_no_await by blast
qed

lemma is_final_â„›â‡©u_is_final:
  "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© âŸ¹ is_final câ‡©1 âŸ¹ is_final câ‡©2"
  by (fastforce dest: bisim_simple_â„›â‡©u)

lemma pred_plus_impl:
  "pred P mem âŸ¹ evâ‡©B mem e âŸ¹ pred P +â‡©S e mem"
  unfolding add_pred_def pred_def by simp

lemma my_â„›â‡©3_aux_induct [consumes 1, case_names introâ‡©1 introâ‡©3]: 
  "âŸ¦âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©;
   â‹€câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 c Î“' ğ’®' P'. 
     âŸ¦âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©; 
      âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {c} Î“',ğ’®',P'âŸ§ âŸ¹ 
    Q (câ‡©1 ;; c) mds memâ‡©1 Î“' ğ’®' P' (câ‡©2 ;; c) mds memâ‡©2;
   â‹€câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 c Î“' ğ’®' P'. 
     âŸ¦âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©; 
      Q câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©2 mds memâ‡©2; 
      âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {c} Î“',ğ’®',P'âŸ§ âŸ¹ 
    Q (câ‡©1 ;; c) mds memâ‡©1 Î“' ğ’®' P' (câ‡©2 ;; c) mds memâ‡©2âŸ§ âŸ¹ 
  Q câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©2 mds memâ‡©2"
using â„›â‡©3_aux.induct[where 
    ?x1.0 = "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©" and
    ?x2.0 = Î“ and
    ?x3.0 = ğ’® and
    ?x4.0 = P and
    ?x5.0 = "âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©" and
    ?P = "Î»ctxâ‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P ctxâ‡©2. Q (fst (fst ctxâ‡©1)) (snd (fst ctxâ‡©1)) (snd ctxâ‡©1) Î“ ğ’® P (fst (fst ctxâ‡©2)) (snd (fst ctxâ‡©2)) (snd ctxâ‡©2)"]
by force

lemma â„›_typed_step_plus: 
  "âŸ¦âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©; 
    âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { câ‡©1 } Î“',ğ’®',P';
    no_await câ‡©1;
    tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P; 
    memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2; 
    pred P memâ‡©1;
    pred P memâ‡©2; 
    tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1 âŸ§ âŸ¹ 
   (âˆƒ câ‡©2' memâ‡©2'. âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§
                 âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©)"
proof (induct arbitrary: Î“ ğ’® P memâ‡©2 rule: my_trancl_big_step_induct3)
  case (base câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©1' mds' memâ‡©1')
  from this show ?case using â„›_typed_step_no_await bisim_simple_â„›â‡©u by fast
next 
  case (step câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©1' mds' memâ‡©1' câ‡©1'' mds'' memâ‡©1'') 
  from this obtain memâ‡©2' where stepâ‡©2': "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©" and
      relâ‡©2': "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
    using bisim_simple_â„›â‡©u by (metis fst_conv)
  from relâ‡©2' show ?case
  proof(cases rule: â„›.cases)
    case (introâ‡©1) 
    from this obtain Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' where 
      "âŠ¢ Î“'',ğ’®'',P'' {câ‡©1'} Î“',ğ’®',P'" 
      "tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“'' ğ’®'' P''"
      "memâ‡©1' =â‡˜Î“''â‡™ memâ‡©2'"
      "pred P'' memâ‡©1'"
      "pred P'' memâ‡©2'"
      "âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“''. x âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“'' x)) memâ‡©1' â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1' x"
      using â„›â‡©1.cases by auto
    from stepâ‡©2' â€¹no_await câ‡©1â€º step.hyps(1) step.hyps(4) this obtain memâ‡©2'' where 
        stepâ‡©2'': "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ©" and 
        relâ‡©2'': "âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©1''âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ©"
      using no_await_trancl bisim_simple_â„›â‡©u by (metis fst_conv)
    from this stepâ‡©2' show ?thesis using trancl_trans by fast
  next 
    case (introâ‡©3)
    from introâ‡©3 step.prems step.hyps(1) step.hyps(3) step.hyps(4) obtain memâ‡©2'' where
        step'': "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ©" and 
        rel'': "âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©1''âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ©"
    proof (induct arbitrary: rule: my_â„›â‡©3_aux_induct)
      case (introâ‡©1 câ‡©1'1' mds' memâ‡©1' Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' câ‡©1'1 memâ‡©2' câ‡©1'2 Î“'' ğ’®'' P'')
      from introâ‡©1(1) obtain Î“v ğ’®v Pv where pre_props: 
        "âŠ¢ Î“v,ğ’®v,Pv {câ‡©1'1} Î“''',ğ’®''',P'''" 
        "tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“v ğ’®v Pv"
        "memâ‡©1' =â‡˜Î“vâ‡™ memâ‡©2'"
        "pred Pv memâ‡©1'"
        "pred Pv memâ‡©2'"
        "câ‡©1'1 = câ‡©1'1'"
        "âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“v. x âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“v x)) memâ‡©1' â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1' x"
        using â„›â‡©1.cases by blast
      from this introâ‡©1 have typed: "âŠ¢ Î“v,ğ’®v,Pv {câ‡©1'1 ;; câ‡©1'2} Î“'',ğ’®'',P''"
        using has_type.seq_type by blast
      from this pre_props â€¹no_await câ‡©1â€º â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1'1 ;; câ‡©1'2, mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©â€º introâ‡©1(13)
        obtain memâ‡©2'' where 
               step: "âŸ¨câ‡©1'1 ;; câ‡©1'2, mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ© âˆ§ 
                      âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©1''âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“'',ğ’®'',P''â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ©"
        using no_await_trancl bisim_simple_â„›â‡©u by (metis fst_conv)
      from this introâ‡©1(3) show ?case using no_await_trancl bisim_simple_â„›â‡©u by blast
    next 
      case (introâ‡©3 câ‡©1'1' mds' memâ‡©1' Î“''' ğ’®''' P''' câ‡©1'1 memâ‡©2' câ‡©1'2 Î“'' ğ’®'' P'')
      from introâ‡©3(1) obtain Î“v ğ’®v Pv where pre_props: 
        "âŠ¢ Î“v,ğ’®v,Pv {câ‡©1'1} Î“''',ğ’®''',P'''" 
        "tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“v ğ’®v Pv"
        "memâ‡©1' =â‡˜Î“vâ‡™ memâ‡©2'"
        "pred Pv memâ‡©1'"
        "pred Pv memâ‡©2'"
        "câ‡©1'1 = câ‡©1'1'"
        "âˆ€xâˆˆdom Î“v. x âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ type_max (the (Î“v x)) memâ‡©1' â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1' x"
        by (induct arbitrary: rule: my_â„›â‡©3_aux_induct) 
           (blast elim: â„›â‡©1.cases, blast) 
      from this introâ‡©1 have typed: "âŠ¢ Î“v,ğ’®v,Pv {câ‡©1'1 ;; câ‡©1'2} Î“'',ğ’®'',P''"
        using has_type.seq_type introâ‡©3.hyps(3) by blast

      from this pre_props â€¹no_await câ‡©1â€º â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1'1 ;; câ‡©1'2, mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©â€º introâ‡©3
        obtain memâ‡©2'' where 
        step: "âŸ¨câ‡©1'1 ;; câ‡©1'2, mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ© âˆ§ 
               âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©1''âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“'',ğ’®'',P''â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ©"   
      proof -
        assume a1: "â‹€memâ‡©2''. âŸ¨câ‡©1'1 ;; câ‡©1'2, mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ© âˆ§ 
                               âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©1''âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“'',ğ’®'',P''â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds'', memâ‡©2''âŸ© âŸ¹ thesis"
        thus ?thesis using introâ‡©3.prems(11)
          using a1 by (metis (no_types) pre_props(2-)
                       â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1'1 ;; câ‡©1'2, mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©â€º  â€¹no_await câ‡©1â€º 
                       bisim_simple_â„›â‡©u fst_conv no_await_trancl typed)
      qed
      from this introâ‡©3 show ?case using no_await_trancl bisim_simple_â„›â‡©u by blast
    qed
    thus ?thesis 
      by (meson stepâ‡©2' trancl_trans) 
  qed
qed

(* This is the main part of the proof and used in â„›â‡©1_weak_bisim: *)
lemma â„›_typed_step:
  "âŸ¦ âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { câ‡©1 } Î“',ğ’®',P' ;
  tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P; memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2; pred P memâ‡©1;
        pred P memâ‡©2; tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1;
     âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
   (âˆƒ câ‡©2' memâ‡©2'. âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§
                 âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©)"
proof (induct arbitrary: mds câ‡©1' rule: has_type.induct)
  case (seq_type Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©1 Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' câ‡©2 Î“' ğ’®' P' mds)
  show ?case
  proof (cases "câ‡©1 = Stop")
    assume "câ‡©1 = Stop"
    hence [simp]: "câ‡©1' = câ‡©2" "mds' = mds" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1"
      using seq_type
      by (auto simp: seq_stop_elim)
    from seq_type â€¹câ‡©1 = Stopâ€º have "context_equiv Î“ P Î“''" and "ğ’® = ğ’®''" and "P âŠ¢ P''" and
                                   "(âˆ€mds. tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed  mds Î“'' ğ’® P'')"
      by (metis stop_cxt)+
    hence "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { câ‡©2 } Î“',ğ’®',P'"
      apply -
      apply(rule sub)
          using seq_type(3) apply simp
         by auto
    have "âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
      apply (rule â„›â‡©1.intro [of Î“])
           apply(rule â€¹âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { câ‡©2 } Î“',ğ’®',P'â€º)
          using seq_type by auto
    thus ?case
      using â„›.introâ‡©1
      apply clarify
      apply (rule_tac x = câ‡©2 in exI)
      apply (rule_tac x = memâ‡©2 in exI)
      by (auto simp: â€¹câ‡©1 = Stopâ€º seq_stop_evalâ‡©w  â„›.introâ‡©1)
  next
    assume "câ‡©1 â‰  Stop"
    with â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©â€º obtain câ‡©1'' where câ‡©1''_props:
      "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© âˆ§ câ‡©1' = câ‡©1'' ;; câ‡©2"
      by (metis seq_elim)
    with seq_type(2) obtain câ‡©2'' memâ‡©2' where câ‡©2''_props:
      "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§ âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“'',ğ’®'',P''â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
      using seq_type.prems(1) seq_type.prems(2) seq_type.prems(3) seq_type.prems(4) seq_type.prems(5) by presburger
    hence "âŸ¨câ‡©1'' ;; câ‡©2, mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2'' ;; câ‡©2, mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
      apply (rule conjE)
      apply (erule â„›_elim, auto)
       apply (metis â„›.introâ‡©3 â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©1 seq_type(3))
      by (metis â„›.introâ‡©3 â„›â‡©3_aux.introâ‡©3 seq_type(3))
    moreover
    from câ‡©2''_props have "âŸ¨câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2'' ;; câ‡©2, mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
      by (metis evalâ‡©w.seq)
    ultimately show ?case
      by (metis câ‡©1''_props)
  qed
next
  case (anno_type Î“' Î“ ğ’® upd ğ’®' P' P c Î“'' ğ’®'' P'' mds)
  have "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“'â‡™ memâ‡©2"
  proof(clarsimp simp: tyenv_eq_def)
    fix x  
    assume a: "type_max (to_total Î“' x) memâ‡©1 = Low"
    hence "type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 = Low"
    proof -
      from â€¹pred P memâ‡©1â€º have "pred P' memâ‡©1"
        using anno_type.hyps(3)
        by(auto simp: restrict_preds_to_vars_def pred_def)
      with subtype_sound[OF anno_type.hyps(7)] a 
      show ?thesis
        using less_eq_Sec_def by metis
    qed
    thus " memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
      using anno_type.prems(2)
      unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
  qed
  
  have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed (update_modes upd mds) Î“' ğ’®' P'"
    using anno_type
    apply auto
    by (metis tyenv_wellformed_mode_update)
  moreover
  have pred: "pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1"
    using anno_type
    by (auto simp: pred_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  moreover
  have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P memâ‡©1 âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ 
        tyenv_sec (update_modes upd mds) Î“' memâ‡©1"
    apply(rule impI)
    apply(rule tyenv_sec_mode_update)
            using anno_type apply fastforce
           using anno_type pred apply fastforce
          using anno_type apply fastforce
         using anno_type apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
        using anno_type apply fastforce
       apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
     using anno_type apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
    by simp  
  ultimately obtain câ‡©2' memâ‡©2' where "(âŸ¨c, update_modes upd mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§
    âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“'',ğ’®'',P''â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©)"
    using anno_type
    apply auto    
    using â€¹memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“'â‡™ memâ‡©2â€º local.pred_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def upd_elim by fastforce
  thus ?case
    apply (rule_tac x = câ‡©2' in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x = memâ‡©2' in exI)
    apply auto
    by (metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w.decl)
next
  case stop_type
  with stop_no_eval show ?case by auto
next
  case (skip_type Î“ ğ’® P mds)
  moreover
  with skip_type have [simp]: "mds' = mds" "câ‡©1' = Stop" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1"
    using skip_elim
    by (metis, metis, metis)
  with skip_type have "âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
    by auto
  thus ?case
    using â„›.introâ‡©1 and unannotated [where c = Skip and E = "[]"]
    apply auto
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) â„›.introâ‡©1 old.prod.case skip_evalâ‡©w)
next (* assignâ‡©1 *)
  case (assignâ‡©1 x Î“ e t P P' ğ’® mds)
  hence upd [simp]: "câ‡©1' = Stop" "mds' = mds" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)"
    using assign_elim
    by (auto, metis)
  from assignâ‡©1(2) upd have ğ’_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©1' x"
    by auto
  have dma_eq [simp]: "dma memâ‡©1 = dma memâ‡©1'"
    using dma_ğ’ assignâ‡©1(2) by simp
  have "memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e) =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)"
  unfolding tyenv_eq_def
  proof(clarify)
    fix v
    assume is_Low': "type_max (to_total Î“ v) (memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) = Low"
    show "(memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) v = (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)) v"
    proof(cases "v âˆˆ dom Î“")
      assume [simp]: "v âˆˆ dom Î“"
      then obtain t' where [simp]: "Î“ v = Some t'" by force
      hence [simp]: "(to_total Î“ v) = t'"
        unfolding to_total_def by (auto split: if_splits)
      have "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
        apply(rule ğ’_eq_type_max_eq)
         using â€¹Î“ v = Some t'â€º assignâ‡©1(6) 
         unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def
         apply (metis â€¹v âˆˆ dom Î“â€º option.sel)
                
        using assignâ‡©1(2) apply simp
        done
      with is_Low' have is_Low: "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
        by simp
      from assignâ‡©1(1) â€¹v âˆˆ dom Î“â€º have "x â‰  v" by auto
      thus ?thesis
        apply simp
        using is_Low assignâ‡©1(7) unfolding tyenv_eq_def by auto
    next
      assume "v âˆ‰ dom Î“"
      hence [simp]: "â‹€mem. type_max (to_total Î“ v) mem = dma mem v"
        unfolding to_total_def by simp
      with is_Low' have "dma memâ‡©1' v = Low" by simp
      with dma_eq have dma_v_Low: "dma memâ‡©1 v = Low" by simp
      hence is_Low: "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low" by simp
      show ?thesis
      proof(cases "x = v")
        assume "x â‰  v"
        thus ?thesis
          apply simp
          using is_Low assignâ‡©1(7) unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
      next
        assume "x = v"
        thus ?thesis
          apply simp
          apply(rule evâ‡©A_eq)
              apply(rule assignâ‡©1(7))
             apply(rule assignâ‡©1(8))
            apply(rule assignâ‡©1(3))
           apply(rule assignâ‡©1(4))
          using dma_v_Low by simp
      qed
    qed
  qed

  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® P'"
    using upd tyenv_wellformed_preds_update assignâ‡©1 by metis
  moreover have "pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©1 upd by metis

  moreover have "pred P memâ‡©2 âŸ¶ pred P' (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e))"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©1 upd by metis
    
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P  âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1'"
    using tyenv_sec_eq[OF ğ’_eq, where Î“=Î“]
    unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast

  ultimately have â„›':
    "âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,P'â‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    apply -
    apply (rule â„›.introâ‡©1, auto simp: assignâ‡©1 simp del: dma_eq)
    done

  have a: "âŸ¨x â† e, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
  by (auto, metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.assign)

  from â„›' a show ?case
    using â€¹câ‡©1' = Stopâ€º and â€¹memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)â€º
    by blast
next (* assignâ‡©ğ’ *)
  case (assignâ‡©ğ’ x Î“ e t P P' ğ’® mds)
  hence upd [simp]: "câ‡©1' = Stop" "mds' = mds" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)"
    using assign_elim
    by (auto, metis)
  have "memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e) =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)"
  unfolding tyenv_eq_def
  proof(clarify)
    fix v
    assume is_Low': "type_max (to_total Î“ v) (memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) = Low"
    show "(memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) v = (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)) v"
    proof(cases "v âˆˆ dom Î“")
      assume in_dom [simp]: "v âˆˆ dom Î“"
      then obtain t' where Î“v [simp]: "Î“ v = Some t'" by force
      hence [simp]: "(to_total Î“ v) = t'"
        unfolding to_total_def by (auto split: if_splits)
      from assignâ‡©ğ’(4) have x_nin_C: "x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'"
        using in_dom Î“v 
        by (metis option.sel snd_conv)
      have Î“v_wf: "type_wellformed t'"
        using in_dom Î“v assignâ‡©ğ’(7) unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def
        by (metis option.sel)
        
      with x_nin_C have f_eq: "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
        using vars_of_type_eq_type_max_eq by simp
      with is_Low' have is_Low: "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
        by simp  
      from assignâ‡©ğ’(1) â€¹v âˆˆ dom Î“â€º assignâ‡©ğ’(7) have "x â‰  v"
        by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      thus ?thesis
        apply simp
        using is_Low assignâ‡©ğ’(8) unfolding tyenv_eq_def by auto
    next
      assume nin_dom: "v âˆ‰ dom Î“"
      hence [simp]: "â‹€mem. type_max (to_total Î“ v) mem = dma mem v"
        unfolding to_total_def  by simp
      with is_Low' have "dma memâ‡©1' v = Low" by simp
      show ?thesis
      proof(cases "x = v")
        assume "x = v"
        thus ?thesis
          apply simp
          apply(rule evâ‡©A_eq')
             apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’(8))
            apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’(9))
           apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’(2))
          by(rule assignâ‡©ğ’(3))
      next
        assume [simp]: "x â‰  v"
        show ?thesis
        proof(cases "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v")
          assume in_ğ’_vars: "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v"
          hence "v âˆ‰ ğ’"
            using ğ’_vars_ğ’ by auto
          with nin_dom have "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®"
            using assignâ‡©ğ’(7)
            by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def stable_def)
          with in_ğ’_vars have "P âŠ¢ (to_total Î“ v)"
            using assignâ‡©ğ’(6) by blast
          with assignâ‡©ğ’(9) have "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
            by(auto simp: type_max_def pred_def pred_entailment_def)
          thus ?thesis
            using not_sym[OF â€¹x â‰  vâ€º]
            apply simp
            using assignâ‡©ğ’(8)
            unfolding tyenv_eq_def by auto
        next
          assume "x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars v"
          with is_Low' have "dma memâ‡©1 v = Low"
            using dma_ğ’_vars â€¹â‹€mem. type_max (to_total Î“ v) mem = dma mem vâ€º
            by (metis fun_upd_other)
          thus ?thesis
            using not_sym[OF â€¹x â‰  vâ€º]
            apply simp
            using assignâ‡©ğ’(8)
            unfolding tyenv_eq_def by auto            
        qed
      qed
    qed
  qed

  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' Î“ ğ’® P'"
    using upd tyenv_wellformed_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ by metis
  moreover have "pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ upd by metis
  moreover have "pred P memâ‡©2 âŸ¶ pred P' (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e))"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©ğ’ upd by metis
  moreover have "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âˆ§ pred P memâ‡©1 âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1 âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds' Î“ memâ‡©1'"
  proof(clarify)
    fix v t'
    assume wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    assume pred: "pred P memâ‡©1"
    hence pred': "pred P' memâ‡©1'" using â€¹pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1'â€º by blast
    assume sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1"
    assume Î“v: "Î“ v = Some t'"
    assume readable': "v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    with upd have readable: "v âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite" by simp
    with wf have "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®" by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
    show "type_max (the (Î“ v)) memâ‡©1' â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1' v"
    proof(cases "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v")
      assume "x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v"
      with assignâ‡©ğ’(6) â€¹v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®â€º have "(to_total Î“ v) â‰¤:â‡©P' (dma_type v)" by blast
      from pred' Î“v subtype_sound[OF this] show ?thesis
        using type_max_dma_type by(auto simp: to_total_def split: if_splits)
    next
      assume "x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars v"
      hence "âˆ€v'âˆˆğ’_vars v. memâ‡©1 v' = memâ‡©1' v'"
        using upd by auto
      hence dma_eq: "dma memâ‡©1 v = dma memâ‡©1' v"
        by(rule dma_ğ’_vars)
      from Î“v assignâ‡©ğ’(4) have "x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'" by force
      have "type_wellformed t'"
        using wf Î“v by(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
      with â€¹x âˆ‰ vars_of_type t'â€º upd have f_eq: "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
        using vars_of_type_eq_type_max_eq by fastforce
      from sec Î“v readable have "type_max t' memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 v"
        by auto
      with f_eq dma_eq Î“v show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed

  ultimately have â„›':
    "âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,P'â‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    apply -
    apply (rule â„›.introâ‡©1, auto simp: assignâ‡©ğ’)
    done

  have a: "âŸ¨x â† e, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
  by (auto, metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.assign)

  from â„›' a show ?case
    using â€¹câ‡©1' = Stopâ€º and â€¹memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)â€º
    by blast
next (* assignâ‡©2 *)
  case (assignâ‡©2 x Î“ e t ğ’® P' P mds)
  have upd [simp]: "câ‡©1' = Stop" "mds' = mds" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)"
    using assign_elim[OF assignâ‡©2(11)]
    by auto
  from â€¹x âˆˆ dom Î“â€º â€¹tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® Pâ€º
  have x_nin_ğ’: "x âˆ‰ ğ’"
    by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
  hence dma_eq [simp]: "dma memâ‡©1' = dma memâ‡©1"
    using dma_ğ’ assignâ‡©2
    by auto
    
  let ?Î“' = "Î“ (x â†¦ t)"
  have "âŸ¨x â† e, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    using assignâ‡©2
    by (metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w_simplep.assign evalâ‡©wp.unannotated evalâ‡©wp_evalâ‡©w_eq)
    
  moreover
  have tyenv_eq': "memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e) =â‡˜Î“(x â†¦ t)â‡™ memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)"
  unfolding tyenv_eq_def
  proof(clarify)
    fix v
    assume is_Low': "type_max (to_total (Î“(x â†¦ t)) v) (memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) = Low"
    show "(memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) v = (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)) v"
    proof(cases "v = x")
      assume neq: "v â‰  x"
      hence "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
      proof(cases "v âˆˆ dom Î“")
        assume "v âˆˆ dom Î“"
        then obtain t' where [simp]: "Î“ v = Some t'" by force
        hence [simp]: "(to_total Î“ v) = t'"
          unfolding to_total_def by (auto split: if_splits)
        hence [simp]: "(to_total ?Î“' v) = t'"
          using neq by(auto simp: to_total_def)
        have "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
          apply(rule ğ’_eq_type_max_eq)
            using assignâ‡©2(6) 
            apply(clarsimp simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
            using â€¹v âˆˆ dom Î“â€º â€¹Î“ v = Some t'â€º apply(metis option.sel)
           using x_nin_ğ’ by simp
        from this is_Low' neq neq[THEN not_sym] show "type_max (to_total Î“ v) memâ‡©1 = Low"
          by auto
      next
        assume "v âˆ‰ dom Î“"
        with is_Low' neq
        have "dma memâ‡©1' v = Low"
          by(auto simp: to_total_def  split: if_splits)
        with dma_eq â€¹v âˆ‰ dom Î“â€º show ?thesis
          by(auto simp: to_total_def  split: if_splits)
      qed
      with neq assignâ‡©2(7) show "(memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)) v = (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)) v"
        by(auto simp: tyenv_eq_def)
    next
      assume eq[simp]: "v = x"
      with is_Low' â€¹x âˆˆ dom Î“â€º have t_Low': "type_max t memâ‡©1' = Low"
        by(auto simp: to_total_def split: if_splits)
      have wf_t: "type_wellformed t"
        using type_aexpr_type_wellformed assignâ‡©2(2) assignâ‡©2(6)
        by(fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def)
      with t_Low' â€¹x âˆ‰ ğ’â€º have t_Low: "type_max t memâ‡©1 = Low"
        using ğ’_eq_type_max_eq
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) fun_upd_other upd(3))
      show ?thesis
      proof(simp, rule eval_vars_detâ‡©A, clarify)
        fix y
        assume in_vars: "y âˆˆ aexp_vars e"
        have "type_max (to_total Î“ y) memâ‡©1 = Low"
        proof -
          from t_Low in_vars assignâ‡©2(2) show ?thesis
            apply -
            apply(erule type_aexpr.cases)
            using Sec.exhaust by(auto simp: type_max_def  split: if_splits)
        qed
        thus "memâ‡©1 y = memâ‡©2 y"
          using assignâ‡©2 unfolding tyenv_eq_def by blast
      qed
    qed
  qed

  from upd have ty: " âŠ¢ ?Î“',ğ’®,P' {câ‡©1'} ?Î“',ğ’®,P'"
    by (metis stop_type)
  have wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¶ tyenv_wellformed mds' ?Î“' ğ’® P'"
  proof
    assume tyenv_wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    hence wf: "types_wellformed Î“"
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    hence  "type_wellformed t"
      using assignâ‡©2(2) type_aexpr_type_wellformed
      by blast
    with wf have wf': "types_wellformed ?Î“'"
      using types_wellformed_update by metis
    from tyenv_wf have stable': "types_stable ?Î“' ğ’®"
      using types_stable_update
            assignâ‡©2(3)
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    have m: "mds_consistent mds Î“ ğ’® P"
      using tyenv_wf unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
    from assignâ‡©2(4) assignâ‡©2(1)
    have "mds_consistent mds' (Î“(x â†¦ t)) ğ’® P'"
      apply(rule mds_consistent_preds_tyenv_update)
      using upd m by simp
    from wf' stable' this show "tyenv_wellformed mds' ?Î“' ğ’® P'"
      unfolding tyenv_wellformed_def by blast
  qed
  have p: "pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¶ pred P' memâ‡©1'"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©2 upd by metis
  have pâ‡©2: "pred P memâ‡©2 âŸ¶ pred P' (memâ‡©2(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e))"
    using pred_preds_update assignâ‡©2 upd by metis
  have sec: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P âŸ¹ pred P memâ‡©1 âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1 âŸ¹ tyenv_sec mds' ?Î“' memâ‡©1'"
  proof(clarify)
    assume wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
    assume pred: "pred P memâ‡©1"
    assume sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1"
    from pred p have pred': "pred P' memâ‡©1'" by blast
    fix v t'
    assume Î“v: "(Î“(x â†¦ t)) v = Some t'"
    assume "v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    show "type_max (the ((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v)) memâ‡©1' â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1' v"
    proof(cases "v = x")
      assume [simp]: "v = x"
      hence [simp]: "(the ((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v)) = t" and t_def: "t = t'"
        using Î“v by auto
      from â€¹v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWriteâ€º upd wf have readable: "v âˆ‰ snd ğ’®"
        by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      with assignâ‡©2(5) have "t â‰¤:â‡©P' (dma_type x)" by fastforce
      with pred' show ?thesis
        using type_max_dma_type subtype_sound
        by fastforce
    next
      assume neq: "v â‰  x"
      hence [simp]: "((Î“(x â†¦ t)) v) = Î“ v"
        by simp
      with Î“v have Î“v: "Î“ v = Some t'" by simp
      with sec upd â€¹v âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWriteâ€º have f_leq: "type_max t' memâ‡©1 â‰¤ dma memâ‡©1 v"
        by auto
      have ğ’_eq: "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’. memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©1' x"
        using wf assignâ‡©2(1) upd by(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
      hence dma_eq: "dma memâ‡©1 = dma memâ‡©1'"
        by(rule dma_ğ’)
      have f_eq: "type_max t' memâ‡©1 = type_max t' memâ‡©1'"
        apply(rule ğ’_eq_type_max_eq)
         using Î“v wf apply(force simp: tyenv_wellformed_def types_wellformed_def)
        by(rule ğ’_eq)     
      from neq Î“v f_leq dma_eq f_eq show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed

  have "âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜?Î“',ğ’®,P'â‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    apply(rule â„›â‡©1.intro)
         apply blast
        using wf assignâ‡©2 apply fastforce
       apply(rule tyenv_eq')
      using p assignâ‡©2 apply fastforce
     using pâ‡©2 assignâ‡©2 apply fastforce
    using sec assignâ‡©2
    using upd(2) upd(3) by blast
    
  ultimately have "âŸ¨x â† e, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    "âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©1 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“(x â†¦ t),ğ’®,P'â‡™ âŸ¨Stop, mds', memâ‡©2 (x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 e)âŸ©"
    using â„›.introâ‡©1
    by auto
  thus ?case
    using â€¹mds' = mdsâ€º â€¹câ‡©1' = Stopâ€º â€¹memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1(x := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 e)â€º
    by blast
next (* if *)
  case (if_type Î“ e t P ğ’® th Î“' ğ’®' P' el Î“'' P'' Î“''' P''')
  let ?P = "if (evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e) then P +â‡©ğ’® e else P +â‡©ğ’® (bexp_neg e)"
  from â€¹âŸ¨Stmt.If e th el, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©â€º have ty: "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,?P {câ‡©1'} Î“''',ğ’®',P'''"
  proof (rule if_elim)
    assume "câ‡©1' = th" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1" "mds' = mds" "evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e"
    with if_type(3)
    show ?thesis
      apply simp
      apply(erule sub)
         using if_type apply simp+
      done
  next
    assume "câ‡©1' = el" "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1" "mds' = mds" "Â¬ evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e"
    with if_type(5)
    show ?thesis
      apply simp
      apply(erule sub)
         using if_type apply simp+
      done
  qed
  have evâ‡©B_eq [simp]: "evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e = evâ‡©B memâ‡©2 e"
    apply(rule evâ‡©B_eq')
       apply(rule â€¹memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2â€º)
      apply(rule â€¹pred P memâ‡©1â€º)
     apply(rule â€¹Î“ âŠ¢â‡©b e âˆˆ tâ€º)
    by(rule â€¹ P âŠ¢ tâ€º)
  have "(âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ â„› Î“''' ğ’®' P'''"
    apply (rule introâ‡©1)
    apply clarify
    apply (rule â„›â‡©1.intro [where Î“ = Î“ and Î“' = Î“''' and ğ’® = ğ’® and P = ?P])
         apply(rule ty)
        using â€¹tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® Pâ€º
        apply(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def add_pred_def)[1]
       apply(rule â€¹memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡™ memâ‡©2â€º)       
      using â€¹pred P memâ‡©1â€º apply(fastforce simp: pred_def add_pred_def bexp_neg_negates)
     using â€¹pred P memâ‡©2â€º apply(fastforce simp: pred_def add_pred_def bexp_neg_negates)
    by(rule â€¹tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1â€º)

  show ?case
  proof -
    from evâ‡©B_eq if_type(13) have "(âŸ¨If e th el, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©)"
      apply (cases "evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e")
       apply (subgoal_tac "câ‡©1' = th")
        apply clarify
        apply (metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w_simplep.if_true evalâ‡©wp.unannotated evalâ‡©wp_evalâ‡©w_eq if_type(8))
       using if_type.prems(6) apply blast
      apply (subgoal_tac "câ‡©1' = el")
       apply (metis (hide_lams, mono_tags) cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.if_false if_type(8))
      using if_type.prems(6) by blast
    with â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“''',ğ’®',P'''â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©â€º show ?thesis  
    by (metis if_elim if_type.prems(6))    
  qed
next (* while *)
  case (while_type Î“ e t P ğ’® c)
  hence [simp]: "câ‡©1' = (If e (c ;; While e c) Stop)" and
    [simp]: "mds' = mds" and
    [simp]: "memâ‡©1' = memâ‡©1"
    by (auto simp: while_elim)

  with while_type have "âŸ¨While e c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
    by (metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w_simplep.while evalâ‡©wp.unannotated evalâ‡©wp_evalâ‡©w_eq)
    
  moreover have ty: " âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P {câ‡©1'} Î“,ğ’®,P"
    apply simp
    apply(rule if_type)
              apply(rule while_type(1))
             apply(rule while_type(2))
            apply(rule seq_type)
             apply(rule while_type(3))
            apply(rule has_type.while_type)
              apply(rule while_type(1))
             apply(rule while_type(2))
            apply(rule while_type(3))
           apply(rule stop_type)
          apply simp+
      apply(rule add_pred_entailment)
     apply simp
    apply(blast intro!: add_pred_subset tyenv_wellformed_subset)
    done
  moreover
  have "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§1â‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
    apply (rule â„›â‡©1.intro [where Î“ = Î“])
         apply(rule ty)
        using while_type apply simp+
    done
  hence "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
    using â„›.introâ‡©1 by auto
  ultimately show ?case
    by fastforce
next
  case (sub Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 c Î“â‡©1' ğ’®' Pâ‡©1' Î“â‡©2 Pâ‡©2 Î“â‡©2' Pâ‡©2' mds câ‡©1')
  have imp: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©2 ğ’® Pâ‡©2 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©2 memâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©2 memâ‡©2 âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©2 memâ‡©1 âŸ¹ 
             tyenv_wellformed mds Î“â‡©1 ğ’® Pâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©1 memâ‡©1 âˆ§ pred Pâ‡©1 memâ‡©2 âˆ§ tyenv_sec mds Î“â‡©1 memâ‡©1"
    apply(rule conjI)
     using sub(5) sub(4) tyenv_wellformed_sub unfolding pred_def
     apply blast
    apply(rule conjI)
     using local.pred_def pred_entailment_def sub.hyps(7) apply auto[1]
    apply(rule conjI)
     using local.pred_def pred_entailment_def sub.hyps(7) apply auto[1]
    using sub(3) context_equiv_tyenv_sec unfolding pred_def by blast

  have tyenv_eq: "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜Î“â‡©1â‡™ memâ‡©2"
    using context_equiv_tyenv_eq sub by blast
    
  from imp tyenv_eq obtain câ‡©2' memâ‡©2' where câ‡©2'_props: "âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
    "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“â‡©1',ğ’®',Pâ‡©1'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
    using sub by blast 
  with R_equiv_entailment â€¹Pâ‡©1' âŠ¢ Pâ‡©2'â€º show ?case
    using sub.hyps(6) sub.hyps(5) by blast
next case (await_type Î“ e t P ğ’® c Î“' ğ’®' P')
  from await_type.prems have "evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 e" "no_await c" "is_final câ‡©1'" and step: "âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©"
    using await_elim by simp+
  from await_type.prems â€¹Î“ âŠ¢â‡©b e âˆˆ tâ€º â€¹P âŠ¢ tâ€º have "pred P +â‡©ğ’® e memâ‡©1" "pred P +â‡©ğ’® e memâ‡©2" "evâ‡©B memâ‡©2 e"
    using pred_plus_impl â€¹evâ‡©B memâ‡©1 eâ€º â€¹pred P memâ‡©1â€º evâ‡©B_eq'
    by blast+
  from await_type.prems â€¹Î“ âŠ¢â‡©b e âˆˆ tâ€º â€¹P âŠ¢ tâ€º have wellformed: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P +â‡©ğ’® e"
    apply (unfold add_pred_def)[1]
      apply (case_tac "pred_stable ğ’® e", clarsimp)
        apply (unfold tyenv_wellformed_def, clarsimp)[1]
        apply (unfold mds_consistent_def, clarsimp)[1]
      by clarsimp
  from step â€¹is_final câ‡©1'â€º â€¹no_await câ€º â€¹tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P +â‡©ğ’® eâ€º await_type.prems â€¹pred P +â‡©ğ’® e memâ‡©1â€º â€¹pred P +â‡©ğ’® e memâ‡©2â€º
    obtain câ‡©2' memâ‡©2' where step: "âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â†â‡§+ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©" and 
      rel: "âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©" "is_final câ‡©2'"  
    using â„›_typed_step_plus await_type.hyps(3) is_final_â„›â‡©u_is_final by meson
  from wellformed â€¹is_final câ‡©2'â€º â€¹evâ‡©B memâ‡©2 eâ€º â€¹no_await câ€º â€¹Î“ âŠ¢â‡©b e âˆˆ tâ€º â€¹P âŠ¢ tâ€º â€¹pred P +â‡©ğ’® e memâ‡©2â€º step rel show ?case 
    using evalâ‡©w.intros(4) by blast
qed

(* We can now show that â„›â‡©1 and â„›â‡©3 are weak bisimulations of â„›,: *)
lemma â„›â‡©1_weak_bisim:
  "weak_bisim (â„›â‡©1 Î“' ğ’®' P') (â„› Î“' ğ’®' P')"
  unfolding weak_bisim_def
  apply clarsimp
  apply(erule â„›â‡©1_elim)
  apply(blast intro: â„›_typed_step)
  done


lemma â„›_to_â„›â‡©3: "âŸ¦ âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© ; âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P' âŸ§ âŸ¹
  âŸ¨câ‡©1 ;; c, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§3â‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2 ;; c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  apply (erule â„›_elim)
  by auto


lemma â„›â‡©3_weak_bisim:
  "weak_bisim (â„›â‡©3 Î“' ğ’®' P') (â„› Î“' ğ’®' P')"
proof -
  {
    fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 câ‡©1' mds' memâ‡©1'
    assume case3: "(âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ â„›â‡©3 Î“' ğ’®' P'"
    assume eval: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©"
    have "âˆƒ câ‡©2' memâ‡©2'. âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§ âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
      using case3 eval
      apply simp
      
    proof (induct arbitrary: câ‡©1' rule: â„›â‡©3_aux.induct)
      case (introâ‡©1 câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 c Î“' ğ’®' P')
      hence [simp]: "câ‡©2 = câ‡©1"
        by (metis (lifting) â„›â‡©1_elim)
      thus ?case
      proof (cases "câ‡©1 = Stop")
        assume [simp]: "câ‡©1 = Stop"
        from introâ‡©1(1) show ?thesis
          apply (rule â„›â‡©1_elim)
          apply simp
          apply (rule_tac x = c in exI)
          apply (rule_tac x = memâ‡©2 in exI)
          apply (rule conjI)
           apply (metis â€¹câ‡©1 = Stopâ€º cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w_simplep.seq_stop evalâ‡©wp.unannotated evalâ‡©wp_evalâ‡©w_eq introâ‡©1.prems seq_stop_elim)
          apply (rule â„›.introâ‡©1, clarify)
          apply (subgoal_tac "câ‡©1' = c")
           apply simp
           apply (rule â„›â‡©1.intro)
                apply(rule introâ‡©1(2))
               apply (metis (no_types, lifting) â€¹câ‡©1 = Stopâ€º introâ‡©1.prems seq_stop_elim stop_cxt tyenv_wellformed_sub)
              using â€¹câ‡©1 = Stopâ€º introâ‡©1.prems seq_stop_elim stop_cxt context_equiv_tyenv_eq
              apply metis

             using â€¹câ‡©1 = Stopâ€º introâ‡©1.prems pred_entailment_def seq_stop_elim stop_cxt apply blast
            using pred_entailment_def stop_cxt apply blast
           
           apply (metis (no_types, lifting) â€¹câ‡©1 = Stopâ€º context_equiv_def introâ‡©1.prems less_eq_Sec_def seq_stop_elim stop_cxt subtype_sound type_equiv_def)
          using introâ‡©1.prems seq_stop_elim by auto
      next
        assume "câ‡©1 â‰  Stop"
        from introâ‡©1
        obtain câ‡©1'' where "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© âˆ§ câ‡©1' = (câ‡©1'' ;; c)"
          by (metis â€¹câ‡©1 â‰  Stopâ€º introâ‡©1.prems seq_elim)
        with introâ‡©1
        obtain câ‡©2'' memâ‡©2' where "âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©" "âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
          using â„›â‡©1_weak_bisim and weak_bisim_def
          by blast
        thus ?thesis
          using introâ‡©1(2) â„›_to_â„›â‡©3
          apply (rule_tac x = "câ‡©2'' ;; c" in exI)
          apply (rule_tac x = memâ‡©2' in exI)
          apply (rule conjI)
           apply (metis evalâ‡©w.seq)
          apply auto
          apply (rule â„›.introâ‡©3)
          
          by (simp add: â„›_to_â„›â‡©3 â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© âˆ§ câ‡©1' = câ‡©1'' ;; câ€º)
      qed
    next
      case (introâ‡©3 câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 Î“ ğ’® P câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 c Î“' ğ’®' P')
      thus ?case
        apply (cases "câ‡©1 = Stop")
         apply blast
      proof -
        assume "câ‡©1 â‰  Stop"
        then obtain câ‡©1'' where "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©" "câ‡©1' = (câ‡©1'' ;; c)"
          by (metis introâ‡©3.prems seq_elim)
        then obtain câ‡©2'' memâ‡©2' where "âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©" "âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
          using introâ‡©3(2) by metis
        thus ?thesis
          apply (rule_tac x = "câ‡©2'' ;; c" in exI)
          apply (rule_tac x = memâ‡©2' in exI)
          apply (rule conjI)
           apply (metis evalâ‡©w.seq)
          apply (erule â„›_elim)
            apply simp_all
            apply (metis â„›.introâ‡©3 â„›_to_â„›â‡©3 â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©â€º â€¹câ‡©1' = câ‡©1'' ;; câ€º introâ‡©3(3))
          apply (metis (lifting) â„›.introâ‡©3 â„›_to_â„›â‡©3 â€¹âŸ¨câ‡©1'', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“,ğ’®,Pâ‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2'', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©â€º â€¹câ‡©1' = câ‡©1'' ;; câ€º introâ‡©3(3))
          done
      qed
    qed
  }
  thus ?thesis
    unfolding weak_bisim_def
    by auto
qed

(* Hence â„› is a bisimulation: *)
lemma â„›_bisim: "strong_low_bisim_mm (â„› Î“' ğ’®' P')"
  unfolding strong_low_bisim_mm_def
proof (auto)
  from â„›_sym show "sym (â„› Î“' ğ’®' P')" .
next
  from â„›_closed_glob_consistent show "closed_glob_consistent (â„› Î“' ğ’®' P')" .
next
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 memâ‡©2
  assume "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  thus "memâ‡©1 =â‡˜mdsâ‡™â‡§l memâ‡©2"
    apply (rule â„›_elim)
    by (auto simp: â„›â‡©1_mem_eq â„›â‡©3_mem_eq)
next
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2 memâ‡©2 câ‡©1' mds' memâ‡©1'
  assume eval: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©"
  assume R: "âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  from R show "âˆƒ câ‡©2' memâ‡©2'. âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ© âˆ§
                            âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©"
    apply (rule â„›_elim)
      apply (insert â„›â‡©1_weak_bisim â„›â‡©3_weak_bisim eval weak_bisim_def)
      apply auto
    done
qed

lemma Typed_in_â„›:
  assumes typeable: "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P'"
  assumes wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
  assumes mem_eq: "âˆ€ x. type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 = Low âŸ¶ memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
  assumes predâ‡©1: "pred P memâ‡©1"
  assumes predâ‡©2: "pred P memâ‡©2"
  assumes tyenv_sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1"
  shows "âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â„›â‡§uâ‡˜Î“',ğ’®',P'â‡™ âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  apply (rule â„›.introâ‡©1 [of Î“'])
  apply clarify
  apply (rule â„›â‡©1.intro [of Î“])
       apply(rule typeable)
      apply(rule wf)
     using mem_eq apply(fastforce simp: tyenv_eq_def)
    using assms by simp+

(* We then prove the main soundness theorem using the fact that typeable
    configurations can be related using â„›â‡©1 *)
theorem type_soundness:
  assumes well_typed: "âŠ¢ Î“,ğ’®,P { c } Î“',ğ’®',P'"
  assumes wf: "tyenv_wellformed mds Î“ ğ’® P"
  assumes mem_eq: "âˆ€ x. type_max (to_total Î“ x) memâ‡©1 = Low âŸ¶ memâ‡©1 x = memâ‡©2 x"
  assumes predâ‡©1: "pred P memâ‡©1"
  assumes predâ‡©2: "pred P memâ‡©2"
  assumes tyenv_sec: "tyenv_sec mds Î“ memâ‡©1"
  shows "âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ© â‰ˆ âŸ¨c, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©"
  using â„›_bisim Typed_in_â„›
  by (metis assms mem_eq mm_equiv.simps well_typed)

definition
  Î“_of_mds :: "'Var Mds â‡’ ('Var,'BExp) TyEnv"
where
  "Î“_of_mds mds â‰¡ (Î»x. if x âˆ‰ ğ’ âˆ§ x âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite âˆª mds AsmNoReadOrWrite then
                         if x âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite then 
                           Some ({pred_False}) 
                         else
                           Some (dma_type x) 
                       else None)"

definition
  ğ’®_of_mds :: "'Var Mds â‡’ 'Var Stable"
where
  "ğ’®_of_mds mds â‰¡ (mds AsmNoWrite, mds AsmNoReadOrWrite)"

definition
  mds_yields_stable_types :: "'Var Mds â‡’ bool"
where
  "mds_yields_stable_types mds â‰¡ âˆ€x. x âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite âˆª mds AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶
                                     (âˆ€vâˆˆğ’_vars x. v âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite âˆª mds AsmNoReadOrWrite)"
  
(* The typing relation for lists of commands ("thread pools"). *)
inductive 
  type_global :: "(('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt Ã— 'Var Mds) list â‡’ bool"
  ("âŠ¢ _" [120] 1000)
where
  "âŸ¦ list_all (Î» (c,m). (âˆƒ Î“' ğ’®' P'. âŠ¢ (Î“_of_mds m),(ğ’®_of_mds m),{} { c } Î“',ğ’®',P') âˆ§ mds_yields_stable_types m) cs ;
       âˆ€ mem. sound_mode_use (cs, mem)
    âŸ§ âŸ¹
    type_global cs"

                                     
inductive_cases type_global_elim: "âŠ¢ cs"

lemma of_mds_tyenv_wellformed: "mds_yields_stable_types m âŸ¹ tyenv_wellformed m (Î“_of_mds m) (ğ’®_of_mds m) {}"
  apply(auto simp: tyenv_wellformed_def Î“_of_mds_def ğ’®_of_mds_def mds_consistent_def stable_def
                   types_wellformed_def types_stable_def  mds_yields_stable_types_def 
                   type_wellformed_def dma_ğ’_vars ğ’_def bexp_vars_pred_False ğ’_vars_correct
             split: if_splits)
  done

lemma Î“_of_mds_tyenv_sec:
  "tyenv_sec m (Î“_of_mds m) memâ‡©1"
  apply(auto simp: Î“_of_mds_def)
  done

lemma type_max_pred_False [simp]:
  "type_max {pred_False} mem = High"
  apply(simp add: type_max_def pred_False_is_False)
  done
  
lemma typed_secure:
  "âŸ¦ âŠ¢ (Î“_of_mds m),(ğ’®_of_mds m),{} { c } Î“',ğ’®',P'; mds_yields_stable_types m âŸ§ âŸ¹ com_sifum_secure (c,m)"
  apply (clarsimp simp: com_sifum_secure_def low_indistinguishable_def)
  apply (erule type_soundness)
      apply(erule of_mds_tyenv_wellformed)
     apply(auto simp: to_total_def split: if_split simp: Î“_of_mds_def low_mds_eq_def)[1]
    apply(fastforce simp: pred_def type_max_def)
   apply(fastforce simp: pred_def)
  by(rule Î“_of_mds_tyenv_sec)

lemma list_all_set: "âˆ€ x âˆˆ set xs. P x âŸ¹ list_all P xs"
  by (metis (lifting) list_all_iff)

theorem type_soundness_global:
  assumes typeable: "âŠ¢ cs"
  shows "prog_sifum_secure_cont cs"
  using typeable
  apply (rule type_global_elim)
  apply (subgoal_tac "âˆ€ c âˆˆ set cs. com_sifum_secure c")
   apply(rule sifum_compositionality_cont)
    using list_all_set apply fastforce
   apply fastforce
  apply(drule list_all_iff[THEN iffD1])
  apply clarsimp
  apply(rename_tac c m)
  apply(drule_tac x="(c,m)" in bspec)
   apply assumption
  apply clarsimp
  using typed_secure by blast

end
end

Theory LocallySoundModeUse

(*
TiTitle: Value-Dependent SIFUM-Type-Systems
Authors: Toby Murray, Robert Sison, Edward Pierzchalski, Christine Rizkallah
(Based on the SIFUM-Type-Systems AFP entry, whose authors
 are: Sylvia Grewe, Heiko Mantel, Daniel Schoepe)
*)
section â€¹Type System for Ensuring Locally Sound Use of Modesâ€º

theory LocallySoundModeUse
imports Security Language
begin

subsection â€¹Typing Rulesâ€º

locale sifum_modes = 
  sifum_lang_no_dma evâ‡©A evâ‡©B aexp_vars bexp_vars + sifum_security dma ğ’_vars ğ’ evalâ‡©w undefined
  for evâ‡©A :: "('Var, 'Val) Mem â‡’ 'AExp â‡’ 'Val"
  and evâ‡©B :: "('Var, 'Val) Mem â‡’ 'BExp â‡’ bool"
  and aexp_vars :: "'AExp â‡’ 'Var set"
  and bexp_vars :: "'BExp â‡’ 'Var set"
  and dma :: "('Var,'Val) Mem â‡’ 'Var â‡’ Sec"
  and ğ’_vars :: "'Var â‡’ 'Var set"
  and ğ’ :: "'Var set"

context sifum_modes
begin

abbreviation 
  eval_abv_modes :: "(_, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf â‡’ (_, _, _) LocalConf â‡’ bool"
  (infixl "â†" 70)
where
  "x â† y â‰¡ (x, y) âˆˆ evalâ‡©w"

fun 
  update_annos :: "'Var Mds â‡’ 'Var ModeUpd list â‡’ 'Var Mds"
  (infix "âŠ•" 140)
where
  "update_annos mds [] = mds" |
  "update_annos mds (a # as) = update_annos (update_modes a mds) as"

fun 
  annotate :: "('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt â‡’ 'Var ModeUpd list â‡’ ('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt"
  (infix "âŠ—" 140)
where
  "annotate c [] = c" |
  "annotate c (a # as) = (annotate c as)@[a]"

inductive 
  mode_type :: "'Var Mds â‡’ ('Var, 'AExp, 'BExp) Stmt â‡’ 'Var Mds â‡’ bool" ("âŠ¢ _ { _ } _")
where
  skip: "âŠ¢ mds { Skip âŠ— annos } (mds âŠ• annos)" |
  assign: "âŸ¦ x âˆ‰ mds GuarNoWrite âˆª mds GuarNoReadOrWrite ; aexp_vars e âˆ© mds GuarNoReadOrWrite = {};
             âˆ€v. (x âˆˆ ğ’_vars v âŸ¶ v âˆ‰ mds GuarNoWrite âˆª mds GuarNoReadOrWrite) âˆ§
                 (ğ’_vars v âˆ© aexp_vars e â‰  {} âŸ¶ v âˆ‰ mds GuarNoReadOrWrite)âŸ§ âŸ¹
  âŠ¢ mds { (x â† e) âŠ— annos } (mds âŠ• annos)" |
  if_: "âŸ¦ âŠ¢ (mds âŠ• annos) { câ‡©1 } mds'' ;
          âŠ¢ (mds âŠ• annos) { câ‡©2 } mds'' ;
          bexp_vars e âˆ© mds GuarNoReadOrWrite = {};
          âˆ€ v. ğ’_vars v âˆ© bexp_vars e â‰  {} âŸ¶ v âˆ‰ mds GuarNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
        âŠ¢ mds { If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos } mds''" |
  while: "âŸ¦ mds' = mds âŠ• annos ; âŠ¢ mds' { c } mds' ; bexp_vars e âˆ© mds' GuarNoReadOrWrite = {};
            âˆ€ v. ğ’_vars v âˆ© bexp_vars e â‰  {} âŸ¶ v âˆ‰ mds' GuarNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
  âŠ¢ mds { While e c âŠ— annos } mds'" |
  seq: "âŸ¦ âŠ¢ mds { câ‡©1 } mds' ; âŠ¢ mds' { câ‡©2 } mds'' âŸ§ âŸ¹ âŠ¢ mds { câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2 } mds''" |
  sub: "âŸ¦ âŠ¢ mdsâ‡©2 { c } mdsâ‡©2' ; mdsâ‡©1 â‰¤ mdsâ‡©2 ; mdsâ‡©2' â‰¤ mdsâ‡©1' âŸ§ âŸ¹
  âŠ¢ mdsâ‡©1 { c } mdsâ‡©1'"

subsection â€¹Soundness of the Type Systemâ€º

(* Special case for evaluation with an empty context *)
lemma cxt_eval:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨cxt_to_stmt [] c, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨cxt_to_stmt [] c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©"
  by auto

lemma update_preserves_le:
  "mdsâ‡©1 â‰¤ mdsâ‡©2 âŸ¹ (mdsâ‡©1 âŠ• annos) â‰¤ (mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos)"
proof (induct annos arbitrary: mdsâ‡©1 mdsâ‡©2)
  case Nil
  thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Cons a annos mdsâ‡©1 mdsâ‡©2)
  hence "update_modes a mdsâ‡©1 â‰¤ update_modes a mdsâ‡©2"
    by (case_tac a, auto simp: le_fun_def)
  with Cons show ?case
    by auto
qed

(* Annotations do not affect doesnt_read and doesnt_modify: *)
lemma doesnt_read_annos:
  "doesnt_read_or_modify c x âŸ¹ doesnt_read_or_modify (c âŠ— annos) x"
  unfolding doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def
  apply clarify
  apply (induct annos)
   apply simp
   apply (metis (lifting))
  apply clarsimp
  apply (rule cxt_eval)
  apply (rule evalâ‡©w.decl)
  apply (metis cxt_eval evalâ‡©w.decl upd_elim)+
  done

lemma doesnt_modify_annos:
  "doesnt_modify c x âŸ¹ doesnt_modify (c âŠ— annos) x"
  unfolding doesnt_modify_def
  apply clarsimp
   apply (induct annos)
    apply simp 
   by (metis annotate.simps(2) upd_elim)
  
(* The following part contains some lemmas about evaluation of
   commands annotated using âŠ— and characterisations of loc_reach for
   commands. *)

lemma stop_loc_reach:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨Stop, mds, memâŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds"
  apply (induct rule: loc_reach.induct)
  by (auto simp: stop_no_eval)

lemma stop_doesnt_access:
  "doesnt_modify Stop x âˆ§ doesnt_read_or_modify Stop x"
  unfolding doesnt_modify_def and doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def
  using stop_no_eval
  by auto

lemma skip_eval_step:
  "âŸ¨Skip âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds âŠ• annos, memâŸ©"
  apply (induct annos arbitrary: mds)
   apply simp
   apply (metis cxt_to_stmt.simps(1) evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.skip)
  apply simp
  apply (insert evalâ‡©w.decl)
  apply (rule cxt_eval)
  apply (rule evalâ‡©w.decl)
  by auto

lemma skip_eval_elim:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨Skip âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹ c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âŠ• annos âˆ§ mem' = mem"
  apply (rule ccontr)
  apply (insert skip_eval_step deterministic)
  apply clarify
  apply clarsimp
    by metis+

lemma skip_doesnt_read:
  "doesnt_read_or_modify (Skip âŠ— annos) x"
  apply (rule doesnt_read_annos)
  apply (clarsimp simp: doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def)
  by (metis annotate.simps(1) skip_elim skip_eval_step)+

lemma skip_doesnt_write:
  "doesnt_modify (Skip âŠ— annos) x"
  apply (rule doesnt_modify_annos)
  apply (clarsimp simp: doesnt_modify_def)
  by (metis skip_elim)+

lemma skip_loc_reach:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨Skip âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  (c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = (mds âŠ• annos)) âˆ¨ (c' = Skip âŠ— annos âˆ§ mds' = mds)"
  apply (induct rule: loc_reach.induct)
    apply (metis fst_conv snd_conv)
   apply (metis skip_eval_elim stop_no_eval)
  by metis

lemma skip_doesnt_access:
  "âŸ¦ lc âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨Skip âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© ; lc = âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹ doesnt_read_or_modify c' x âˆ§ doesnt_modify c' x"
  apply (subgoal_tac "(c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = (mds âŠ• annos)) âˆ¨ (c' = Skip âŠ— annos âˆ§ mds' = mds)")
   apply (rule conjI, erule disjE)
     apply (simp add: doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def stop_no_eval)
    apply (metis (lifting) annotate.simps skip_doesnt_read)
   apply (erule disjE)
    apply (simp add: doesnt_modify_def stop_no_eval)
   apply (metis (lifting) annotate.simps skip_doesnt_write)
  by (metis skip_loc_reach)

lemma assign_doesnt_modify:
  "âŸ¦ x â‰  y; x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars y âŸ§ âŸ¹ doesnt_modify ((x â† e) âŠ— annos) y"
  apply (rule doesnt_modify_annos)
  apply (simp add: doesnt_modify_def)
  by (metis assign_elim fun_upd_apply dma_ğ’_vars)
  
lemma assign_annos_eval:
  "âŸ¨(x â† e) âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨Stop, mds âŠ• annos, mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e)âŸ©"
  apply (induct annos arbitrary: mds)
   apply (simp only: annotate.simps update_annos.simps)
   apply (rule cxt_eval)
   apply (rule evalâ‡©w.unannotated)
   apply (rule evalâ‡©w_simple.assign)
  apply (rule cxt_eval)
  apply (simp del: cxt_to_stmt.simps)
  apply (rule evalâ‡©w.decl)
  by auto

lemma assign_annos_eval_elim:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨(x â† e) âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âŠ• annos"
  apply (rule ccontr)
  apply (insert deterministic assign_annos_eval)
  apply clarsimp
  by (metis (lifting))

lemma mem_upd_commute:
  "âŸ¦ x â‰  y âŸ§ âŸ¹ mem (x := vâ‡©1, y := vâ‡©2) = mem (y := vâ‡©2, x := vâ‡©1)"
  by (metis fun_upd_twist)

lemma assign_doesnt_read:
  "âŸ¦ y â‰  x; y âˆ‰ aexp_vars e; x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars y; ğ’_vars y âˆ© aexp_vars e = {} âŸ§ âŸ¹ doesnt_read_or_modify ((x â† e) âŠ— annos) y"
  apply (rule doesnt_read_annos)
proof -
  assume  "y â‰  x"
          "y âˆ‰ aexp_vars e"
          "x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars y"
          "ğ’_vars y âˆ© aexp_vars e = {}"
  thus "doesnt_read_or_modify (x â† e) y"
    unfolding doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def
    apply -
    apply (rule allI)+
    apply (rename_tac mds mem c' mds' mem')
    apply (rule impI)
    apply (subgoal_tac "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e)")
     apply simp
     apply clarify
     apply (rule conjI)
      apply clarify
      apply (subgoal_tac "mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e, y := v) = mem (y := v, x := evâ‡©A mem e)")
       apply simp
       apply (rule cxt_eval)
       apply (rule evalâ‡©w.unannotated)      
       apply (metis evalâ‡©w_simple.assign eval_vars_detâ‡©A fun_upd_apply)
      apply (metis mem_upd_commute)
     apply clarify
     apply (rename_tac va v)
     apply (subgoal_tac "mem (x := evâ‡©A mem e, va := v) = mem (va := v, x := evâ‡©A mem e)")
      apply simp
      apply (rule cxt_eval)
      apply (rule evalâ‡©w.unannotated)
      apply (subgoal_tac "va âˆ‰ aexp_vars e")
       apply (metis evalâ‡©w_simple.assign eval_vars_detâ‡©A fun_upd_apply)
      apply blast
     apply (metis mem_upd_commute)
    apply (metis assign_elim)
    done
qed

lemma assign_loc_reach:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨(x â† e) âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  (c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = (mds âŠ• annos)) âˆ¨ (c' = (x â† e) âŠ— annos âˆ§ mds' = mds)"
  apply (induct rule: loc_reach.induct)
    apply simp_all
  by (metis assign_annos_eval_elim stop_no_eval)

lemma if_doesnt_modify:
  "doesnt_modify (If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos) x"
  apply (rule doesnt_modify_annos)
  by (auto simp: doesnt_modify_def)

lemma vars_evalâ‡©B:
  "x âˆ‰ bexp_vars e âŸ¹ evâ‡©B mem e = evâ‡©B (mem (x := v)) e"
  by (metis (lifting) eval_vars_detâ‡©B fun_upd_other)

lemma if_doesnt_read:
  "x âˆ‰ bexp_vars e âŸ¹ ğ’_vars x âˆ© bexp_vars e = {} âŸ¹ doesnt_read_or_modify (If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos) x"
  apply (rule doesnt_read_annos)
  apply (clarsimp simp: doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def, safe)
   apply (rename_tac mds mem c' mds' mem' v)
   apply (case_tac "evâ‡©B mem e")
    apply (subgoal_tac "c' = câ‡©1 âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem")
     prefer 2
     apply auto[1]
    apply clarsimp
    apply (rule cxt_eval)
    apply (rule evalâ‡©w.unannotated)
    apply (rule evalâ‡©w_simple.if_true)
    apply (metis (lifting) vars_evalâ‡©B)
   apply (subgoal_tac "c' = câ‡©2 âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem")
    prefer 2
    apply auto[1]
   apply clarsimp
   apply (rule cxt_eval)
   apply (rule evalâ‡©w.unannotated)
   apply (rule evalâ‡©w_simple.if_false)
   apply (metis (lifting) vars_evalâ‡©B)
  apply (rename_tac mds mem c' mds' mem' va v)
  apply (case_tac "evâ‡©B mem e")
   apply (subgoal_tac "c' = câ‡©1 âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem")
    prefer 2
    apply auto[1]
   apply clarsimp
   apply (rule cxt_eval)
   apply (rule evalâ‡©w.unannotated)
   apply (rule evalâ‡©w_simple.if_true)
   apply (subgoal_tac "va âˆ‰ bexp_vars e")
    apply (metis (lifting) vars_evalâ‡©B)
   apply blast
  apply (subgoal_tac "c' = câ‡©2 âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem")
   prefer 2
   apply auto[1]
  apply clarsimp
  apply (rule cxt_eval)
  apply (rule evalâ‡©w.unannotated)
  apply (rule evalâ‡©w_simple.if_false)
  apply (subgoal_tac "va âˆ‰ bexp_vars e")
   apply (metis (lifting) vars_evalâ‡©B)
  apply blast
  done
  
lemma if_eval_true:
  "âŸ¦ evâ‡©B mem e âŸ§ âŸ¹
  âŸ¨If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds âŠ• annos, memâŸ©"
  apply (induct annos arbitrary: mds)
   apply simp
   apply (metis cxt_eval evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.if_true)
  by (metis annotate.simps(2) cxt_eval evalâ‡©w.decl update_annos.simps(2))

lemma if_eval_false:
  "âŸ¦ Â¬ evâ‡©B mem e âŸ§ âŸ¹
  âŸ¨If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds âŠ• annos, memâŸ©"
  apply (induct annos arbitrary: mds)
   apply simp
   apply (metis cxt_eval evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.if_false)
  by (metis annotate.simps(2) cxt_eval evalâ‡©w.decl update_annos.simps(2))

lemma if_eval_elim:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  ((c' = câ‡©1 âˆ§ evâ‡©B mem e) âˆ¨ (c' = câ‡©2 âˆ§ Â¬ evâ‡©B mem e)) âˆ§ mds' = mds âŠ• annos âˆ§ mem' = mem"
  apply (rule ccontr)
  apply (cases "evâ‡©B mem e")
   apply (insert if_eval_true deterministic)
   apply blast
  using if_eval_false deterministic
  by blast

lemma if_eval_elim':
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  ((c' = câ‡©1 âˆ§ evâ‡©B mem e) âˆ¨ (c' = câ‡©2 âˆ§ Â¬ evâ‡©B mem e)) âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem"
  using if_eval_elim [where annos = "[]"]
  by auto

lemma loc_reach_refl':
  "âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©"
  apply (subgoal_tac "âˆƒ lc. lc âˆˆ loc_reach lc âˆ§ lc = âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©")
   apply blast
  by (metis loc_reach.refl fst_conv snd_conv)

lemma if_loc_reach:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  (c' = If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos âˆ§ mds' = mds) âˆ¨
  (âˆƒ mem''. âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds âŠ• annos, mem''âŸ©) âˆ¨
  (âˆƒ mem''. âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds âŠ• annos, mem''âŸ©)"
  apply (induct rule: loc_reach.induct)
    apply (metis fst_conv snd_conv)
   apply (erule disjE)
    apply (erule conjE)
    apply simp
    apply (drule if_eval_elim)
    apply (erule conjE)+
    apply (erule disjE)
     apply (erule conjE)
     apply simp
     apply (metis loc_reach_refl')
    apply (metis loc_reach_refl')
   apply (metis loc_reach.step)
  by (metis loc_reach.mem_diff)

lemma if_loc_reach':
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2, mds, memâŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  (c' = If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âˆ§ mds' = mds) âˆ¨
  (âˆƒ mem''. âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, mem''âŸ©) âˆ¨
  (âˆƒ mem''. âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, mem''âŸ©)"
  using if_loc_reach [where annos = "[]"]
  by simp

lemma seq_loc_reach:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2, mds, memâŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  (âˆƒ c''. c' = c'' ;; câ‡©2 âˆ§ âŸ¨c'', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâŸ©) âˆ¨
  (âˆƒ c'' mds'' mem''. âŸ¨Stop, mds'', mem''âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâŸ© âˆ§ 
                      âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds'', mem''âŸ©)"
  apply (induct rule: loc_reach.induct)
    apply simp
    apply (metis  loc_reach_refl')
   apply simp
   apply (metis (no_types) loc_reach.step loc_reach_refl' seq_elim seq_stop_elim)
  by (metis (lifting) loc_reach.mem_diff)

lemma seq_doesnt_read:
  "âŸ¦ doesnt_read_or_modify c x âŸ§ âŸ¹ doesnt_read_or_modify (c ;; c') x"
  apply (clarsimp simp: doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def | safe)+
   apply (rename_tac mds mem c'a mds' mem' v)
   apply (case_tac "c = Stop")
    apply clarsimp
    apply (subgoal_tac "c'a = c' âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem")
     apply simp
     apply (metis cxt_eval evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.seq_stop)
    apply (metis (lifting) seq_stop_elim)
   apply (metis (lifting, no_types) evalâ‡©w.seq seq_elim)
  apply (rename_tac mds mem c'a mds' mem' va v)
  apply (case_tac "c = Stop")
   apply clarsimp
   apply (subgoal_tac "c'a = c' âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem")
    apply simp
    apply (metis cxt_eval evalâ‡©w.unannotated evalâ‡©w_simple.seq_stop)
   apply (metis (lifting) seq_stop_elim)
  apply (metis (lifting, no_types) evalâ‡©w.seq seq_elim)
  done
  
lemma seq_doesnt_modify:
  "âŸ¦ doesnt_modify c x âŸ§ âŸ¹ doesnt_modify (c ;; c') x"
  apply (clarsimp simp: doesnt_modify_def | safe)+
   apply (case_tac "c = Stop")
    apply clarsimp
    apply (metis (lifting) seq_stop_elim)
   apply (metis (no_types) seq_elim)
  apply (case_tac "c = Stop")
   apply clarsimp
   apply (metis (lifting) seq_stop_elim)
  apply (metis (no_types) seq_elim)
  done
  
inductive_cases seq_stop_elim': "âŸ¨Stop ;; c, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©"

lemma seq_stop_elim: "âŸ¨Stop ;; c, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ¹
  c' = c âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem"
  apply (erule seq_stop_elim')
    apply (metis evalâ‡©w.unannotated seq_stop_elim)
   apply (metis evalâ‡©w.seq seq_stop_elim)
  by (metis (lifting) Stmt.simps(34) Stmt.simps(42) cxt_seq_elim)

lemma seq_split:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨Stop, mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2, mds, memâŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
  âˆƒ mds'' mem''. âŸ¨Stop, mds'', mem''âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâŸ© âˆ§
                 âŸ¨Stop, mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds'', mem''âŸ©"
  apply (drule seq_loc_reach)
  by (metis Stmt.simps(49))

lemma while_eval:
  "âŸ¨While e c âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨(If e (c ;; While e c) Stop), mds âŠ• annos, memâŸ©"
  apply (induct annos arbitrary: mds)
   apply simp
   apply (rule cxt_eval)
   apply (rule evalâ‡©w.unannotated)
   apply (metis (lifting) evalâ‡©w_simple.while)
  apply simp
  by (metis cxt_eval evalâ‡©w.decl)

lemma while_eval':
  "âŸ¨While e c, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨If e (c ;; While e c) Stop, mds, memâŸ©"
  using while_eval [where annos = "[]"]
  by auto

lemma while_eval_elim:
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨While e c âŠ— annos, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
   (c' = If e (c ;; While e c) Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âŠ• annos âˆ§ mem' = mem)"
  apply (rule ccontr)
  apply (insert while_eval deterministic)
  by blast

lemma while_eval_elim':
  "âŸ¦ âŸ¨While e c, mds, memâŸ© â† âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âŸ§ âŸ¹
   (c' = If e (c ;; While e c) Stop âˆ§ mds' = mds âˆ§ mem' = mem)"
  using while_eval_elim [where annos = "[]"]
  by auto

lemma while_doesnt_read:
  "âŸ¦ x âˆ‰ bexp_vars e âŸ§ âŸ¹ doesnt_read_or_modify (While e c âŠ— annos) x"
  unfolding doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def
  using while_eval while_eval_elim
  by metis

lemma while_doesnt_modify:
  "doesnt_modify (While e c âŠ— annos) x"
  unfolding doesnt_modify_def
  using while_eval_elim
  by metis

(* TODO: try to find a better solution to this: *)
lemma disjE3:
  "âŸ¦ A âˆ¨ B âˆ¨ C ; A âŸ¹ P ; B âŸ¹ P ; C âŸ¹ P âŸ§ âŸ¹ P"
  by auto

lemma disjE5:
  "âŸ¦ A âˆ¨ B âˆ¨ C âˆ¨ D âˆ¨ E ; A âŸ¹ P ; B âŸ¹ P ; C âŸ¹ P ; D âŸ¹ P ; E âŸ¹ P âŸ§ âŸ¹ P"
  by auto

lemma if_doesnt_read':
  "x âˆ‰ bexp_vars e âŸ¹ ğ’_vars x âˆ© bexp_vars e = {} âŸ¹ doesnt_read_or_modify (If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2) x"
  using if_doesnt_read [where annos = "[]"]
  by auto

theorem mode_type_sound:
  assumes typeable: "âŠ¢ mdsâ‡©1 { c } mdsâ‡©1'"
  assumes mode_le: "mdsâ‡©2 â‰¤ mdsâ‡©1"
  shows "âˆ€ mem. (âŸ¨Stop, mdsâ‡©2', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨c, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ© âŸ¶ mdsâ‡©2' â‰¤ mdsâ‡©1') âˆ§ 
                locally_sound_mode_use âŸ¨c, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
  using typeable mode_le
proof (induct arbitrary: mdsâ‡©2 mdsâ‡©2' mem' mem rule: mode_type.induct)
  case (skip mds annos)
  thus ?case
    apply (clarsimp, intro conjI)
     apply (metis (lifting) skip_eval_step skip_loc_reach stop_no_eval update_preserves_le)
    apply (simp add: locally_sound_mode_use_def)
    by (metis annotate.simps skip_doesnt_access)
next
  case (assign x mds e annos)
  hence "âˆ€ mem. locally_sound_mode_use âŸ¨(x â† e) âŠ— annos, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
    unfolding locally_sound_mode_use_def
  proof (clarify)
    fix mem c' mds' mem' y
    assume asm: "âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨(x â† e) âŠ— annos, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
    hence "c' = (x â† e) âŠ— annos âˆ§ mds' = mdsâ‡©2 âˆ¨ c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos"
      using assign_loc_reach by blast
    thus "(y âˆˆ mds' GuarNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_read_or_modify c' y) âˆ§
          (y âˆˆ mds' GuarNoWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_modify c' y)"
    proof
      assume "c' = (x â† e) âŠ— annos âˆ§ mds' = mdsâ‡©2"
      thus ?thesis
      proof (safe)
        assume nin: "y âˆˆ mdsâ‡©2 GuarNoReadOrWrite"
        hence nin: "y âˆˆ mds GuarNoReadOrWrite"
          using assign.prems unfolding le_fun_def by blast
        hence "y âˆ‰ aexp_vars e"
          by (metis IntD2 IntI assign.hyps(2) assign.prems empty_iff inf_apply le_iff_inf)
        moreover from nin assign.hyps(3) have "ğ’_vars y âˆ© aexp_vars e = {}"
          by (meson contra_subsetD)
        moreover from nin assign.hyps have "x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars y âˆ§ x â‰  y"
          by blast
        ultimately show "doesnt_read_or_modify ((x â† e) âŠ— annos) y"
          using assign_doesnt_read
          by fastforce
      next
        assume "y âˆˆ mdsâ‡©2 GuarNoWrite"
        hence nin: "y âˆˆ mds GuarNoWrite"
          using assign.prems unfolding le_fun_def by blast
        hence "x â‰  y âˆ§ x âˆ‰ ğ’_vars y"
          using assign by blast
        with assign_doesnt_modify show "doesnt_modify ((x â† e) âŠ— annos) y"
          by blast
      qed
    next
      assume "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' = mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos"
      with stop_doesnt_access show ?thesis by blast
    qed
  qed
  thus ?case
    apply clarsimp
    by (metis assign.prems assign_annos_eval assign_loc_reach stop_no_eval update_preserves_le)
next
  case (if_ mds annos câ‡©1 mds'' câ‡©2 e)
    let ?c = "(If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2) âŠ— annos"
  from if_ have modes_le': "mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos â‰¤ mds âŠ• annos"
    by (metis (lifting) update_preserves_le)
  from if_ show ?case
    apply (simp add: locally_sound_mode_use_def)
    apply clarify
    apply (rule conjI)
     apply clarify
     prefer 2
     apply clarify
  proof -
    fix mem
    assume "âŸ¨Stop, mdsâ‡©2', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
    with modes_le' and if_ show "mdsâ‡©2' â‰¤ mds''"
      by (metis if_eval_false if_eval_true if_loc_reach stop_no_eval)
  next
    fix mem c' mds' mem' x
    assume "âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
    hence "(c' = If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos âˆ§ mds' = mdsâ‡©2) âˆ¨
           (âˆƒ mem''. âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1, mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos, mem''âŸ©) âˆ¨
           (âˆƒ mem''. âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos, mem''âŸ©)"
      using if_loc_reach by blast
    thus "(x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_read_or_modify c' x) âˆ§
          (x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_modify c' x)"
    proof
      assume "c' = If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos âˆ§ mds' = mdsâ‡©2"
      thus ?thesis
      proof (safe)
        assume "x âˆˆ mdsâ‡©2 GuarNoReadOrWrite"
        hence nin: "x âˆˆ mds GuarNoReadOrWrite"
          using if_ unfolding le_fun_def by auto
        with â€¹bexp_vars e âˆ© mds GuarNoReadOrWrite = {}â€º have "x âˆ‰ bexp_vars e"
          by (metis IntD2 disjoint_iff_not_equal)
        moreover from if_(6) nin have "ğ’_vars x âˆ© bexp_vars e = {}"
          by blast
        ultimately show "doesnt_read_or_modify (If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos) x"
          using if_doesnt_read by blast
      next
        assume "x âˆˆ mdsâ‡©2 GuarNoWrite"
        thus "doesnt_modify (If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2 âŠ— annos) x"
          using if_doesnt_modify by blast
      qed
    next
      assume "(âˆƒmem''. âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1, mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos, mem''âŸ©) âˆ¨
              (âˆƒmem''. âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos, mem''âŸ©)"
      with if_ show ?thesis
        by (metis locally_sound_mode_use_def modes_le')
    qed
  qed
next
  case (while mdsa mds annos c e)
  hence "mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos â‰¤ mds âŠ• annos"
    by (metis (lifting) update_preserves_le)
  have while_loc_reach: "â‹€ c' mds' mem' mem.
  âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨While e c âŠ— annos, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ© âŸ¹
  c' = While e c âŠ— annos âˆ§ mds' = mdsâ‡©2 âˆ¨
