  c' = While e c âˆ§ mds' â‰¤ mdsa âˆ¨
  c' = Stmt.If e (c ;; While e c) Stop âˆ§ mds' â‰¤ mdsa âˆ¨
  c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' â‰¤ mdsa âˆ¨
  (âˆƒc'' mem'' mdsâ‡©3.
      c' = c'' ;; While e c âˆ§
      mdsâ‡©3 â‰¤ mdsa âˆ§ âŸ¨c'', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨c, mdsâ‡©3, mem''âŸ©)"
  proof -
    fix mem c' mds' mem'
    assume "âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨While e c âŠ— annos, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
    thus "?thesis c' mds' mem' mem"
      apply (induct rule: loc_reach.induct)
        apply simp_all
       apply (erule disjE)
        apply simp
        apply (metis â€¹mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos â‰¤ mds âŠ• annosâ€º while.hyps(1) while_eval_elim)
       apply (erule disjE)
        apply (metis while_eval_elim')
       apply (erule disjE)
        apply simp
        apply (metis if_eval_elim' loc_reach_refl')
       apply (erule disjE)
        apply (metis stop_no_eval)
       apply (erule exE)
       apply (rename_tac c' mds' mem' c'' mds'' mem'' c''a)
       apply (case_tac "c''a = Stop")
        apply (insert while.hyps(3))
        apply (metis seq_stop_elim while.hyps(3))
       apply (metis loc_reach.step seq_elim)
      by (metis (full_types) loc_reach.mem_diff)
  qed
  from while show ?case
  proof (safe)
    fix mem
    assume "âŸ¨Stop, mdsâ‡©2', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨While e c âŠ— annos, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
    thus "mdsâ‡©2' â‰¤ mds âŠ• annos"
      by (metis Stmt.distinct(35) Stmt.distinct(43) annotate.elims update_annos.simps(1) while.hyps(1) while.prems while_loc_reach)
  next
    fix mem
    from while have a: "bexp_vars e âˆ© (mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos) GuarNoReadOrWrite = {}"
      by (metis (lifting, no_types) Int_empty_right Int_left_commute â€¹mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos â‰¤ mds âŠ• annosâ€º inf_fun_def le_iff_inf)
    from while have b: "âˆ€v.  ğ’_vars v âˆ© bexp_vars e â‰  {} âŸ¶ v âˆ‰ (mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos) GuarNoReadOrWrite"
      by (meson â€¹mdsâ‡©2 âŠ• annos â‰¤ mds âŠ• annosâ€º le_fun_def subsetCE)    
    show "locally_sound_mode_use âŸ¨While e c âŠ— annos, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
      unfolding locally_sound_mode_use_def
      apply (rule allI)+
      apply (rule impI)
    proof -
      fix c' mds' mem'
      define lc where "lc = âŸ¨While e c âŠ— annos, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
      assume "âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach lc"
      thus "âˆ€x. (x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_read_or_modify c' x) âˆ§
                 (x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_modify c' x)"
        apply (simp add: lc_def)
        apply (drule while_loc_reach)
        apply (rule allI)
        apply (erule disjE5)
      proof (clarsimp)
        fix x
        show "(x âˆˆ mdsâ‡©2 GuarNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_read_or_modify (While e c âŠ— annos) x) âˆ§
              (x âˆˆ mdsâ‡©2 GuarNoWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_modify (While e c âŠ— annos) x)"
          unfolding doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def and doesnt_modify_def
          using while_eval and while_eval_elim
          by blast
      next
        fix x
        assume a: "c' = Stmt.If e (c ;; While e c) Stop âˆ§ mds' â‰¤ mdsa"
        hence "mds' â‰¤ mdsa" by blast
        let ?c' = "If e (c ;; While e c) Stop"
        have "x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_read_or_modify ?c' x"
          apply clarify
          apply (rule if_doesnt_read')
           apply (metis IntI â€¹mds' â‰¤ mdsaâ€º empty_iff le_fun_def rev_subsetD while.hyps(1) while.hyps(4))
          by (metis IntI â€¹mds' â‰¤ mdsaâ€º empty_iff le_fun_def rev_subsetD while.hyps(1) while.hyps(5))
        moreover
        have "x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_modify ?c' x"
          by (metis annotate.simps(1) if_doesnt_modify)
        ultimately show "(x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_read_or_modify c' x) âˆ§
                         (x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_modify c' x)"
          using a by simp 
      next
        fix x
        assume "c' = Stop âˆ§ mds' â‰¤ mdsa"
        thus "(x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_read_or_modify c' x) âˆ§
              (x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_modify c' x)"
          by (simp, metis stop_doesnt_access)
      next
        fix x
        assume "âˆƒc'' mem'' mdsâ‡©3.
            c' = c'' ;; While e c âˆ§
            mdsâ‡©3 â‰¤ mdsa âˆ§
            âŸ¨c'', mds', mem'âŸ©
            âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨c, mdsâ‡©3, mem''âŸ©"
        from this obtain
         c'' mem'' mdsâ‡©3
        where "mdsâ‡©3 â‰¤ mdsa" and [simp]: "c' = c'' ;; While e c"
        and "âŸ¨c'', mds', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨c, mdsâ‡©3, mem''âŸ©" by blast
        thus "(x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_read_or_modify c' x) âˆ§
              (x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_modify c' x)"
          apply (clarsimp, safe)
           apply (rule seq_doesnt_read)
           apply (insert while(3))
           apply (metis â€¹mdsâ‡©3 â‰¤ mdsaâ€º locally_sound_mode_use_def while.hyps(1))
          apply (rule seq_doesnt_modify)
          by (metis â€¹mdsâ‡©3 â‰¤ mdsaâ€º locally_sound_mode_use_def while.hyps(1))
      next
        fix x
        assume "c' = While e c âˆ§ mds' â‰¤ mdsa"
        thus "(x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_read_or_modify c' x) âˆ§
              (x âˆˆ mds' GuarNoWrite âŸ¶ doesnt_modify c' x)"
          unfolding doesnt_read_or_modify_def doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def and doesnt_modify_def
          using while_eval' and while_eval_elim'
          by blast
      qed
    qed
  qed
next
  case (seq mds câ‡©1 mds' câ‡©2 mds'')
  thus ?case
  proof (safe)
    fix mem
    assume "âŸ¨Stop, mdsâ‡©2', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
    then obtain mdsâ‡©2'' mem'' where "âŸ¨Stop, mdsâ‡©2'', mem''âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©1, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©" and
      "âŸ¨Stop, mdsâ‡©2', mem'âŸ© âˆˆ loc_reach âŸ¨câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2'', mem''âŸ©"
      using seq_split by blast
    thus "mdsâ‡©2' â‰¤ mds''"
      using seq by blast
  next
    fix mem
    from seq show "locally_sound_mode_use âŸ¨câ‡©1 ;; câ‡©2, mdsâ‡©2, memâŸ©"
      apply (simp add: locally_sound_mode_use_def)
      apply clarify
      apply (drule seq_loc_reach)
      apply (erule disjE)
       apply (metis seq_doesnt_modify seq_doesnt_read)
      by metis
  qed
next
  case (sub mdsâ‡©2'' c mdsâ‡©2' mdsâ‡©1 mdsâ‡©1' câ‡©1)
  thus ?case
    apply clarsimp
    by (metis (hide_lams, no_types) inf_absorb2 le_infI1)
qed

end

end

Theory Example

(*
Title: Value-Dependent SIFUM-Type-Systems
Authors: Toby Murray, Robert Sison, Edward Pierzchalski, Christine Rizkallah
(Based on the SIFUM-Type-Systems AFP entry, whose authors
 are: Sylvia Grewe, Heiko Mantel, Daniel Schoepe)
*)
theory Example
imports "../Compositionality" "../Language" 
begin

datatype addr = control_var | buffer | high_var | low_var | temp
type_synonym val = nat
type_synonym mem = "addr â‡’ val"


datatype aexp = Const val |
                Load addr

fun 
  evâ‡©A :: "mem â‡’ aexp â‡’ val"
where
  "evâ‡©A mem (Const v) = v" |
  "evâ‡©A mem (Load x) = mem x"
 

datatype bexp = Cmp "addr" "addr" |
                Eq "addr" "val" |
                Neq "addr" "val"

fun
  evâ‡©B :: "mem â‡’ bexp â‡’ bool"
where
  "evâ‡©B mem (Cmp x y) = ((mem x) = (mem y))" | 
  "evâ‡©B mem (Eq x v) = ((mem x) = v)"

definition
  dma_control_var :: "val â‡’ Sec"
where
  "dma_control_var v â‰¡ if v = 0 then Low else High"

definition
  dma :: "mem â‡’ addr â‡’ Sec"
where
  "dma m x â‰¡ if x = buffer then dma_control_var (m control_var) else if x = high_var then High else Low"

definition
  ğ’_vars :: "addr â‡’ addr set"
where
  "ğ’_vars x â‰¡ if x = buffer then {control_var} else {}"

definition
  mdsâ‡©s :: "Mode â‡’ 'Var set"
where 
  "mdsâ‡©s â‰¡ Î»_. {}"

locale sifum_example =
  sifum_lang_no_dma evâ‡©A evâ‡©B +
  assumes eval_det: "(lc, lc') âˆˆ sifum_lang_no_dma.evalâ‡©w evâ‡©A evâ‡©B âŸ¹ (lc, lc'') âˆˆ sifum_lang_no_dma.evalâ‡©w evâ‡©A evâ‡©B âŸ¹ lc' = lc''"
 

definition
  ğ’ :: "addr set"
where
  "ğ’ â‰¡ â‹ƒx. ğ’_vars x"

sublocale sifum_example âŠ† sifum_security dma ğ’_vars ğ’ evalâ‡©w undefined
  apply(unfold_locales)
      apply(blast intro: eval_det)
     apply(rule Var_finite)
    apply(auto simp: ğ’_vars_def dma_def ğ’_def split: if_splits)
  done

context sifum_example begin


definition
  read_buffer :: "(addr, aexp, bexp) Stmt"
where
  "read_buffer â‰¡ 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq buffer AsmNoWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq temp AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     Assign temp (Load buffer) ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp))"


(* Note: this invariant ends up tracking mode changes, plus the values of
         variables with an AsmNoWrite assumption --- in this case
         control_var. Thus it feels like it is the sort of thing a 
         flow-sensitive type system should be able to track *)
inductive 
  inv :: "(((addr, aexp, bexp) Stmt, addr, val) LocalConf) â‡’ bool"
where
  invâ‡©1: "âŸ¦c = read_buffer; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mds AsmNoWrite = {}âŸ§ âŸ¹ inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©" |
  invâ‡©1': "âŸ¦c = (Stop ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq temp AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     Assign temp (Load buffer) ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp)));
     buffer âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite; buffer âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©" |
  invâ‡©2: "âŸ¦c = (ModeDecl Skip (Acq temp AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     Assign temp (Load buffer) ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp)));
     buffer âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite;  buffer âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©" |
  invâ‡©2': "âŸ¦c = (Stop ;; 
     Assign temp (Load buffer) ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp)));
     buffer âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite; temp âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite;  buffer âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©" |
  invâ‡©3: "âŸ¦c = ( 
     Assign temp (Load buffer) ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp)));
     buffer âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite; temp âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite; buffer âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©" |

  invâ‡©3': "âŸ¦c = (
     Stop ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp)));
     buffer âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite; temp âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite;  buffer âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©" |
  invâ‡©4: "âŸ¦c = (
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp)));
     buffer âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite; temp âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite; buffer âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©" |
  invâ‡©5: "âŸ¦c = (
     (Assign low_var (Load temp)));
     buffer âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite; temp âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite; mem control_var = 0; buffer âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©" |
  invâ‡©6: "âŸ¦c = (
     (Assign high_var (Load temp)));
     buffer âˆˆ mds AsmNoWrite; temp âˆˆ mds AsmNoReadOrWrite; mem control_var â‰  0; buffer âˆ‰ mds AsmNoReadOrWriteâŸ§ âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©" |
  invâ‡©7: "âŸ¦c = StopâŸ§ âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©"

(* Note: this relational invariant is tracking equalities on AsmNoRead
         variables, based on classification in formation which here we
         have encoded as ahead-of-time information about control_var but
         could be written instead as assertions about "dma buffer".
         Again it feels like something a flow-sensitive type system should
         be able to track, assuming we can accurately track changes to dma,
         which feels like it should be possible *)
inductive_set 
  rel_inv :: "(((addr, aexp, bexp) Stmt, addr, val) LocalConf) rel"
where
  "âŸ¦c = ( Stop ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp))); mem control_var = 0; mem temp = mem' tempâŸ§ âŸ¹
      (âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv" |
  "âŸ¦c = ( Stop ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp))); mem control_var â‰  0âŸ§ âŸ¹
      (âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv" |
  "âŸ¦c = (
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp))); mem control_var = 0; mem temp = mem' tempâŸ§ âŸ¹
      (âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv" |
     "âŸ¦c = (
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp))); mem control_var â‰  0âŸ§ âŸ¹
      (âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv" |
  "âŸ¦c = (Assign low_var (Load temp)); mem control_var = 0; 
      mem temp = mem' tempâŸ§ âŸ¹
      (âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv" |
  "âŸ¦c â‰  (Stop ;; (
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp)))); c â‰  (
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp))); c â‰  (Assign low_var (Load temp))âŸ§ âŸ¹
      (âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv"

(* the bisimulation is phrased as a conjunction of a global invariant and a 
   relational invariant, defined above, plus the background requirement
   of low-equivalence modulo modes *)
inductive_set  
  R :: "(((addr, aexp, bexp) Stmt, addr, val) LocalConf) rel"
where
  "âŸ¦c = c'; mds = mds'; low_mds_eq mds mem mem'; inv âŸ¨c,mds,memâŸ©;
    (âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_invâŸ§ âŸ¹
   (âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ R"

lemma [simp]:
  "control_var âˆˆ ğ’"
  apply(simp add: ğ’_def)
  apply(rule_tac x=buffer in exI)
  apply(simp add: ğ’_vars_def)
  done

lemma low_mds_eq_control_var_eq:
  "low_mds_eq mds mem mem' âŸ¹ mem control_var = mem' control_var"
  apply(auto simp: low_mds_eq_def dma_def)
  done

  
lemma inv_low_mds_eq:
  "âŸ¦c = c'; mds = mds'; low_mds_eq mds mem mem'; inv âŸ¨c,mds,memâŸ©âŸ§  âŸ¹
   inv âŸ¨c',mds',mem'âŸ©"
  apply(erule inv.cases)
  apply(auto intro: inv.intros dest!: low_mds_eq_control_var_eq)
  done

lemma rel_inv_sym:
  "low_mds_eq mds mem mem' âŸ¹ (âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c, mds, mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv âŸ¹
    (âŸ¨c, mds, mem'âŸ©, âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv"
  apply(auto elim!: rel_inv.cases intro: rel_inv.intros simp: low_mds_eq_control_var_eq)
  done

lemma R_sym':
  "(âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ R âŸ¹
   (âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©, âŸ¨c, mds, memâŸ©) âˆˆ R"
  apply(rule R.intros)
    apply(blast elim: R.cases dest: low_mds_eq_sym intro: inv_low_mds_eq dest: rel_inv_sym)+
  done

lemma R_sym:
  "sym R"
  by(rule symI, clarify, erule R_sym')


lemma inv_closed_glob_consistent:
  "inv âŸ¨c', mds', memâŸ© âŸ¹
       âˆ€x. case A x of None â‡’ True | Some (v, v') â‡’ mem x â‰  v âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds' x âŸ¹
       âˆ€x. dma mem [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x â‰  dma mem x âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds' x  âŸ¹
       inv âŸ¨c', mds', mem [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]âŸ©"
  apply(erule inv.cases)
  apply(fastforce intro: inv.intros)+
    apply(clarsimp simp: apply_adaptation_def split: option.splits)
    apply(drule_tac x=control_var in spec)
    apply clarsimp
    apply(drule_tac x=buffer in spec)
    apply(clarsimp simp: dma_def dma_control_var_def split: if_splits)
    apply(auto intro: inv.intros simp: var_asm_not_written_def)[2]
  apply(drule_tac x=control_var in spec)
  apply(drule_tac x=buffer in spec)
  apply(clarsimp simp: dma_def dma_control_var_def split: if_splits option.splits)
  apply(auto intro: inv.intros simp: var_asm_not_written_def)
  done

lemma updates_to_control_var:
  "âˆ€x. dma mem [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x â‰  dma mem x âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds' x  âŸ¹
    buffer âˆˆ mds' AsmNoWrite âŸ¹
    case A control_var of Some (x, y) â‡’ (x = 0) = (mem control_var = 0) | _ â‡’ True"
  apply(drule_tac x=buffer in spec)
  apply(auto simp: apply_adaptation_def split: option.splits simp: dma_def dma_control_var_def split: if_splits simp: var_asm_not_written_def)
  done

lemma blah:
  "âˆ€x a b. A x = Some (a, b) âŸ¶ (mem x = a âŸ¶ mem' x â‰  b) âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds' x âŸ¹
    mem x = mem' x âŸ¹
    x âˆˆ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite âˆ¨ x âˆˆ mds' AsmNoWrite âŸ¹  mem [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = mem' [âˆ¥â‡©2 A] x"
  apply(auto simp: apply_adaptation_def split: option.splits simp: var_asm_not_written_def)
  done

lemma rel_inv_closed_glob_consistent:
  "inv âŸ¨c', mds', memâŸ© âŸ¹ (âŸ¨c', mds', memâŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv âŸ¹
       âˆ€x a b.
          A x = Some (a, b) âŸ¶
          (mem x = a âŸ¶ mem' x â‰  b) âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds' x âŸ¹
       âˆ€x. dma mem [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x â‰  dma mem x âŸ¶ Â¬ var_asm_not_written mds' x âŸ¹
       âˆ€x. dma mem [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = Low âˆ§ (x âˆˆ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¶ x âˆˆ ğ’) âŸ¶
           mem [âˆ¥â‡©1 A] x = mem' [âˆ¥â‡©2 A] x âŸ¹
       (âŸ¨c', mds', mem [âˆ¥â‡©1 A]âŸ©, âŸ¨c', mds', mem' [âˆ¥â‡©2 A]âŸ©) âˆˆ rel_inv"
  apply(safe elim!: rel_inv.cases elim!: inv.cases)
  apply(unfold read_buffer_def)
  apply(simp_all)
       (* there are actually 14 goals at this point but 8 are solved at the end by auto, so
          we indent as if there were 6 *)
       apply(rule rel_inv.intros(1), simp+)
        apply(drule updates_to_control_var, simp+)
        apply(fastforce split: option.splits simp: apply_adaptation_def)
       apply(fastforce intro!: blah)
      apply(rule rel_inv.intros(2), simp+)
      apply(drule updates_to_control_var, simp+)
      apply(fastforce split: option.splits simp: apply_adaptation_def)
     apply(rule rel_inv.intros(3), simp+)
      apply(drule updates_to_control_var, simp+)
      apply(fastforce split: option.splits simp: apply_adaptation_def)
     apply(fastforce intro!: blah)
    apply(rule rel_inv.intros(4), simp+)
    apply(drule updates_to_control_var, simp+)
    apply(fastforce split: option.splits simp: apply_adaptation_def)
   apply(rule rel_inv.intros(5), simp+)
    apply(drule updates_to_control_var, simp+)
    apply(fastforce split: option.splits simp: apply_adaptation_def)
   apply(fastforce intro!: blah)
  apply(rule rel_inv.intros(6), simp+)
  apply(drule updates_to_control_var, simp+)
  by (auto intro: rel_inv.intros)

lemma R_closed_glob_consistent:
  "closed_glob_consistent R"
  unfolding closed_glob_consistent_def  
  apply(auto elim!: R.cases intro!: R.intros simp: low_mds_eq_def intro!: inv_closed_glob_consistent split: option.splits intro: rel_inv_closed_glob_consistent) 
  done

lemma R_low_mds_eq:
  "(âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ R âŸ¹
        low_mds_eq mds memâ‡©1 memâ‡©2"
  apply(blast elim: R.cases)
  done

lemma decl_evalâ‡©w':
  assumes mem_unchanged: "mem' = mem"
  assumes upd: "mds' = update_modes upd mds"
  shows "(âŸ¨Skip@[upd], mds, memâŸ©, âŸ¨Stop, mds', mem'âŸ©) âˆˆ evalâ‡©w"
  using decl[OF unannotated, OF skip, where E="[]", simplified, where E1="[]", simplified]
  assms by auto


lemmas decl_evalâ‡©w = decl[OF unannotated, OF skip, where E="[]", simplified, where E1="[]", simplified]
lemmas seq_stop_evalâ‡©w = unannotated[OF seq_stop, where E="[]", simplified]
lemmas assign_evalâ‡©w = unannotated[OF assign, where E="[]", simplified]
lemmas if_evalâ‡©w = unannotated[OF cond, where E="[]", simplified]
lemmas if_false_evalâ‡©w = unannotated[OF if_false, where E="[]", simplified]

lemma ğ’_simp [simp]:
  "ğ’ = {control_var}"
  apply(auto simp: ğ’_def ğ’_vars_def split: if_splits)
  done

lemma buffer_eq:
  "memâ‡©1 control_var = 0 âŸ¹ buffer âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¹ low_mds_eq mds' memâ‡©1 memâ‡©2  âŸ¹
  memâ‡©1 buffer = memâ‡©2 buffer"
  apply(clarsimp simp: low_mds_eq_def)
  apply(drule spec, erule mp)
  apply(clarsimp simp: dma_def dma_control_var_def)
  done

lemma rel_inv_init:
  "buffer âˆ‰ mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite âŸ¹ low_mds_eq mds' memâ‡©1 memâ‡©2 âŸ¹
    (âŸ¨Stop ;;
      Stmt.If (Eq control_var 0) (low_var â† Load temp)
       (high_var â† Load temp), mds', memâ‡©1
     (temp := evâ‡©A memâ‡©1 (Load buffer))âŸ©,
     âŸ¨Stop ;;
      Stmt.If (Eq control_var 0) (low_var â† Load temp)
       (high_var â† Load temp), mds', memâ‡©2
     (temp := evâ‡©A memâ‡©2 (Load buffer))âŸ©)
    âˆˆ rel_inv"
  apply(case_tac "memâ‡©1 control_var = 0")
   apply(frule (2) buffer_eq)    
  apply(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros simp: evâ‡©A.simps)+
  done

lemma R_inv:
  notes evâ‡©A.simps[simp del]
  shows  "(âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ R âŸ¹
       (âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©) âˆˆ evalâ‡©w âŸ¹
       âˆƒcâ‡©2' memâ‡©2'.
          (âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©) âˆˆ evalâ‡©w âˆ§
          (âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©) âˆˆ R"
  apply(erule R.cases)
  apply clarsimp
  apply(erule inv.cases)
           apply clarsimp
           apply(rule_tac x=câ‡©1' in exI)
           apply(rule_tac x=memâ‡©2 in exI)
           apply(unfold read_buffer_def)
           apply(drule seq_elim, simp)
           apply clarsimp
           apply(drule upd_elim, drule skip_elim, simp)
           apply clarsimp
           apply(rule conjI)
            apply(rule evalâ‡©w.seq)
            apply(rule decl_evalâ‡©w', simp+)
           apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
             apply(fastforce simp: low_mds_eq_def)
            apply(rule invâ‡©1', simp+)
           apply(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros)
          apply clarsimp
          apply(drule seq_stop_elim, clarsimp)
          apply(rule exI)+
          apply(intro conjI)
           apply(rule seq_stop_evalâ‡©w)
          apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
           apply(blast intro: inv.intros)
          apply(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros)
         apply clarsimp
         apply(rule_tac x=câ‡©1' in exI)
         apply(rule_tac x=memâ‡©2 in exI)
         apply(drule seq_elim, simp)
         apply clarsimp
         apply(drule upd_elim, drule skip_elim, simp)
         apply clarsimp
         apply(rule conjI)
          apply(rule evalâ‡©w.seq)
          apply(rule decl_evalâ‡©w', simp+)
         apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
           apply(fastforce simp: low_mds_eq_def)
          apply(rule invâ‡©2', simp+)
         apply(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros)
        apply clarsimp
        apply(drule seq_stop_elim, clarsimp)
        apply(rule exI)+
        apply(intro conjI)
         apply(rule seq_stop_evalâ‡©w)
        apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
         apply(blast intro: inv.intros)
        apply(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros)
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule exI)+
       apply(drule seq_elim, simp)
       apply clarsimp
       apply(drule assign_elim)
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule conjI)
        apply(rule evalâ‡©w.seq)
        apply(rule assign_evalâ‡©w)
       apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
         apply(clarsimp simp: low_mds_eq_def evâ‡©A.simps)
         apply(fastforce simp: dma_def split: if_splits)[1]
        apply(rule invâ‡©3', simp+)
       apply(fastforce intro: rel_inv_init)
      apply clarsimp
      apply(drule seq_stop_elim, clarsimp)
      apply(rule exI)+
      apply(intro conjI)
       apply(rule seq_stop_evalâ‡©w)
      apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
       apply(blast intro: inv.intros)
      apply(auto intro: rel_inv.intros elim!: rel_inv.cases)[1]    
     apply clarsimp
     apply(rule exI)+
     apply(erule if_elim)
      apply(rule conjI)
       apply simp
       apply(rule if_evalâ‡©w)
      apply simp
      apply(rule conjI)
       apply(rule impI)
       apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
        apply(blast intro: inv.intros)
       apply(auto intro: rel_inv.intros elim!: rel_inv.cases)[1]
      apply(simp add: low_mds_eq_control_var_eq)+
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply(rule if_false_evalâ‡©w, simp)
     apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
      apply(rule invâ‡©6, (simp add: low_mds_eq_control_var_eq)+)
     apply(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros)
    apply clarsimp
    apply(rule exI)+
    apply(drule assign_elim)
    apply(rule conjI)
     apply simp
     apply(rule assign_evalâ‡©w)
      apply(simp add: low_mds_eq_control_var_eq)
     apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
      apply(clarsimp simp: low_mds_eq_def dma_def)
      apply(simp add: evâ‡©A.simps)
      apply(clarsimp split: if_splits)[1]
      apply(fastforce elim: rel_inv.cases)
     apply(fastforce intro: inv.intros)
    apply(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros)
   apply clarsimp
   apply(rule exI)+
   apply(drule assign_elim)
   apply(rule conjI)
    apply simp
    apply(rule assign_evalâ‡©w)
     apply(simp add: low_mds_eq_control_var_eq)
    apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
     apply(clarsimp simp: low_mds_eq_def dma_def)
     apply(simp add: evâ‡©A.simps)
     apply(clarsimp split: if_splits)[1]
    apply(fastforce intro: inv.intros)
   apply(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros)
  using stop_no_eval by fastforce

lemma strong_low_bisim_mm_R:
  "strong_low_bisim_mm R"
unfolding strong_low_bisim_mm_def
proof(safe)
  show "sym R" by(rule R_sym)
next
  show "closed_glob_consistent R" by(rule R_closed_glob_consistent)
next
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2  memâ‡©2
  assume "(âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ R"
  thus "low_mds_eq mds memâ‡©1 memâ‡©2"
  by(rule R_low_mds_eq)
next
  fix câ‡©1 mds memâ‡©1 câ‡©2  memâ‡©2 câ‡©1' mds' memâ‡©1'
  assume "(âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ R"
     and "(âŸ¨câ‡©1, mds, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©) âˆˆ evalâ‡©w"
  thus "âˆƒcâ‡©2' memâ‡©2'.
        (âŸ¨câ‡©2, mds, memâ‡©2âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©) âˆˆ evalâ‡©w âˆ§
        (âŸ¨câ‡©1', mds', memâ‡©1'âŸ©, âŸ¨câ‡©2', mds', memâ‡©2'âŸ©) âˆˆ R"
    by(rule R_inv)
qed
    
lemma read_buffer_secure':
  "low_mds_eq mdsâ‡©s memâ‡©1 memâ‡©2 âŸ¹
       (âŸ¨read_buffer, mdsâ‡©s, memâ‡©1âŸ©, âŸ¨read_buffer, mdsâ‡©s, memâ‡©2âŸ©) âˆˆ R"
  apply(rule R.intros)
  apply simp_all
   apply(rule invâ‡©1)
     apply (simp_all add: mdsâ‡©s_def)
  unfolding read_buffer_def by(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros)

lemma "com_sifum_secure (read_buffer,mdsâ‡©s)"
  unfolding com_sifum_secure_def low_indistinguishable_def
  apply clarify
  apply(rule mm_equiv_intro)
   apply(rule strong_low_bisim_mm_R)
  by(rule read_buffer_secure')  

end
 
end

Theory TypeSystemTactics

theory TypeSystemTactics
imports "../Compositionality"
        "../TypeSystem"
        "HOL-Eisbach.Eisbach_Tools"
begin

(* Some Eisbach magic to get around Eisbach and locales not getting along *)

ML â€¹
structure Data = Proof_Data
(
  type T = morphism
  fun init _ = Morphism.identity;
);
â€º

method_setup wrap = 
  â€¹Method.text_closure >> (fn text => fn ctxt =>
    let
      val morph = Data.get ctxt;

      fun safe_fact thm =
        perhaps (try (Morphism.thm morph)) thm;
       
      val morph' = Morphism.morphism "safe" 
        {binding = [Morphism.binding morph],
         fact = [map safe_fact],
         term = [Morphism.term morph],
         typ = [Morphism.typ morph]}
      
      val text' = Method.map_source (map (Token.transform morph')) text;
    in Method.evaluate_runtime text' ctxt end)â€º

method_setup print_headgoal = 
  â€¹Scan.succeed (fn ctxt =>
  SIMPLE_METHOD
    (SUBGOAL (fn (t,_) => 
    (Output.writeln 
    (Pretty.string_of (Syntax.pretty_term ctxt t)); all_tac)) 1))â€º

named_theorems aexpr and bexpr and prog and custom_if
context sifum_types_assign
begin

(* More Eisbach magic to get around Eisbach and mutual recursion not getting along *)

method_setup call_by_name = â€¹Scan.lift Parse.string >> 
  (fn str => fn ctxt => 
    case (try (Method.check_src ctxt) (Token.make_src (str, Position.none) [])) of
    SOME src => Method.evaluate (Method.Source src) ctxt
    | _ => Method.fail)â€º

(* Eisbach tactics for partially automating has_type proofs *)

method seq_tac 
  methods tac = 
  (wrap â€¹rule seq_typeâ€º, tac, tac) 

method anno_tac 
  methods tac = 
  (wrap â€¹rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl], 
         clarsimp, 
        tac, 
       simp, 
      fastforce simp: add_anno_def subtype_def pred_entailment_def 
                      pred_def bot_Sec_def[symmetric],
     simp add: add_anno_def,
    simpâ€º) 


method assignâ‡©2_tac =
     wrap â€¹rule assignâ‡©2â€º, 
        simp, 
       solves â€¹rule aexpr; simpâ€º, 
      (fastforce),
     simp,
    simp


method assignâ‡©1_tac =
   wrap â€¹rule assignâ‡©1,
        simp,
       simp,
      solves â€¹rule aexpr;  simpâ€º,
      simp,
     clarsimp simp: subtype_def pred_def,
    simpâ€º

method assignâ‡©ğ’_tac =
   wrap â€¹rule assignâ‡©ğ’â€º,
        simp,
       solves â€¹rule aexpr; simpâ€º, 
       (solves â€¹simpâ€º), 
      (solves â€¹simpâ€º | (clarsimp, fast)),
     (solves â€¹simpâ€º)?,
    simp

method if_tac 
  methods tac = 
  wrap â€¹rule if_type'â€º, 
        solves â€¹rule bexpr, simpâ€º, 
       solves â€¹simpâ€º,
      solves â€¹tacâ€º, 
     solves â€¹tacâ€º, 
    solves â€¹clarsimp, fastforceâ€º

method has_type_no_if_tac' 
  declares aexpr bexpr= 
 (seq_tac â€¹call_by_name "has_type_no_if_tac'"â€º |
   anno_tac â€¹call_by_name "has_type_no_if_tac'"â€º |
   wrap â€¹rule skip_typeâ€º | 
   wrap â€¹rule stop_typeâ€º |
   assignâ‡©1_tac| 
   assignâ‡©2_tac | 
   assignâ‡©ğ’_tac)?

method has_type_no_if_tac
  uses prog 
  declares aexpr bexpr = 
  (intro exI, unfold prog, has_type_no_if_tac')

method has_type_tac'
  declares aexpr bexpr= 
  (seq_tac â€¹call_by_name "has_type_tac'"â€º |
   anno_tac â€¹call_by_name "has_type_tac'"â€º |
   wrap â€¹rule skip_typeâ€º | 
   wrap â€¹rule stop_typeâ€º |
   assignâ‡©2_tac |
   if_tac â€¹call_by_name "has_type_tac'"â€º | 
   assignâ‡©1_tac | 
   assignâ‡©ğ’_tac)?




method has_type_tac uses prog declares aexpr bexpr = 
  (intro exI, unfold prog, has_type_tac')


method if_type_tac 
  declares bexpr custom_if =
   (wrap â€¹rule custom_if, 
            rule bexpr, 
           simp?, 
          simp?,
         has_type_tac', 
        has_type_tac', 
       (* 
        Check if this work for other cases? 
        If so just give the rest of this method a time out.
        Otherwise, remove from tac and add as explicit lemma proof *)
        (clarsimp simp: context_equiv_def type_equiv_def subtype_def)?,
       (clarsimp simp: context_equiv_def type_equiv_def subtype_def)?,
      (simp add: subset_entailment)?,
     (simp add: subset_entailment)?,
    (clarsimp,
    (subst tyenv_wellformed_def) ,
    (clarsimp simp: mds_consistent_def types_wellformed_def type_wellformed_def types_stable_def),
    (fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def))?,
   (clarsimp,
   (subst tyenv_wellformed_def) ,
   (clarsimp simp: mds_consistent_def types_wellformed_def type_wellformed_def types_stable_def),
   (fastforce simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def))?â€º)


declaration â€¹fn phi => Context.mapping I (Data.put phi)â€º


end

end

Theory Example_TypeSystem

(*
Title: Value-Dependent SIFUM-Type-Systems
Authors: Toby Murray, Robert Sison, Edward Pierzchalski, Christine Rizkallah
(Based on the SIFUM-Type-Systems AFP entry, whose authors
 are: Sylvia Grewe, Heiko Mantel, Daniel Schoepe)
*)
theory Example_TypeSystem
imports 
  "../TypeSystem" 
  TypeSystemTactics
begin

datatype addr = low_var | high_var | control_var | buffer | temp
type_synonym val = nat
type_synonym mem = "addr â‡’ val"

datatype aexp = Load "addr"

fun 
  evâ‡©A :: "mem â‡’ aexp â‡’ val"
where
  "evâ‡©A mem (Load x) = mem x"
 
fun
  aexp_vars :: "aexp â‡’ addr set"
where
  "aexp_vars (Load x) = {x}"
  
datatype bexp = Same "addr" "addr" |
                NotSame "addr" "addr" |
                Eq "addr" "val" |
                Neq "addr" "val" |
                TT | FF

fun
  evâ‡©B :: "mem â‡’ bexp â‡’ bool"
where
  "evâ‡©B mem (Same x y) = ((mem x) = (mem y))" | 
  "evâ‡©B mem (NotSame x y) = ((mem x) â‰  (mem y))" |
  "evâ‡©B mem (Eq x c) = ((mem x) = c)" | 
  "evâ‡©B mem (Neq x c) = ((mem x) â‰  c)" |
  "evâ‡©B mem TT = True" |
  "evâ‡©B mem FF = False"

fun
  bexp_vars :: "bexp â‡’ addr set"
where
  "bexp_vars (Neq x c) = {x}" |
  "bexp_vars (Eq x c) = {x}" |
  "bexp_vars (Same x y) = {x,y}" |
  "bexp_vars (NotSame x y) = {x,y}" |
  "bexp_vars _ = {}"
  
fun
  bexp_neg :: "bexp â‡’ bexp"
where
  "bexp_neg (Neq x y) = (Eq x y)" |
  "bexp_neg (Eq x y) = (Neq x y)" |
  "bexp_neg (Same x y) = (NotSame x y)" |
  "bexp_neg (NotSame x y) = (Same x y)" |
  "bexp_neg TT = FF" |
  "bexp_neg FF = TT"
  
fun
   bexp_assign :: "addr â‡’ aexp â‡’ bexp"
where
  "bexp_assign x (Load y)  = (Same x y)"
    
definition
  dma_control_var :: "val â‡’ Sec"
where
  "dma_control_var v â‰¡ if v = 0 then Low else High"

definition
  dma :: "mem â‡’ addr â‡’ Sec"
where
  "dma m x â‰¡ if x = buffer then dma_control_var (m control_var) else if x = high_var then High else Low"

definition
  ğ’_vars :: "addr â‡’ addr set"
where
  "ğ’_vars x â‰¡ if x = buffer then {control_var} else {}"

definition
  mdsâ‡©s :: "Mode â‡’ 'Var set"
where 
  "mdsâ‡©s â‰¡ Î»_. {}"

locale sifum_example =
  sifum_lang_no_dma evâ‡©A evâ‡©B aexp_vars bexp_vars +
  assumes eval_det: "(lc, lc') âˆˆ sifum_lang_no_dma.evalâ‡©w evâ‡©A evâ‡©B âŸ¹ (lc, lc'') âˆˆ sifum_lang_no_dma.evalâ‡©w evâ‡©A evâ‡©B âŸ¹ lc' = lc''"

definition
  ğ’ :: "addr set"
where
  "ğ’ â‰¡ â‹ƒx. ğ’_vars x"

fun
  dma_type :: "addr â‡’ bexp set"
where
  "dma_type high_var = {FF}" |
  "dma_type buffer = {Eq control_var 0}" |
  "dma_type _ = {}"

sublocale sifum_example âŠ† sifum_types_assign evâ‡©A evâ‡©B aexp_vars bexp_vars dma ğ’_vars ğ’ bexp_neg dma_type FF bexp_assign
  apply(unfold_locales)
              apply(blast intro: eval_det)
             apply(rule Var_finite)
            apply(auto simp: ğ’_vars_def dma_def ğ’_def split: if_splits)[3]
         apply(rename_tac mem e, case_tac e, auto)[1]
        apply(case_tac x, auto simp: dma_def dma_control_var_def)[1]
       apply(case_tac x, auto simp: ğ’_vars_def)[1]
      apply(simp+)[2]
    apply(case_tac e, auto)[1]
   apply(case_tac e, simp)
  apply(auto simp: ğ’_def)
  done

context sifum_example begin

definition
  read_buffer :: "(addr, aexp, bexp) Stmt"
where
  "read_buffer â‰¡ 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_var AsmNoWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq temp AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     Assign temp (Load buffer) ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp))"


lemma ğ’_simp[simp]:
  "ğ’ = {control_var}"
  by(auto simp: ğ’_def ğ’_vars_def split: if_splits)

  
lemma type_aexpr_Load:
  "v âˆ‰ dom Î“ âŸ¹ type_aexpr Î“ (Load v) (dma_type v)"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Î“ "Load v", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done

lemma type_aexpr_Load':
  "v âˆˆ dom Î“ âŸ¹ t = (the (Î“ v)) âŸ¹ type_aexpr Î“ (Load v) t"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Î“ "Load v", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done


declare restrict_preds_to_vars_def [simp]
declare add_pred_def [simp]
declare stable_def [simp]
declare to_total_def [simp]
declare ğ’_vars_def [simp]
declare anno_type_stable_def [simp]
declare anno_type_sec_def [simp]
declare assign_post_def [simp]

lemma [simp]: "pred_entailment P {}" by(simp add: pred_entailment_def pred_def)
lemma [simp]: "e âˆˆ P âŸ¹ pred_entailment P {e}" by(blast intro: subset_entailment)
lemma [simp]: "FF âˆˆ P âŸ¹ pred_entailment P Q" by(auto simp: pred_entailment_def pred_def)

lemma read_buffer_typed:
  "Î“ = (Î»_. None) âŸ¹ ğ’® = ({},{}) âŸ¹ P = {} âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒÎ“' ğ’®' P'. has_type Î“ ğ’® P read_buffer Î“' ğ’®' P'"
  apply(intro exI)
  apply(simp add: read_buffer_def)
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply simp
    apply simp
   apply simp
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply simp
    apply simp
   apply simp
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule assignâ‡©2[OF _ _ _ HOL.refl])
      apply simp
     apply(rule type_aexpr_Load)
     apply simp
    apply simp    
   apply simp
  apply(rule if_type')
      apply(rule type_bexprI)
      apply simp
     apply(clarsimp)
    apply(rule assignâ‡©1)
        apply simp
       apply(simp)
      apply(rule type_aexpr_Load')
       apply simp
      apply simp
     apply(simp add: subtype_def)
    apply(simp)
   apply(rule assignâ‡©1)
       apply simp
      apply simp
     apply(rule type_aexpr_Load')
      apply simp
     apply simp
    apply(simp add: subtype_def)
   apply(simp)
  apply clarsimp
  apply fastforce
  done

lemma read_buffer_com_sifum_secure:
  "com_sifum_secure (read_buffer,(Î»_. {}))"
  apply(insert read_buffer_typed[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
  apply clarify
  apply(rule typed_secure)
   apply(fastforce simp: Î“_of_mds_def ğ’®_of_mds_def)
  apply(auto simp: mds_yields_stable_types_def)
  done

definition
  write_buffer :: "(addr, aexp, bexp) Stmt"
where
  "write_buffer â‰¡ 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_var AsmNoWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq temp AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign temp (Load low_var)) (Assign temp (Load high_var)) ;;
     Assign buffer (Load temp)"

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_empty[simp]:
  "restrict_preds_to_vars {} V = {}"
  apply(simp add: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  done

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_idemp[simp]:
  "restrict_preds_to_vars (restrict_preds_to_vars P V) V = 
   restrict_preds_to_vars P V"
  apply(simp add: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  done

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_insert1[simp]:
  "(âˆ€xâˆˆbexp_vars a. x âˆˆ V) âŸ¹ restrict_preds_to_vars (insert a P) V = (insert a (restrict_preds_to_vars P V))"
  apply(simp add: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  apply fastforce
  done

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_insert2[simp]:
  "(âˆƒxâˆˆbexp_vars a. x âˆ‰ V) âŸ¹ restrict_preds_to_vars (insert a P) V = ((restrict_preds_to_vars P V))"
  apply(simp add: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  apply fastforce
  done
  
lemma [simp]:
  "Eq a b âˆˆ P âŸ¹ Neq a b âˆˆ P âŸ¹ pred_entailment P Q"
  apply(clarsimp simp: pred_entailment_def pred_def)
  apply(frule bspec, assumption)
  apply(drule bspec, assumption, fastforce)
  done
  
declare restrict_preds_to_vars_def[simp del]

lemma write_buffer_typed:
  "Î“ = (Î»_. None) âŸ¹ ğ’® = ({},{}) âŸ¹ P = {} âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒÎ“' ğ’®' P'. has_type Î“ ğ’® P write_buffer Î“' ğ’®' P'"
  apply(intro exI)
  apply(simp add: write_buffer_def)
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply simp
    apply simp
   apply simp
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply simp
    apply simp
   apply simp
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule if_type[where Î“'''="[temp â†¦ dma_type buffer]" and P'''="{}"])
            apply(rule type_bexprI)        
            apply simp
           apply simp
          apply(rule assignâ‡©2[OF _ _ _ HOL.refl])
             apply simp
            apply(rule type_aexpr_Load)
            apply simp
           apply simp 
          apply simp
         apply(rule assignâ‡©2[OF _ _ _ HOL.refl])
            apply simp
           apply(rule type_aexpr_Load)
           apply simp
          apply(simp)
         apply simp
        apply(clarsimp simp: context_equiv_def  type_equiv_def subtype_def)
       apply(clarsimp simp: context_equiv_def type_equiv_def subtype_def)
      apply(blast intro: subset_entailment)
     apply(blast intro: subset_entailment)
    (* need to be careful how we unfold here as otherwise the tactics get overwhelmed *)
    apply clarsimp
    apply(subst tyenv_wellformed_def) 
    apply(clarsimp simp: mds_consistent_def types_wellformed_def type_wellformed_def types_stable_def)
    apply(simp add: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
    apply blast
   apply clarsimp
   apply(subst tyenv_wellformed_def) 
   apply(clarsimp simp: mds_consistent_def types_wellformed_def type_wellformed_def types_stable_def)
   apply(simp add: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def)
   apply blast
  apply(rule assignâ‡©1)
      apply simp+
    apply(rule type_aexpr_Load')
     apply simp
    apply simp
   apply simp
  apply blast
  done


lemma read_buffer_typed':
  "Î“ = (Î»_. None) âŸ¹ ğ’® = ({},{}) âŸ¹ P = {} âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒÎ“' ğ’®' P'. has_type Î“ ğ’® P read_buffer Î“' ğ’®' P'"
  by (has_type_tac prog: read_buffer_def 
       aexpr:type_aexpr_Load' type_aexpr_Load 
       bexpr:type_bexprI)
 
 
lemma write_buffer_typed':
  "Î“ = (Î»_. None) âŸ¹ ğ’® = ({},{}) âŸ¹ P = {} âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒÎ“' ğ’®' P'. has_type Î“ ğ’® P write_buffer Î“' ğ’®' P'"
  apply (has_type_tac prog: write_buffer_def aexpr:type_aexpr_Load' type_aexpr_Load bexpr:type_bexprI)
  apply (if_type_tac bexpr: type_bexprI
          custom_if: if_type[where Î“'''="[temp â†¦ dma_type buffer]" and P'''="{}"])
  apply (has_type_tac' aexpr:type_aexpr_Load' type_aexpr_Load bexpr:type_bexprI)
  done

end

end

Theory Example_Swap_Add

(*
Title: Value-Dependent SIFUM-Type-Systems
Authors: Toby Murray, Robert Sison, Edward Pierzchalski, Christine Rizkallah
(Based on the SIFUM-Type-Systems AFP entry, whose authors
 are: Sylvia Grewe, Heiko Mantel, Daniel Schoepe)
*)
theory Example_Swap_Add
imports 
  "../TypeSystem" 
  TypeSystemTactics
begin

text â€¹
  Use upper-case variable names to avoid clashing with one-letter free variables
â€º
datatype addr = X | control_X | Y | control_Y | Z | control_Z
type_synonym val = nat
type_synonym mem = "addr â‡’ val"

datatype aexp = Load "addr" | Const "val" | Add "addr" "addr" 

fun 
  evâ‡©A :: "mem â‡’ aexp â‡’ val"
where
  "evâ‡©A mem (Load x) = mem x" |
  "evâ‡©A mem (Const c) = c" |
  "evâ‡©A mem (Add x y) = mem x + mem y"
 
fun
  aexp_vars :: "aexp â‡’ addr set"
where
  "aexp_vars (Load x) = {x}" |
  "aexp_vars (Const c) = {}" |
  "aexp_vars (Add x y) = {x,y}"
  
datatype bexp = Same "addr" "aexp" |
                Eq "addr" "val" |
                Not bexp |
                Imp bexp bexp |
                And bexp bexp |
                Or bexp bexp | TT | FF

fun
  evâ‡©B :: "mem â‡’ bexp â‡’ bool"
where
  "evâ‡©B mem (Same x e) = ((mem x) = (evâ‡©A mem e))" | 
  "evâ‡©B mem (Eq x c) = ((mem x) = c)" | 
  "evâ‡©B mem (Not e) = (Â¬ evâ‡©B mem e)" |
  "evâ‡©B mem (Imp e f) = (evâ‡©B mem e âŸ¶ evâ‡©B mem f)" |
  "evâ‡©B mem (And e f) = (evâ‡©B mem e âˆ§ evâ‡©B mem f)" |
  "evâ‡©B mem (Or e f) = (evâ‡©B mem e âˆ¨ evâ‡©B mem f)" |
  "evâ‡©B mem TT = True" |
  "evâ‡©B mem FF = False"


fun
  bexp_vars :: "bexp â‡’ addr set"
where
  "bexp_vars (Eq x c) = {x}" |
  "bexp_vars (Same x e) = {x} âˆª aexp_vars e" |
  "bexp_vars (Not e) = bexp_vars e" |
  "bexp_vars (Imp e f) = bexp_vars e âˆª bexp_vars f" |
  "bexp_vars (And e f) = bexp_vars e âˆª bexp_vars f" |
  "bexp_vars (Or e f) = bexp_vars e âˆª bexp_vars f" |
  "bexp_vars _ = {}"

  
fun
  bexp_neg :: "bexp â‡’ bexp"
where
  "bexp_neg e = (Not e)"
  
fun
   bexp_assign :: "addr â‡’ aexp â‡’ bexp"
where
  "bexp_assign x e  = (Same x e)"

definition
  dma_control_var :: "val â‡’ Sec"
where
  "dma_control_var v â‰¡ if v = 0 then Low else High"

fun
  control_var_of :: "addr â‡’ addr"
where
  "control_var_of X = control_X" |
  "control_var_of Y = control_Y" |
  "control_var_of Z = control_Z"
  
definition
  dma :: "mem â‡’ addr â‡’ Sec"
where
  "dma m x â‰¡ if x âˆˆ {X,Y,Z} then dma_control_var (m (control_var_of x)) else Low"

definition
  ğ’_vars :: "addr â‡’ addr set"
where
  "ğ’_vars x â‰¡ if x âˆˆ {X,Y,Z} then {control_var_of x} else {}"

definition
  mdsâ‡©s :: "Mode â‡’ 'Var set"
where 
  "mdsâ‡©s â‰¡ Î»_. {}"

locale sifum_example =
  sifum_lang_no_dma evâ‡©A evâ‡©B aexp_vars bexp_vars +
  assumes eval_det: "(lc, lc') âˆˆ sifum_lang_no_dma.evalâ‡©w evâ‡©A evâ‡©B âŸ¹ (lc, lc'') âˆˆ sifum_lang_no_dma.evalâ‡©w evâ‡©A evâ‡©B âŸ¹ lc' = lc''"

definition
  ğ’ :: "addr set"
where
  "ğ’ â‰¡ â‹ƒx. ğ’_vars x"

fun
  dma_type :: "addr â‡’ bexp set"
where
  "dma_type X = {Eq control_X 0}" |
  "dma_type Z = {Eq control_Z 0}" |
  "dma_type Y = {Eq control_Y 0}" |
  "dma_type _ = {}"

sublocale sifum_example âŠ† sifum_types_assign evâ‡©A evâ‡©B aexp_vars bexp_vars dma ğ’_vars ğ’ bexp_neg dma_type FF bexp_assign
  apply(unfold_locales)
              apply(blast intro: eval_det)
             apply(rule Var_finite)
            apply(auto simp: ğ’_vars_def dma_def ğ’_def split: if_splits)[3]
         apply(rename_tac mem e, case_tac e, auto)[1]
        apply(case_tac x, auto simp: dma_def dma_control_var_def)[1]
       apply(case_tac x, auto simp: ğ’_vars_def)[1]
      apply(simp+)[2]
    apply(case_tac e, auto)[1]
   apply(case_tac e, simp)
  apply(auto simp: ğ’_def)
  done

context sifum_example begin
  
lemma if_type'': 
  "âŸ¦type_bexpr Î“ e t; pred_entailment P t;
    has_type  Î“ ğ’® (add_pred P ğ’® e) câ‡©1 Î“' ğ’®' P';
    has_type Î“ ğ’® (add_pred P ğ’® (bexp_neg e)) câ‡©2 Î“' ğ’®' P'';
    pred_entailment P' {e}; pred_entailment P'' {bexp_neg e};  
    P''' = restrict_preds_to_vars (((Imp e) ` (P' - {e})) âˆª ((Imp (bexp_neg e)) ` (P'' - {bexp_neg e}))) {v. stable ğ’®' v}âŸ§
âŸ¹ has_type Î“ ğ’® P (Stmt.If e câ‡©1 câ‡©2) Î“' ğ’®' P'''"
  apply(erule (3) if_type,simp+)
     apply(auto simp: pred_entailment_def pred_def image_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def)[1]
    apply(auto simp: pred_entailment_def pred_def image_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def)[1]
   apply(clarsimp simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def stable_def image_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
   apply fastforce
  apply(clarsimp simp: tyenv_wellformed_def mds_consistent_def stable_def image_def restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  apply fastforce
  done
  

definition
  swap_vars :: "(addr, aexp, bexp) Stmt"
where
  "swap_vars â‰¡ 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_X AsmNoWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_Y AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_Z AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq X AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq Y AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq Z AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     Assign Z (Load X) ;;
     Assign X (Load Y) ;;
     Assign Y (Load Z) ;;
     Assign control_Z (Load control_X) ;;
     Assign control_X (Load control_Y) ;;
     Assign control_Y (Load control_Z) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel X AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel Y AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel Z AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel control_X AsmNoWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel control_Y AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel control_Z AsmNoWrite) ;;
     Skip"

lemma ğ’_simp[simp]:
  "ğ’ = {control_X, control_Y, control_Z}"
proof -
  have "ğ’ = control_var_of ` {x. x = X âˆ¨ x = Y âˆ¨ x = Z}"
    by (simp add: ğ’_def ğ’_vars_def UNION_singleton_eq_range)
  also have "{x. x = X âˆ¨ x = Y âˆ¨ x = Z} = {X, Y, Z}"
    by auto
  finally show ?thesis
    by simp
qed

lemma type_aexpr_Load:
  "v âˆ‰ dom Î“ âŸ¹ type_aexpr Î“ (Load v) (dma_type v)"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Î“ "Load v", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done

lemma type_aexpr_Load':
  "v âˆˆ dom Î“ âŸ¹ t = (the (Î“ v)) âŸ¹ type_aexpr Î“ (Load v) t"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Î“ "Load v", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done

lemma type_aexpr_Add:
  "x âˆ‰ dom Î“ âŸ¹ y âˆ‰ dom Î“ âŸ¹ 
   type_aexpr Î“ (Add x y) (â‹ƒ {dma_type x, dma_type y})"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Î“ "Add x y", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done

lemma type_aexpr_Add':
  "x âˆ‰ dom Î“ âŸ¹ y âˆˆ dom Î“ âŸ¹ t = (the (Î“ y)) âŸ¹
   type_aexpr Î“ (Add x y) (â‹ƒ {dma_type x, t})"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Î“ "Add x y", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done

lemma type_aexpr_Add'':
  "x âˆˆ dom Î“ âŸ¹ y âˆ‰ dom Î“ âŸ¹ t = (the (Î“ x)) âŸ¹
   type_aexpr Î“ (Add x y) (â‹ƒ {t, dma_type y})"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Î“ "Add x y", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done

lemma type_aexpr_Add''':
  "x âˆˆ dom Î“ âŸ¹ y âˆˆ dom Î“ âŸ¹ t = (the (Î“ x)) âŸ¹ t' = (the (Î“ y)) âŸ¹
   type_aexpr Î“ (Add x y) (â‹ƒ {t, t'})"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Î“ "Add x y", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done


lemma type_aexpr_Const[simp]:
  "type_aexpr Î“ (Const c) {}"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Î“ "Const c", simplified],simp)
  done


declare restrict_preds_to_vars_def [simp]
declare add_pred_def [simp]
declare stable_def [simp]
declare to_total_def [simp]
declare ğ’_vars_def [simp]
declare anno_type_stable_def [simp]
declare anno_type_sec_def [simp]
declare assign_post_def [simp]


lemma control_vars_cases:
  "control_X âˆˆ ğ’_vars v âŸ¹ v = X"
  "control_Y âˆˆ ğ’_vars v âŸ¹ v = Y"
  "control_Z âˆˆ ğ’_vars v âŸ¹ v = Z"
  by(case_tac v, auto)+

lemma mem_is_different[simp, intro]:
  "mem x = A âŸ¹ mem y â‰  A âŸ¹ Â¬ evâ‡©B  mem (Same y (Load x))"
  "mem x = A âŸ¹ mem y â‰  A âŸ¹ Â¬ evâ‡©B  mem (Same x (Load y))"
  by fastforce+

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_empty[simp]:
  "restrict_preds_to_vars {} V = {}"
  apply(simp add: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  done

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_idemp[simp]:
  "restrict_preds_to_vars (restrict_preds_to_vars P V) V = 
   restrict_preds_to_vars P V"
  apply(simp add: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  done

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_insert1[simp]:
  "(âˆ€xâˆˆbexp_vars a. x âˆˆ V) âŸ¹ restrict_preds_to_vars (insert a P) V = (insert a (restrict_preds_to_vars P V))"
  apply(simp add: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  apply fastforce
  done

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_insert2[simp]:
  "(âˆƒxâˆˆbexp_vars a. x âˆ‰ V) âŸ¹ restrict_preds_to_vars (insert a P) V = ((restrict_preds_to_vars P V))"
  apply(simp add: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  apply fastforce
  done
  
declare restrict_preds_to_vars_def[simp del]

lemma [simp]: "pred_entailment P {}" by(simp add: pred_entailment_def pred_def)
lemma [simp]: "e âˆˆ P âŸ¹ pred_entailment P {e}" by(blast intro: subset_entailment)
lemma [simp]: "FF âˆˆ P âŸ¹ pred_entailment P Q" by(auto simp: pred_entailment_def pred_def)

lemma swap_vars_typed:
  "Î“ = (Î»_. None) âŸ¹ ğ’® = ({},{}) âŸ¹ P = {} âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒÎ“' ğ’®' P'. has_type Î“ ğ’® P swap_vars Î“' ğ’®' P'"
  apply(intro exI)
  apply(simp add: swap_vars_def)
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply(simp+)[4]
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply(simp+)[4]
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply(simp+)[4]
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
        apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply(simp+)[4]
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply(simp+)[4]
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply(simp+)[4]

  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule assignâ‡©2[OF _ _ _ HOL.refl])
      apply simp
     apply(rule type_aexpr_Load')
     apply(simp+)[4]

  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule assignâ‡©2[OF _ _ _ HOL.refl])
      apply simp
     apply(rule type_aexpr_Load')
     apply(simp+)[4]

  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule assignâ‡©2[OF _ _ _ HOL.refl])
      apply simp
     apply(rule type_aexpr_Load')
     apply(simp+)[4]

  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’[OF _ _ _ _ HOL.refl])
      apply simp
     apply(rule type_aexpr_Load)
     apply (simp+)[4]
  apply simp
 
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule conc'[where x="Z" and t="dma_type Z", OF _ HOL.refl])
       apply(rule conc'[where x=Y and t="dma_type Z", OF _ HOL.refl])
           apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’[OF _ _ _ _ HOL.refl])
                apply simp
               apply(rule type_aexpr_Load)
               apply simp+
         apply(clarsimp simp: type_equiv_def subtype_def pred_entailment_def pred_def)
        apply(fastforce simp: type_wellformed_def)
       apply simp
      apply simp
     apply(clarsimp simp: type_equiv_def subtype_def pred_entailment_def pred_def)
    apply(fastforce simp: type_wellformed_def)
   apply simp

  apply simp
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule conc'[where x=X and t="dma_type X" , OF _ HOL.refl])
       apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’[OF _ _ _ _ HOL.refl])
           apply simp
          apply(rule type_aexpr_Load)
          apply simp+
     apply(clarsimp simp: type_equiv_def subtype_def pred_entailment_def pred_def)
    apply(clarsimp simp: type_wellformed_def)
   apply simp
  
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply(fastforce simp: add_anno_def subtype_def pred_entailment_def pred_def)
    apply simp
   apply simp

  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply(fastforce simp: add_anno_def subtype_def pred_entailment_def pred_def)
    apply simp
   apply simp
 
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply(fastforce simp: add_anno_def subtype_def pred_entailment_def pred_def)
    apply simp
   apply simp

  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply(fastforce simp: add_anno_def subtype_def)
     apply (simp add: add_anno_def) 
    apply simp 

  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply(fastforce simp: add_anno_def subtype_def)
     apply (simp add: add_anno_def) 
    apply simp 

  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply(fastforce simp: add_anno_def subtype_def)
     apply (simp add: add_anno_def) 
    apply simp 

  apply(rule skip_type)
  done

lemma swap_vars_sifum_secure:
  "com_sifum_secure (swap_vars,(Î»_. {}))"
  apply(insert swap_vars_typed[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
  apply clarify
  apply(rule typed_secure)
   apply(fastforce simp: Î“_of_mds_def ğ’®_of_mds_def)
  apply(auto simp: mds_yields_stable_types_def)
  done

definition
  add_vars :: "(addr, aexp, bexp) Stmt"
where
  "add_vars â‰¡ 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_X AsmNoWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_Y AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_Z AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq Z AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     Assign Z (Add X Y) ;;
     If (Eq control_X 0)
        (If (Eq control_Y 0)
            (Assign control_Z (Const 0))
            (Assign control_Z (Const 1)))
        (Assign control_Z (Const 1)) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel Z AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel control_X AsmNoWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel control_Y AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel control_Z AsmNoWrite) ;;
     Skip"

lemma pred_entailment_singleton_by_case_distinction:
  "Imp e f âˆˆ P âŸ¹ Imp (bexp.Not e) f âˆˆ P âŸ¹ pred_entailment P {f}"
  apply(clarsimp simp: pred_entailment_def pred_def)
  apply(case_tac "evâ‡©B mem e")
   apply fastforce+
  done


lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_nest [simp]:
  "restrict_preds_to_vars (restrict_preds_to_vars P V) V' = restrict_preds_to_vars P (V âˆ© V')"
  apply(auto simp: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  done

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_imp_image1 [simp]:
  "Â¬ bexp_vars e âŠ† V âŸ¹ restrict_preds_to_vars (Imp e ` P) V = {}"
  apply(auto simp: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  done

lemma restrict_preds_to_vars_imp_image2 [simp]:
  "bexp_vars e âŠ† V âŸ¹ restrict_preds_to_vars (Imp e ` P) V = ((Imp e) ` (restrict_preds_to_vars P V))"
  apply(auto simp: restrict_preds_to_vars_def)
  done

  
lemma insert_minus1 [simp]:
  "x = y âŸ¹ (insert x A) - {y} = (A - {y})"
  by auto
  
lemma insert_minus2 [simp]:
  "x â‰  y âŸ¹ (insert x A) - {y} = insert x (A - {y})"
  by auto
  
lemma add_vars_typed:
  "Î“ = (Î»_. None) âŸ¹ ğ’® = ({},{}) âŸ¹ P = {} âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒÎ“' ğ’®' P'. has_type Î“ ğ’® P add_vars Î“' ğ’®' P'"
  apply(intro exI)
  apply(simp add: add_vars_def)
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp+
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp+
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp+
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp+

  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule assignâ‡©2)
       apply simp
      apply (rule type_aexpr_Add type_aexpr_Add' type_aexpr_Add'' type_aexpr_Add'''; simp)
     apply(simp)
    apply(simp)
   apply simp
 
  apply(clarsimp)
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule if_type''[OF _ _ _ _ _ _ HOL.refl])
        apply(rule type_bexprI)
        apply(clarsimp)
        apply(rule HOL.refl)
       apply simp
      apply(rule if_type''[OF _ _ _ _ _ _ HOL.refl])
           apply(rule type_bexprI)
           apply(clarsimp simp: to_total_def)
           apply(rule HOL.refl)
          apply simp
         apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’)
              apply simp
             apply(rule type_aexpr_Const)
            apply simp 
           apply (clarsimp, fast)
          apply(simp)
         apply simp
        apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’)
             apply simp
            apply(rule type_aexpr_Const)
           apply simp 
          apply auto[1]
         apply(simp)
        apply clarsimp
       apply(clarsimp simp: subset_entailment)
      apply(clarsimp simp: subset_entailment)
             
     apply(rule assignâ‡©ğ’)
          apply simp
         apply(rule type_aexpr_Const)
        apply simp 
       apply clarsimp 
       apply fast
      apply(simp)
     apply simp
    apply(fastforce intro: pred_entailment_singleton_by_case_distinction simp: image_def)
   apply(fastforce intro: subset_entailment)
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply(clarsimp simp: subtype_def pred_def add_anno_def pred_entailment_def)
    apply simp+
 
 apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply(clarsimp simp: subtype_def pred_def add_anno_def)
    apply (simp add: add_anno_def)
   apply simp+
 
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply fastforce+
  done
  

method post_conc_tac 
  declares aexpr bexpr =
  ( simp,
   clarsimp simp: type_equiv_def subtype_def pred_entailment_def pred_def,
   clarsimp simp: type_wellformed_def,
   simp, 
   has_type_tac')

method conc_tac for x :: addr and y :: addr  =
  (rule conc'[where  x="x" and t="dma_type y", OF _ HOL.refl])


lemma swap_vars_typed':
  "Î“ = (Î»_. None) âŸ¹ ğ’® = ({},{}) âŸ¹ P = {} âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒÎ“' ğ’®' P'. has_type Î“ ğ’® P swap_vars Î“' ğ’®' P'"
  apply (has_type_tac prog: swap_vars_def aexpr: type_aexpr_Load' type_aexpr_Load bexpr:type_bexprI)
   apply(conc_tac Z Z)
       apply(conc_tac Y Z)  
           apply (has_type_tac' aexpr:type_aexpr_Load' type_aexpr_Load bexpr:type_bexprI)
          apply post_conc_tac
      apply post_conc_tac
   apply (has_type_tac' aexpr:type_aexpr_Load' type_aexpr_Load bexpr:type_bexprI)
   apply(conc_tac X X)
       apply (has_type_tac' aexpr:type_aexpr_Load' type_aexpr_Load bexpr:type_bexprI)
      apply  (post_conc_tac)
  done



lemma add_vars_typed':
  "Î“ = (Î»_. None) âŸ¹ ğ’® = ({},{}) âŸ¹ P = {} âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒÎ“' ğ’®' P'. has_type Î“ ğ’® P add_vars Î“' ğ’®' P'"
  apply (has_type_no_if_tac
          prog: add_vars_def
          aexpr: type_aexpr_Load' type_aexpr_Load type_aexpr_Add 
           type_aexpr_Add' type_aexpr_Add''  type_aexpr_Const
          bexpr:type_bexprI) 
   apply(rule if_type''[OF _ _ _ _ _ _ HOL.refl])
        apply(rule type_bexprI)
        apply(clarsimp)
        apply(rule HOL.refl)
       apply simp
      apply(rule if_type''[OF _ _ _ _ _ _ HOL.refl])
           apply(rule type_bexprI)
           apply(clarsimp)
           apply(rule HOL.refl)
          apply simp
         apply (has_type_tac' aexpr: type_aexpr_Const)
        apply (has_type_tac' aexpr: type_aexpr_Const)
       apply(clarsimp simp: subset_entailment)
      apply(clarsimp simp: subset_entailment)     
     apply (has_type_tac' aexpr: type_aexpr_Const)
    apply simp
    apply(fastforce intro: pred_entailment_singleton_by_case_distinction simp: image_def)
   apply(fastforce intro: subset_entailment)
  apply (has_type_tac')
  done 

end

end
